programme.title: Wildest Africa: Okavango: Water in the Desert
programme.desc: The Okavango Delta, a huge emerald oasis in the burning heart of the Kalahari desert, is fed by the Okavango River and this perpetual cycle of wet and dry is the lifeblood of this extraordinary natural Eden.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Namibia: Sands of Time
programme.desc: Namibia is an arid, rough land. However, it has been inhabited for thousands of years, by people as well as animals, and shows no sign of losing popularity with either.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ngorongoro: Born of Fire
programme.desc: Ngorongoro is thought to have formed about 2.5 million years ago from a large volcano, whose cone collapsed inward after a major eruption. This fertile land is full of wildlife, from cunning hyena and proud lions to vast herds of wildebeest and elephants.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Zambezi: Wild Water
programme.desc: The Zambezi is one of Africa's most influential rivers. It supports some of the continent's most spectacular wildlife. However, the Zambezi's long and winding journey destroys, as well as creates.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Nile: An African Odyssey
programme.desc: The Nile is the longest river in the world. Ancient Egypt, one of the history's most powerful civilizations, depended hugely upon it. Each year, it flooded, replenishing the fields with fertile silt. This automatic irrigation fueled Egypt's economy.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Virungas: Land of Ice and Fire
programme.sub-title: Virungas: Land of Ice and Fire
programme.desc: It's home to some of the world's most iconic animals  including the African great apes.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Giant Python Invader
programme.desc: The Burmese python is not a native species to the swamplands of Florida. Austin is on the search to relocate one of these reptilian giants to a new home.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Night of the Hyena
programme.desc: Austin explores the rugged landscape of Ethiopia in search of the notorious spotted hyena. He goes as far as to setting up his camcorder in a hyena den, in order to get the best shot.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: The Last Serpent
programme.desc: Austin travels to Mexico to catch a glimpse of the Tzabcan rattlesnake, which was once hailed as a god by the ancient Mayans. With the help of local guides and a shaman, he braves underground rivers and dense rainforest in search of the snake.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Australia's Lost Eden
programme.desc: Austin heads to the barren landscape of northern Australia, searching for some of the world's most dangerous reptiles. He battles harsh terrain, high temperatures and monsoons in a bid to photograph the indigenous snakes and lizards.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: In the Shadow of Armored Giants
programme.sub-title: In the Shadow of Armored Giants
programme.desc: Austin Stevens travels to Swaziland in search of the rare black rhino. After a number of close and dangerous encounters, Austin finally finds what he is looking for.

programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Man-Eating Leopards
programme.desc: Austin traverses South Africa in search of one of the Big Five, and one of the most swift killers on the continent. After much tracking, he finally lucks out and comes upon a fresh kill. Now all he has to do is wait.

programme.title: Wild Animal Orphans: Painted Pups
programme.desc: Fourteen highly endangered Wild Dog pups arrive at Naankuse, Marlice, with the help of Zacheo meets this challenge head-on - in the mean time the leopard cubs are beginning to pose a danger to Zacheo.

programme.title: Wild Animal Orphans: Baby Baboons
programme.desc: When Shona, the injured baby baboon orphan, is introduced to her new friends, things don't go all that smoothly.

programme.title: Wild Animal Orphans: Signs in the Sand
programme.desc: In trying to find a leopard in the vast desert landscape of southern Namibia, Marlice relies on the skills of Kiewiet, an expert Bushman tracker.

programme.title: Wild Animal Orphans: Cat Trouble
programme.desc: Establishing the hierarchy within a troop of adult baboons is serious business but when a wild leopard gets trapped the adrenaline really starts pumping.

channel.desc: Science lovers, Nature and History buffs: this is your channel! Voyager Documentaries takes you into Earth’s wildest corners, the forbidding realms of deep space, and the dramatic turning points of history.

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: Blackball
programme.desc: In the world of spectator sports, there are of course the all time greats: football, rugby, tennis, golf and... lawn bowls? Try as he might, Cliff Starkey (Paul Kaye) just can't keep out of trouble.

programme.title: Super
programme.desc: After his wife falls under the influence of a drug dealer, an everyday guy transforms himself into Crimson Bolt, a superhero with the best intentions, but lacking in heroic skills.

programme.title: Lesbian Vampire Killers
programme.desc: Jimmy and Fletch are a couple of losers on a hiking trip, who wander into a feeding ground for a band of fang-baring vampire babes. With a busload of hot history students to protect, they'll try to survive the night

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones. Starring: Johnny Depp, Frank Langella, Lena Olin

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Why Did I Get Married?
programme.desc: A dramedy about the knots we tie. WHY DID I GET MARRIED is the big-screen adaptation of Perry's stage play about the trials and tribulations of marriage, and what happens when a group of couples reunites and secrets are uncovered.

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: When word of Eisenheim's illusions reaches the powerful Crown Prince Leopold, the ruler attends one of the magician's shows. When the Prince's intended assists the magician, Eisenheim and Sophie recognize each other and a love affair is rekindled

channel.desc: Movie lovers' one-stop shop for all things motion pictures. Sit back and escape into edgy indies, illuminating documentaries, chilling thrillers, raucous comedies, and touching dramas.

programme.title: Cave Dwellers
programme.desc: Newly-married wife Jenni can't tell if the skull she sees in her new home is a ghostly apparition of her husband's dead first wife, hallucinations from her own nervous condition... or something else.

programme.title: The Beatniks
programme.desc: When a hold-up carried out by his hoodlum friends goes tragically awry, Eddie Crane’s bright future as a recording artist could be in jeopardy.

programme.title: Monster A-Go-Go
programme.desc: The search for an astronaut on an alien planet.

programme.title: The Unearthly
programme.desc: A mad scientist creates havoc when an experiment to stop the aging process goes awry.

programme.title: MST3K: Werewolf
programme.desc: After digging up strange bones, a man becomes a werewolf.

programme.title: Bride of the Monster
programme.desc: Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo.

programme.title: Indestructible Man
programme.desc: In Indestructible Man, a violent criminal named Butcher Benson is executed and becomes indestructible when he’s brought back to life. Butcher seeks revenge against those who caused his execution.

programme.title: The Killer Shrews
programme.desc: An experiment on a remote island goes awfully awry when Professor Marlowe Cragis and his research team accidentally create giant, venomous shrews.

channel.desc: MST3K (Mystery Science Theater 3000) 24/7 brought to you by Shout! Factory TV.

programme.desc: A romantic Valentine's Day rendezvous ends in murder.

programme.desc: When a retired professor is found murdered, police must figure out whether the victim's son and daughter in law were eyewitnesses or the killers.

programme.title: On the Case: Veil of Suspicion
programme.desc: A beloved husband and father is found executed in front of his home.

programme.title: On the Case: Smoke and Ashes
programme.desc: A beautiful bride to be is murdered when a bomb explodes as she enters her home.

programme.title: On the Case: At Death's Door
programme.desc: After a single mother is viciously attacked and left for dead, she still manages to help police track down her assailant.

programme.title: On the Case: Hidden in Plain Sight
programme.desc: A nine year old girl scout disappears while delivering cookies to a neighbor.

programme.title: On the Case: The Killer Rang Twice
programme.desc: Linda Donahew, of Arlington Texas, was discovered stabbed to death by her sister one night in June. For nearly two decades the case remained unsolved, until detectives matched DNA from Linda's case with another case a few hundred miles away.

programme.title: On the Case: Justice Never Quits
programme.desc: Mary-Jane Marquardt, mother and wife from Chippewa, Wisconsin, was found stabbed to death in her own home. With Mary-Jane's son also missing, the detectives couldn't help but wonder if his disappearance was connected to the murder.

programme.title: On the Case: Tip 1960
programme.desc: 19 year old Katie Poirier was working the night shift at a Convenience store when she was violently kidnapped. The abduction was captured on videotape but the images were not clear enough to identify her attacker.

channel.desc: Become immersed by fascinating people, oddities, small details, and big facts. Full of insightful and entertaining lifestyle and true crime programmes, reality series full of inspiring characters and fascinating documentaries.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Dennis Farina
programme.desc: This episode includes: Murder of Tupac Shakur, Bigfoot II, Noble Brothers Run, Fred's Fatal Drive, Cyril Wecht and Lost at Sea.

programme.desc: This episode includes: Falcon Lake UFO, Inside Frontera, UD: Loving's Lost Love and Disappearing Dad.

programme.desc: This episode includes: Mystery Hum, UD: School Bus Family, Car Crash Thank You & UD, Dial's Escape & UD and Taking a Dive & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Dennis Farina
programme.desc: This episode includes: The Man Who Knew Too Much, Robinhood Rabbi, Totally Exhausted, Christmas Miracle Baby, Update: Man Who Never Was and Med Scam.

programme.desc: This episode includes: Oklahoma City Rescuers, UD: Baby Given Away, Carolina Cop Killer & UD, Vince Foster and Crime Novelist.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries
programme.desc: This episode includes: Mystery Hitchhiker, Anchors Away, Lucky Lost Love & UD and Vegas Rapist & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries
programme.desc: This episode includes: Canadian UFO, UD: Brenda's Bunch, Dropped Off DOE & UD, Larry's Rampage & UD and Priceless Search & UD

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Dennis Farina
programme.desc: This episode includes: Sixty Miles, Sharon Kinne, Healing from the Grave, Salvatore Spinnato, Update: Dark Dante and First Loves, Second Chance.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries
programme.desc: This episode includes: Broken Hearts & UD, Burning Car & UD, Armored Car Killings & UD and Amnesia Victim.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries

channel.desc: Watch classic episodes of Unsolved Mysteries on this eerie channel, Who knows? Perhaps YOU can help solve a mystery...

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 43
programme.desc: Myths tested: Did the Confederates really have a two-stage rocket capable of traveling 100 miles from Richmond to DC?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 44
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can two semi-trucks collide head-on and completely crush a compact car? Can vodka cure foot odor or bad breath?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 45
programme.desc: Myths tested: Do steel toe boots really put toes in more danger than a regular boot, to the extent that the steel toe would chop off the toes? Can bottle rockets be used to launch a human?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 46
programme.desc: Myths tested: What is the best cure for seasickness? Is it more efficient to drive a truck with its tailgate up than down? Can sticking one's finger in a gun barrel stop a bullet?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 47
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a deadly crossbow be made from materials available to prison inmates? Can vodka remove the smell of cigarettes from clothes or kill bees like an insecticide?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 48
programme.desc: Myths tested: What caused a plane to be shredded? Can a fire be started by rubbing sticks together, with a bullet or with ice?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 49
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a football fly farther if it is filled with helium? Is it possible for a human to catch a bullet in his teeth?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 50
programme.desc: Myths tested: Could a kite struck by lightning in a storm kill the person holding it? Are various flatulence myths true?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 51
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a cell phone cause a plane to crash? Can a person fly away on a raft filled with helium?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 52
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a bullet fired straight up in the air kill someone on the way back down? If low-end vodka is charcoal-filtered, will it become a top-shelf vodka?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 53
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is it possible to split an arrow by hitting it with another? Can a hybrid rocket be propelled with salami? Can a modern firearm be fired if completely submerged in water?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 54
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can mind control be achieved? Can a room be painted with dynamite?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 55
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is it possible for pants to spontaneously explode? Do various fuel efficiency methods work?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 56
programme.desc: Myths tested: Did Archimedes make a cannon using steam power? Is a cardboard cereal box more nutritious than the sugary cereal inside?

channel.desc: MythBusters explodes onto the screen, bringing with it two Hollywood special effects experts Jamie Hyneman and Adam Savage & attempt to debunk urban legends. Expect science, experiments, explosions & disasters!

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: Bank robbery is a brazen yet simple crime. A mask, a gun, a note passed to a teller. But bank burglary is different. It takes skill to disable an alarm, to penetrate a locked vault.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Shattered Shield
programme.desc: In a city awash in narcotics the drug lords have all the power even over the police. Corruption in New Orleans grew like cancer, eating away at public safety and threatening to destroy the city. Crooked cops break the laws they were sworn to uphold.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Cracking The Cartel
programme.desc: A mother and child are kidnapped, a bystander is murdered. Violence such as this shattered a quiet Texas neighborhood and exposed a drug cartel that flourished where it was least expected.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Manhunt
programme.desc: A killer was on the loose in one of America's most popular tourist destinations. Armed and desperate, he evaded law enforcement at every turn. As the Fourth of July weekend quickly approached, thousands of people became potential targets.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Search For Lisa Rene
programme.desc: When a young woman was grabbed from her Texas home, the police raced to find her abductors. On the face of it, the kidnapping seemed like the random act of desperate men.

programme.title: The FBI Files: John Gotti: Convicted
programme.desc: John Gotti was ambitious, powerful and ruthless. He ruled with flash and conspicuous style, playing celebrity with the media and cat and mouse with the FBI. They called John Gotti the Teflon Don. Serious charges just wouldn't stick.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Brutal Abduction
programme.desc: A Chicago street gang thought they had figured out how to kidnap people for ransom again and again, and never get caught. But their one mistake was they underestimated the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The True Story of Mississippi Burning
programme.sub-title: The True Story of Mississippi Burning
programme.desc: Philadelphia, Mississippi, 1964. A sleepy southern town steeped in tradition finds itself targeted for invasion.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Obsession
programme.desc: Power is a responsibility as well as a privilege. But in the wrong hands, power can corrupt. For former Deputy Attorney General for the State of Delaware, losing sight of his sworn oath to uphold justice could prove lethal.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Stranger
programme.desc: The body of a young woman found burned in a truck launched a manhunt to find her killer. When more bodies began to turn up across the country, the FBI believed the cases were linked. Investigators had a suspect. They just couldn't find him.

programme.title: The FBI Files: A Model Killer
programme.desc: It's a model's job to rivet the public's attention. But in 1984, some aspiring models began attracting publicity in a terrible new way.

programme.title: The FBI Files: A Stranger in Town
programme.desc: She appeared on the highway in the spring, a young woman, her life cut short, her past and her identity a mystery. Only by finding out who she was could we ever hope to find her killer.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Trail
programme.desc: The disappearance of young women triggered a search that spanned the Pacific Northwest. A massive media campaign failed to locate the drifter, who first charmed then killed them. As investigators followed his trail, he always stayed one step ahead.

channel.desc: From true-crime factual series to binge-worthy procedurals, this channel will bring together everything that makes crime so fascinating to viewers.

programme.title: Fear Factor: A Dual Helicopter Drop, Pot Lock Dinner, Tank Of Dead Mice, Pit Fall
programme.sub-title: A Dual Helicopter Drop, Pot Lock Dinner, Tank Of Dead Mice, Pit Fall
programme.desc: A contestant must enter a cylindrical glass tank filled with water, where dead, frozen mice are then dumped in. Other contestants face disgusting food and more horrors in this episode of Fear Factor.

programme.title: Fear Factor: A Submerged Hallway, Gross Items Transfer, Pipe Ramp into Boxes
programme.sub-title: A Submerged Hallway, Gross Items Transfer, Pipe Ramp into Boxes
programme.desc: Contestants transfer an assembly line of items using only their mouths. In another stunt, the contestant must drive their car up a pipe ramp and off of a 3 story high parking garage.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Clip Show of Greatest Fear Factor Moments From Season 1-3
programme.sub-title: Clip Show of Greatest Fear Factor Moments From Season 1-3
programme.desc: Joe Rogan, in a crowd of fans, counts down the top 15 stunts from all the shows up till this point.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Extreme Monkey Bars, Leech Coffin, Ham and Eggs Fear Factor Style, Platform Swing, Swim With Chum, Quad Lunch
programme.sub-title: Extreme Monkey Bars, Leech Coffin, Ham and Eggs Fear Factor Style, Platform Swing, Swim With Chum, Quad Lunch
programme.desc: Contestants hold onto monkey bars, suspended under a helicopter. Contestants search for rubber boots at the bottom of a tank of cut up fish parts. Contestants must run their motorcycles off of a cliff.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Semi Circle Flag Snag, Feeding Frenzy With Piranhas, Roulette Spider Eating
programme.sub-title: Semi Circle Flag Snag, Feeding Frenzy With Piranhas, Roulette Spider Eating
programme.desc: A tank is filled with Piranha and pig kidneys, which need to be picked up off using contestants' mouths.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Taxi To Taxi Jump, Roach Coffin, Crain Money Grab, BlackJack Bet
programme.sub-title: Taxi To Taxi Jump, Roach Coffin, Crain Money Grab, BlackJack Bet
programme.desc: Taxi cabs will be suspended from cranes. A player is placed inside a sealed coffin with thousands of roaches. The contestants will be hung by their ankles from a crane and suspended over a swimming pool.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Heli Crawl and Flag Grab, Maggot Madness, Head on Pipe Ramp
programme.sub-title: Heli Crawl and Flag Grab, Maggot Madness, Head on Pipe Ramp
programme.desc: Players must transfer cow hooves out of a tank of cod liver oil and into a tank of maggots. A contestant must drive their car at approx. 25mph towards another car in another terrifying stunt.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Heli Water Drag, Cow Eye Juice, Truck-To-Truck Transfer
programme.sub-title: Heli Water Drag, Cow Eye Juice, Truck-To-Truck Transfer
programme.desc: Contestants will start this game floating in the water. Contestants compress a cows eye with their mouth, squeezing the juice out of the eye into a glass. Contestant will stand on Euclid dump trucks as they travel down the road.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Heli Dunk,Conveyor Belt,Human Hamster Wheel
programme.desc: Helicopter picks up contestant by their ankles then dunks them. Contestants transfer a bunch of Fear Factor items off of a moving conveyer belt and onto a scale. Contestants will stand inside a giant ring above water.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Submerged Bus,Dirty Kitchen,Brain Surgery,Falling Beam Walk
programme.sub-title: Submerged Bus,Dirty Kitchen,Brain Surgery,Falling Beam Walk
programme.desc: A Contestant must dive into the water and swim down to a submerged city bus. Players are given fifty cow brains with a FF chip hidden inside, and must make the way across a maze of beams in another stunt.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Water Sack, Beetle, Roach, Worm Transfer
programme.sub-title: Water Sack, Beetle, Roach, Worm Transfer
programme.desc: The contestant is placed in a specially designed clear bag. A tank is filled with millipedes, roaches and worms. Contestant is standing on one of four 8-foot tall 16-foot long Plexiglas walls suspended high above the ground.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Truck To Helicopter,Table Clearing,Under The Semi
programme.sub-title: Truck To Helicopter,Table Clearing,Under The Semi
programme.desc: Players will have to clear tables to uncover a three-digit combination written on the glass top and drive a car under a semi truck.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Boat Raft Leap Frog,Family Tunnel,Worm Head,Suspended Water Tube
programme.sub-title: Boat Raft Leap Frog,Family Tunnel,Worm Head,Suspended Water Tube
programme.desc: There will be a boat that is towing three rafts. A Plexiglas bottom covered in pig parts. The child stands under a large metal shower-head and pulls a chain. Suspended above the water. The kid must climb through the tubes and traverse.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Boat To Boat Transfer,Worm Wine,Matrix Truck Straddle
programme.sub-title: Boat To Boat Transfer,Worm Wine,Matrix Truck Straddle
programme.desc: Contestants must leap back and forth between boats collecting as many flags as possible as well as spend time in a grape-stomping vat in this episode.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Cable Surfing, Gift Exchange, Lake O'Fire
programme.sub-title: Cable Surfing, Gift Exchange, Lake O'Fire
programme.desc: A contestant must slide down two cables while standing on a small platform and swim underneath a 20 foot by 40-foot grid on fire. One at a time, contestants pick nasty gifts from under a Christmas tree in this festive episode.

channel.desc: Imagine a world where your greatest fears become reality. In each pulse-racing "Fear Factor" episode, recruited contestants battle in extreme stunts. These stunts are designed to challenge the contestants both physically and mentally.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: For Sale By Owner
programme.desc: When South Korean buyers come to Buffalo to look at a water bomber, the pressure is on mechanic Cory to get the plane ready. But a landing gear emergency puts him and chief pilot Justin in serious danger.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Over Seas
programme.desc: Buffalo has to get a CL-215 water bomber to buyers in Korea. So Justin and Cory fly the plane to Vancouver Harbour, where it will be hoisted onto a cargo ship sailing across the Pacific Ocean to its destinatin, a method of delivery no one has ever tried.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Water Wings
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalo's water bomber plane to buyers there but are frustrated by the buyers' poor planning. Tempers flare when they try to get the plane off the ship and delivered to its final destination

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Meltdown
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Ray's retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition. So Buffalo brings in Electra pilot Brian Harrison to finish the contract.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: North Atlantic Convoy
programme.desc: Greenland's Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the world's most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey. Christine pushes to become a DC-3 co-pilot,

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Sunk
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago. It's a personal quest for Joe; he flew that plane at the beginning of his career.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Turkey or Bust
programme.desc: Justin and Cory are stranded in Croatia while trying to complete the delivery of two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey. Metal rock band Iron Maiden's lead singer Bruce Dickinson flies Buffalo's DC-3 from Edmonton to Yellowknife.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Buffalo Air
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Pre-Christmas Rush
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalo's crucial food and mail runs come to a halt. An engine seizure strands Scott, AJ and the C-46 plane, creating a chaotic chain reaction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Birthday from Hell
programme.desc: A string of bad luck turns chief pilot Arnie's 66th birthday run into the flight from hell - and threatens to spoil his naughty birthday surprise.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: A Big Deal
programme.desc: When a power failure leaves Rankin Inlet exposed to the brutal northern elements, captain Justin races to deliver an emergency generator.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: 40/40/40
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: On the Move
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Suspension
programme.desc: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Cause for Celebration
programme.desc: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joe's birthday.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Transatlantic Crossing
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

channel.desc: Ice Pilots is about an eccentric airline and its motley crew that fly vintage planes on impossible arctic missions. Buffalo Airways attracts young pilots seeking Arctic adventure and the chance to fly big, old, piston powered aircrafts from a bygone era.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Surprise, Surprise!
programme.desc: With the first Turbo Duel of the Fortune Cup set to start, a surprise guest forces Yusei's competition to take an unexpected pit stop.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Return to the Spirit World, Part 1
programme.sub-title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 1
programme.desc: Director Goodwin enlists the hypnotic powers of the Professor to expose Luna as a Signer and uncover the secrets she unknowingly knows of the Duel Monsters Spirit World.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Return to the Spirit World, Part 2
programme.sub-title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 2
programme.desc: As the battle between the Professor and Luna continues, Luna looks to keep a promise she made to protect the Duel Monsters Spirit World, but in order for her to succeed, she must first break free of the hypnotic hold the Professor has on her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Second Round Showdown, Part 1
programme.desc: The semifinals of the Fortune Cup are about to begin, and the first match of day two features Yusei going toe-to-toe with the tower of power - Greiger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Second Round Showdown, Part 2
programme.desc: With no cards left in his hand and his life points about to get blasted by Greiger, Yusei has one draw left to take down this tower of power to keep in the hunt to duel Jack in the championship round.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Dueling Minds
programme.desc: In the second battle of the semifinals, Akiza squares off against the professional profiler Commander Koda, but with her tournament life on the line, can Akiza outplay an opponent who claims to know her every move?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Duel of the Dragons, Part 1
programme.desc: With the Fortune Cup Finale one win away, Yusei and Akiza get set to battle it out as Director Goodwin anxiously awaits the final Signer to reveal their Mark of the Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Duel of the Dragons, Part 2
programme.desc: As the back-and-forth battle between Akiza and Yusei rages on, Yusei is forced to unleash his mighty Stardust Dragon in order to stop Akiza's grisly garden from squeezing his life points into submission.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Fortune Cup Finale: Part 1
programme.desc: With the Fortune Cup Finale about to kick into overdrive, Jack decides to clear the air and reveal the truth behind his escape from the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Fortune Cup Finale, Part 2
programme.desc: With the finish line of the Fortune Cup fast approaching, Yusei and Jack find themselves on a collision course with destiny as they race to unlock the mystery behind the Crimson Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: A Web of Deceit, Part 1
programme.desc: After defeating Jack to win the Fortune Cup Finale, Yusei is challenged to a Shadow Duel by an underground duelist whose mind has been taken over by the Dark Signers.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: A Web of Deceit, Part 2
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and his robed rival rages on, Yusei must rely on his deck if he plans to survive this Shadow Duel and uncover the truth behind the Dark Signers sinister scheme to destroy the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Good Cop, Bad Cop
programme.desc: After agreeing to help Yusei meet with Director Goodwin, Officer Trudge unknowingly becomes one of the Dark Signers' drones and challenges a wounded Jack Atlas to a Shadow Duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Hoping to gain Yusei's trust, Director Goodwin decides to share with him the secrets behind the origin of the Satellite Sector and the ongoing war between Signer and Dark Signer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Reunion Duel
programme.desc: After returning to the Satellite Sector, Yusei meets up with his old friend Crow and soon finds himself in a tag team Turbo Duel with Sector Security.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Dark Signs, Part 1
programme.desc: Yusei and Crow set off to confront the Dark Signers in an effort to stop them from destroying the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Dark Signs, Part 2
programme.desc: In an effort to save the Satellite Sector from being destroyed, Yusei agrees to face off against a former friend turned Dark Signer in a Shadow Duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Dark Signs, Part 3
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Yusei confronts his former friend Kalin about their past in an effort to stop him from awakening the Army of Shadows.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Dark Signs, Part 4
programme.desc: The safety of the world hangs in the balance as Yusei tries to figure out a way to outduel and outmaneuver the unstoppable power of Kalin's dark deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Supersensory Shakedown
programme.desc: Leo is forced to take part in an extrasensory examination with the leader of the Arcadia Movement. Can Leo pass this pop quiz, or will this psychic showdown with Sayer leave Leo locked up forever?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Digging Deeper, Part 1
programme.desc: With Lazar's creepy clowns about to crack Crow's defense, Crow hatches a plan to lull his opponent into a false sense of security so that his feathered friends can swoop in and swipe the last of Lazar's life points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Digging Deeper, Part 2
programme.desc: Yusei gets caught up in a web of lies after agreeing to square off against Roman, the leader of the Dark Signers.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Digging Deeper, Part 3
programme.desc: With the safety of his friends literally hanging in the balance, Yusei must figure out a way to squash Roman's Earthbound Immortal before it sends him and his pals to the Netherworld forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Clash of the Dragons, Part 1
programme.desc: Luna gears up to face Devack in a Shadow Duel, but before the first card can be thrown, Luna is transported back to the Spirit World, leaving her pint-sized brother Leo the tall task of taking down this Dark Signer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Clash of the Dragons, Part 2
programme.desc: As Luna searches the Spirit World for a way to free Ancient Fairy Dragon from her stone prison, Leo searches his deck for a card combo that will help him defeat Devack and his army of apes.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Signs of Time
programme.desc: Luna and her new found friend Torunka hatch a plan to free Regulus from King Zeman's minus curse. Meanwhile, back in the Satellite Sector, Leo calls upon his Power Tool Dragon to help him dismantle Devack's dark deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Surely, You Jest, Part 1
programme.desc: When Luna's plan to free Ancient Fairy Dragon falls apart, Regulus must come to her rescue in order to save her and the Spirit World from Zeman's minus curse.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Surely, You Jest, Part 2
programme.desc: Carly sets out hoping to uncover the mystery behind the Crimson Dragon, but after digging up some damaging dirt on the Arcadia Movement, she soon finds herself squaring off in a psychic duel with Sayer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Mark of the Spider, Part 1
programme.desc: Sayer signs up for a Shadow Duel against a Dark Signer who's out for revenge while Akiza agrees to battle a dark and sinister supermodel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Mark of the Spider, Part 2
programme.desc: As the Dark Signer double duel draws to a climactic close, Carly and Misty unfold a catastrophic card combo that could send Akiza and Sayer to the Netherworld forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Mark of the Monkey, Part 1
programme.desc: After Akiza falls into a state of unconsciousness, her father turns to Yusei in a last ditch effort to wake his beloved daughter from her catatonic condition.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Mark of the Monkey, Part 2
programme.desc: As the battle between Signers presses on, Yusei turns to his trusty Stardust Dragon in an effort to keep the power of Akiza's Black Rose Dragon at bay.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Mark of the Monkey, Part 3
programme.desc: With Yusei, Jack, Akiza and Luna all gathered together, Director Goodwin seizes the moment and decides to shed some light on the dark and formidable foes the four Signers will soon be battling.

channel.desc: Giant monsters! Powerful magic! And ancient Egyptian legends! The Yu-Gi-Oh! Channel is your destination for action-packed adventure series that hold all the cards. It’s your move!

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: In this down-to-earth dramedy, a widowed advice columnist and single father (Steve Carell) falls in love with a French beauty (Juliette Binoche) only to discover she is dating his brother.

programme.title: Benjamin
programme.desc: A family calls in an intervention for Benjamin, a kid who they think is under the influence. Soon, it becomes clear that those who are confronting Benjamin's problems are much more dysfunctional than he is.

programme.title: But I'm a Cheerleader: But I'm a Cheerleader
programme.desc: A cheerleading-obsessed teenager is sent to a strict summer camp when her parents suspect her of being a lesbian.

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page are a brilliant mother and daughter con team who have their gift down to a fine art.

programme.title: Mighty Aphrodite

programme.title: Employee of the Month

programme.title: Keep The Aspidistra Flying
programme.desc: When successful advertiser, Gordon Comstock (Richard E. Grant), abruptly walks away from his career to pursue his dream of being a poet, his path is much more difficult than expected and soon financial problems begin to pile up.

programme.title: Cup of Love

programme.title: Gloves Off
programme.desc: Following his boxing trainer’s sudden death during his championship fight, Doug has inherited a crumbling debt-ridden gym, packed full of a mixed bag of crazy would-be pugilists.

programme.title: Joy & Hope
programme.desc: Joy and Hope run Two Sisters Ranch upstate New York. When a handsome stranger comes to town to find inspiration to get over writer's block, he learns how special Christmas on the ranch really is.

programme.title: Life With Music
programme.desc: In this life affirming story of hope, struggling pianist finds inspiration with a free-spirited music critic.

programme.title: Wedding Bells
programme.desc: When her best friend Amy has her wedding put in jeopardy, Molly decides to help in any way she can. Unfortunately, this means working together with Nick, the groom's best man and head chef of the hottest new restaurant in New York.

programme.title: Bridal Boot Camp
programme.desc: Andy Phillips is preparing for her upcoming wedding with her fiancé, Jordan. However, after chatting with her best friend, Andy starts to question if she has what it takes to make a strong a lasting marriage.

programme.title: Bride To Be
programme.desc: What if pain was merely a set up for the ultimate surprise party? Genie Burns, owner of Surprise Enterprise, masterminds surprise parties in nobody would-suspect-it locations. Here she takes crazy risks but in her love life, she plays it safe.

programme.title: Meet My Valentine
programme.desc: Diagnosed with terminal cancer, Tom reconnects with his wife Valentine to create an online dating profile to secretly find her a replacement husband.

programme.title: Radio Rebel
programme.desc: Tara Adams is just an ordinary high school junior, except for one little thing. Tara has a secret identity-she's Radio Rebel, the most popular radio DJ in Seattle.

programme.title: Back To Love
programme.desc: A young widow returns home for the first time in three years to help prepare her sister's wedding. She is forced to confront her past, including the man she never expected to fall for.

channel.desc: Celebrate love with Pluto TV Romance, with wall to wall Rom Com's, tear jerkers, and epic love stories which will make you laugh, cry and feel all fuzzy inside.

programme.desc: Bex and Sean delve deep into a building that has survived world wars and is home to some very social ghosts. They come face to face with an angry spirit too, and something strange appears to be lurking in the basement.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: Blackpool is iconic for ghosts and tonight, Sean and Bex investigate a horror attraction which appears to have attracted some very real spirits that are spooking its customers.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: Could a tattoo studio be haunted? Has a Ouija board opened a gateway to the spirit dimension? Ghost Dimension spend the night investigating Deviant Ink tattoo studio.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Hotel of Horror
programme.desc: Ghost Dimension heads to Halewood and investigates the Wellington Hotel, believed to be a hive of paranormal activity. Will they uncover what is haunting this public house?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Who is There?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Man with a Cane
programme.desc: The team head to Bolton and investigate the Old Three Crowns. Haunted by the spirit of a very angry man with a deadly cane and an upset, young, ghostly girl, will they uncover why the girl is so upset? And could they encounter the angry spirit man?

programme.title: Jabberwocky
programme.desc: A young peasant, with no interest in adventure or fortune, is mistaken as the kingdom's only hope when a horrible monster threatens the countryside.

programme.title: Blood Orgy of the She-Devils
programme.desc: Lorraine and Mark enter the world of witchcraft where Mara foretells the future and helps them remember their past lives.

programme.title: Christiane F.
programme.desc: A teen girl in 1970's Berlin becomes addicted to heroin. Everything in her life slowly begins to distort and disappear as she befriends a small crew of junkies and falls in love with a drug-abusing male prostitute.

programme.title: The Centerfold Girls
programme.desc: A depraved religious fanatic sets out to punish all the "immoral" women who have posed for the center-fold of a men's magazine.

programme.title: Inseminoid
programme.desc: Cult horror director Norman J Warren helms this once-banned sci-fi nasty about a space archaeologist who goes missing, only to return pregnant – but with what? Cue the gore!

programme.title: The Great St. Louis Bank Robbery
programme.desc: A gang's plans for a St. Louis bank robbery are complicated when the sister of one of the thieves starts voicing her well-founded suspicions.

programme.title: Biggles - Adventures in Time
programme.desc: Hurrah! DevilsMen, Ginger, Algy et al are back and raring to take another crack against the beastly Hun and their mysterious ally, in a spectacular battle that will stretch across time!

programme.title: The Final Countdown
programme.desc: A time warp takes the modern aircraft carrier USS Nimitz and its captain (Kirk Douglas) back to Pearl Harbor, Dec. 6, 1941, just hours before the Japanese air attack. Starring: Kirk Douglas, Martin Sheen, Katharine Ross

channel.desc: From the “so bad it’s good” to the “so weird it’s great,” Pluto TV Cult Films is like having your own personal drive-in movie theater playing the wildest, funniest, and most-beloved cult classics ever made.

programme.title: Hunter: City Under Siege - Part 1
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall track a pair of killers through a Los Angeles suburb where a crime wave and backlash vigilantism threaten to tear the community apart.

programme.title: Hunter: City Under Siege - Part 2
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall track a pair of killers through a Los Angeles suburb where a crime wave and backlash vigilantism threaten to tear the community apart.

programme.title: Hunter: City Under Siege - Part 3
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall track a pair of killers through a Los Angeles suburb where a crime wave and backlash vigilantism threaten to tear the community apart.

programme.title: Hunter: Me, Myself & Die
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall learn that a bizarre murder is a biochemist's effort to conceal the killing of a woman's husband in order to win her.

programme.title: Hunter: Informant
programme.desc: Hunter refuses to reveal an informant to a Grand Jury and is sent to jail, as a convicted murderer stalks the only witness against him -- Hunter's informant.

programme.title: Hunter: Bloodline
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall follow a trail of revenge and fraud while investigating the murder of a thoroughbred racehorse.

programme.title: Hunter: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: As Hunter and McCall investigate a string of jewelry store robberies, they pursue the thieves in an alley and McCall shoots a man who may be innocent.

programme.title: Hunter: Code 3
programme.desc: McCall can't believe that a doctor, a pregnant trauma specialist who once treated her, began drinking again and killed herself by driving off a cliff.

programme.title: Hunter: Ring of Honor
programme.desc: Sammy Davis, Jr. ("Ocean's 11") guest stars as a boxing trainer who helps McCall investigate a series of murders in the world of prize fighting.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate the murders of teenage prostitutes and the prime suspect is a sadistic killer who impersonates a cop.

programme.title: Hunter: Last Run
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall follow a string of torture murders to a money laundering ring and an undercover cop looking for his daughter.

programme.title: Hunter: The Return of Whitecloud
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate the murder of an art gallery owner involved in illegal sales of indigenous artifacts and find themselves drawn into the world of Native American politics.

programme.title: Hunter: On Air
programme.desc: Hunter becomes involved with a beautiful radio host when he goes undercover to catch a killer who threatens the men in her life.

programme.title: Hunter: Shillelagh
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall are assigned to protect the Irish patriot brother of Devane's new lady friend, but find the man is the assassin instead of the intended victim.

programme.title: Hunter: Investment in Death
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall pursue the killer of college student who was the brother of Hunter's old friend.

channel.desc: When Rick Hunter, a renegade cop who takes justice into his own hands, partners with the stunning and rebellious Sgt. McCall, they set out to crack down on L.A.'s slimiest criminals.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim takes the driving test again to see if the test really is getting harder or not.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny looks into budget convertibles, which go for even lower prices during the winter.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason race each other in monster trucks. Tim finds out if super diesel produces more horsepower than standard diesel. Vicki challenges 17-year-old Tom Cave to a bit of rally racing.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim puts a variety of car polishes to the extreme test to simulate a year of abuse.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim gives some advice on how to prevent car theft. Tom meets up for some mayhem in a Fiat Qubo with a touring Guns 'n' Roses tribute band.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason compete in a quad bike race; Vicki tests the new Alfa Romeo Mito.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny attempts to make a profit by buying a scrap car and selling its parts at an auto parts sale; Tiff goes behind the wheel of the Aston Martin DBS.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim reveals the best way for motorists to wash their cars; Jason pits three gold-medalist sailors against one another in a track race.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In the season finale, "Fifth Gear" visits the Firecracker Banger, an event where even rare classic cars get a glorious, fiery send-off.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: "Fifth Gear" newcomer Ben Collins attempts to drive a 700 bhp drag racing beast.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki visits the Paris motorshow; Jonny rides shotgun in Europe's fastest street car; Jason teaches Comedy Dave from Radio 1 how to drive like a hero.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato competes in the British Touring Car Championships; Tiff drives one of the fastest and rarest cars on the planet: the £1 million Pagani Zonda R.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny enters his very first track day event.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Formula 1 stars Johnny Herbert and Karun Chandhok join Tiff and Jason to rank two four-seater powerhouses; Ben Collins is challenged to compete in an autograss event.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny conducts a shocking crash test to find out whether you are safer in the front of a car or in the back.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny goes to Spain to drive a supercharged version of the fantastic Lotus Evora; Jason gets his hands on the most powerful Porsche 911 ever.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason gets to drive the new trek car from British specialists Westfield; guest presenter Robert Llewellyn drives an electric car from Japan.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason teaches rugby legend and TV personality Matt Dawson how to drift like a hooligan in a 500 horsepower Audi supercar.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: The 2010 "Fifth Gear" awards recognize winners in categories of Best Small Car, Best Family Car, Best Fast Car and Car of the Year.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 1
programme.desc: In this episode of Fifth Gear, Jonny Smith is in the Netherlands meeting the De Rooy race team who won the 2012 Dakar rally in their 900hp trucks.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 2
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Jason Plato hold a knock-out tournament to see if the 570hp Mercedes SLS AMG can beat its rivals from Aston Martin, Bentley and Jaguar. Jonny Smith meets Swedish rally legend Stig Blomquist for some ice driving lessons

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 3
programme.desc: Tiff Needell conducts a shocking crash test to show why everyone should make sure their next car has electronic stability control. Vicki Butler-Henderson is at an exclusive motor show in Monte Carlo, where she reveals the latest Pagani hypercar.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 4
programme.desc: Tiff Needell enters the opening round of the exclusive Lamborghini Super Trofeo race series – with advice from the man with every petrolhead's dream job – Lamborghini chief test driver Giorgio Sanna.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 5
programme.desc: Jason Plato is in Iceland being taught how to race a brutal Formula Off-Road buggy up a cliff of volcanic rock by a former champion. Tiff Needell is joined by former Le Mans winner Guy Smith to test a brand new version of Bentley's best selling car

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 6
programme.desc: Jason Plato is joined by ex-Ferrari F1 driver Mika Salon to pit the brand new £100,000 Mercedes C63 AMG Black Series against its key rival from BMW

channel.desc: Resident presenters and most knowledgeable drivers on TV, Tiff Needell, Vicki Butler-Henderson and Johnny Smith, provide the inside track on all things motoring.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Greed
programme.desc: Known as “black widows,” these women kill their spouses, lovers and children for profit. Murder for them becomes a business. Their trade is murder. Their profit? Blood money.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Sins of the Sister
programme.desc: A sisterly bond can mean a life full of friendship and sibling love. But for some women, having a sister means nothing more then having their own personal meal ticket, scapegoat and combatant. These types of relationships can lead to deadly outcomes.

programme.title: Deadly Women: A Daughter's Revenge
programme.desc: Every day, teenage girls are being scolded by their parents, only to respond with tears and slammed bedroom doors. Some daughters won’t take "no" for an answer, and these girls become deadly.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Deadly Delinquents
programme.desc: In the tormented mind of a young school girl, jealousy can turn to a murderous rage. These deadly girls turn on their own and kill their friends. This is the brutal world of deadly delinquents.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Baby-Faced Killers
programme.desc: These baby-faced girls may look childish and innocent, but behind their little girl smiles lies a darkness most adults never experience. When their inner turmoil bubbles to the surface, they become unlikely criminals.

programme.title: Deadly Women: An Inconvenient Marriage
programme.desc: Love is a powerful emotion; it can drive women to unthinkable crimes of passion. Hate however, is love's gloomy shadow, and it can drive women into the darkest corners of their mind.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Twisted Thrills
programme.desc: The intimate thoughts of a twisted mind would be enough to stun a community and horrify the world. But thoughts alone may not be enough to turn someone into a killer. This is a bizarre journey into the world of women who kill for twisted thrills.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Killer Kids
programme.desc: For many parents, their children's teen years can be one big headache. But when typical teenage rebellion turns into deadly rage, a parent's love may not be enough to save their life.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Match Made For Murder
programme.desc: When a woman wants more from her husband than he can give, marriage can be a dangerous union. For these deadly women, relationships mean nothing more than a match made for murder.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Baby-Faced Killers
programme.desc: These baby-faced girls may look childish and innocent, but behind their little girl smiles lies a darkness most adults never experience. When their inner turmoil bubbles to the surface, they become unlikely criminals.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Loathe Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: Neighbors can be a source of friendship and community comfort. But what happens when a neighbor stops watching out for you, and starts watching you. The sinister minds of these women begin to turn sour and they begin to torment their neighbors.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Obsession
programme.desc: Deciphering what causes minds to corkscrew out of control is the complex work of the criminal profiler. Obsessions can take many forms: beauty, devotion, ego and power.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: Behind their friendly smiles, deadly women hide histories of bloodshed and murder.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Blood ties are strong ties, sometimes strong enough to pull a person into a murderous conspiracy. When a family member wields his or her power, the result can be death.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Married to Murder
programme.desc: To the outside world, their marriages seemed happy. But behind closed doors, there was no domestic bliss. These women wanted out, but getting a divorce wasn’t their preferred option.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Judi Buenoano secretly murdered lovers to claim on insurance policies whilst nurse Genene Jones secretly killed at least 46 infants left in her care between 1980 and 1982.

channel.desc: Why do women kill? Deadly Women investigates true crime stories & reveals the horrific murders these women commit & the psyche behind their cold-blooded crimes, through revenge, fatal affairs, greed or just pure rage.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The C-11 Squad
programme.desc: New York City is not stranger to gang violence. But when a 12-year-old child was kidnapped, the gangs had crossed a line. Law enforcement raced to find the missing boy before it was too late.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Small Town Terror
programme.desc: In a small Ohio community, an elderly woman and a teenaged boy disappeared. Because they vanished within hours of each other, police believed the cases were linked. But they didn't know how.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Master Plan

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: In 1984, a tragic murder led agents into the frightening world of domestic terrorism. Law enforcement vowed to dismantle the violent faction that claimed responsibility.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Polly Klaas: Kidnapped

programme.title: The FBI Files: Human Prey

programme.title: The FBI Files: Evil Intent

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Business

programme.title: The FBI Files: Terror In Disguise

programme.title: The FBI Files: Killer Abroad

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Coffee Shop Murders

programme.desc: A Vancouver area nightclub owner disappears into thin air. Police believe he’s fled the city, traveling incognito under one of his many known aliases.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators: Penney Serra
programme.desc: Twenty-one year old Penney Serra was brutally murdered in a parking garage. The police thought it was an open and shut case – witnesses had seen a suspect flee.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators: Home After Dark

programme.title: Psychic Investigators: Damage Done

programme.title: Psychic Investigators: Lawrence Mbroh
programme.desc: Lawrence Mbroh was in a dangerous business - he sold drugs. So when he disappears, his father Alfred is worried. Detective Pam Gray is investigating the case but can find no new leads.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators: Taken By Storm
programme.desc: In the icy waters of the Atlantic off the coast of Maine, a lobster boat fails to return from a day of setting traps. With no Mayday, no word from the crew, the Coast Guard knows it has to act fact.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators: Baton Rouge
programme.desc: A serial killer is loose in Baton Rouge, police believe they’re looking for a youngish white man driving a white pick up truck.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators: Decoy Dolly

programme.title: Psychic Investigators: Who Killed the Flower Girl

programme.title: Psychic Investigators: Till Death Do Us Part

programme.title: Psychic Investigators: Mark Green

programme.title: Stalked: Someone's Watching: Toxic Love
programme.desc: Robin is a friendly waitress who catches the eye of a handsome customer. But after they begin a relationship, his twisted need for control bubbles to the surface.

programme.title: Cold Blood: Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: A budding college football player’s 21st birthday ends in murder, with a bullet to the head so exact that Lexington Kentucky police think it looks like a hit. But who would want to kill Trent Digiuro?

programme.title: Cold Blood: On Her Own
programme.desc: Winston-Salem in 1982 is a city divided by race. And when a young white copy editor is raped and stabbed to death blocks from where she worked, the atmosphere is tense. Especially because eyewitnesses claim the killer is a black man in his twenties.

programme.title: Cold Blood: Framed
programme.desc: In Ada Oklahoma, 21-year-old Debbie Sue Carter is found raped, beaten, and strangled in her apartment. It’s a horrific scene; a belt around her neck, a bloody palm print by her bed, cryptic notes scrawled in ketchup, and nail polish on the walls.

programme.title: Cold Blood: Lost Boy: The Adam Walsh Story
programme.sub-title: Lost Boy: The Adam Walsh Story
programme.desc: In one of the most notorious missing children cases, Adam Walsh, 6, steps into a stranger's car and disappears. A manhunt is launched but Adam's severed head is found two weeks later. More than a quarter of century passes before the mystery is solved.

programme.title: Cold Blood: Jessica Carpenter
programme.desc: Aiken, South Carolina, is a tiny peaceful town where nothing much happens. Until Jessica Carpenter, 17, is found raped and murdered in her living room. The neighborhood goes on high alert while police swing into action to catch her killer.

programme.title: Cold Blood: The Day the Music Died
programme.desc: Austin is famous for its music scene and party spirit--until a single mother is savagely beaten in her sleep. With no leads, and a culture that distrust authority, 21 years pass before investigators get a stunning phone call that turns the case red-hot.

programme.title: Cold Blood: The Rolex Murder
programme.desc: Miami's Coconut Grove rarely sees trouble. Until José Calvo, a family man, is shot in the head and robbed of his Rolex watch. What appears to be a random cash grab turns into a sinister mystery. Is this a robbery gone bad or a murder for hire?

programme.title: Cold Blood: Not Again
programme.desc: On June 10, 1997, Carla Larson, 30, drives off her construction site to get some lunch and never comes back. Two days later, the all-American wife and mother is discovered naked, badly decomposed, raped, and strangled to death in a Florida swamp.

programme.title: Dark Waters of Crime: Mother's Intuition
programme.desc: 14-year-old Pamela Bischoff misses her curfew on April 12, 1991. Though she has only been missing a few hours, her mother, Gail, tells the Oromocto RCMP she is certain Pamela has been raped and murdered by an older boy named Billy Stillman.

programme.title: Dark Waters of Crime: In Cold Blood
programme.desc: On August 4th, 2008, kayakers found a 40-year-old homeless man, Mark Hanley, floating near the marina in Nanaimo, British Columbia. He had been severely beaten and stabbed.

programme.title: Dark Waters of Crime: Incorrible
programme.desc: The story of a young girl savagely beaten by a group of teenagers and later found dead in a river leads to a troubling inquiry whereby water causes several complications as well as the solution to the case.

programme.title: Dark Waters of Crime: The Abbotsford Killer
programme.desc: Two girls are attacked by a man armed with a baseball bat. One of them manages to escape but the second one is found in a salmon river. The killer nags the police for months until he leaves behind a telling clue.

programme.title: Dark Waters of Crime: Hell's Gate
programme.desc: On June 17, 1994, a tugboat operator is towing a log boom down the Fraser River from Port Coquitlam when he notices something caught up on one of the logs. Upon closer inspection, he discovers a human body.

programme.title: Dark Waters of Crime: The Lady Killer
programme.desc: Investigators find the parallels between the two cases troubling: two young, isolated and vulnerable Guyanese women, two deaths in strange circumstances, two life insurance policies. Will Mohammed Khan escape justice again?

channel.desc: From true-crime factual series to binge-worthy procedurals, this channel will bring together everything that makes crime so fascinating to viewers.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: El Niño
programme.desc: It is estimated that between 1997 and 1998, “El Niño” took the lives of 24,000 people and created a startling $34 billion (US) in economic damages worldwide. In this episode we explain what “El Niño” is.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Hurricanes
programme.desc: With a combination of torrential rain, powerful winds, and devastating storm surges, Hurricanes are among Mother Nature’s most calamitous natural disasters.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Floods
programme.desc: Water may seem harmless, but in enormous quantities, it can be an astonishingly destructive force. Apart from famine, floods have resulted in more deaths worldwide than any other natural disaster.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Pandemics
programme.desc: With an ever more mobile world population, potentially growing in size to 11 billion people by the next century, public health experts agree that the possibility of a cataclysmic disease is more likely now than ever before.

programme.title: Naked Science: Death Of The Earth
programme.desc: The earth is 4.5 billion years old and it is slowly dying. Tectonic activity is slowly cooling the planet – the continents will eventually move together to form a new supercontinent called Pangea Ultima.

programme.title: Naked Science: Atmosphere
programme.desc: We breathe it every day, it protects us from solar radiation, controls our weather – it’s the atmosphere. Naked Science takes a trip from the earth to near space to understand how the earth’s atmosphere affects all life on the planet.

programme.title: Naked Science: Super Flares - Could They Cause Mass Extinction?
programme.sub-title: Super Flares - Could They Cause Mass Extinction?
programme.desc: Superflares are amongst the greatest events of the Universe. These magnetic explosions can release energy millions of times greater than atomic bombs. They produce streams of highly energetic particles which can be highly destructive to life.

programme.title: Naked Science: How To Avert an Asteroid Impact
programme.sub-title: How To Avert an Asteroid Impact
programme.desc: Throughout history, the earth has been bombarded from space. Asteroid impacts have caused mass extinctions – including the dinosaur wipe out.

programme.title: Naked Science: Anatomy Of A Hurricane
programme.desc: Hurricanes are one of the most destructive weather events to strike our planet and have the same power as a nuclear weapon.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Famine
programme.desc: Every continent on Earth has experienced this terrifying phenomenon at some point in its history. It’s ravaged the world for centuries, as crop infestation, drought, flooding and disease have killed thousands.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Heatwaves
programme.desc: Temperatures in places like Saudi Arabia routinely exceed 40 degrees Celsius with very little effect on the population. However, when the same extreme heat struck the people of Russia in 2010, it killed an estimated 56,000 people.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Blizzards
programme.desc: With ice, freezing temperatures, and ferocious winds — the Blizzard is one of Mother Nature’s most effective killing machines. They are typically associated with heavy snow, but may even occur when there is little or no snowfall.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Wildfires
programme.desc: With flames roaring to heights of 50 meters or more and temperatures exceeding 1,200°C, the wildfire is one of Mother Nature’s most horrific killers. Wildfires show no signs of stopping and their inexorability on this planet is truly terrifying.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Avalanches
programme.desc: We tend to think of disasters as inevitable - but often Mother Nature gives us vital clues which we foolishly ignore or overlook. This episode will take a close look at avalanches and what we can learn about how, where, and why they strike.

programme.title: Naked Science: Magnetic Earth
programme.desc: The Earth hurtles through space protected by an invisible force field, known as a magnetosphere.

channel.desc: From the depths of the ocean to the distant cosmos, be inspired by crazy experiments, unbelievable science facts, and talks from famous scientists on Pluto TV Science.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Military Justice
programme.desc: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service uses forensic science to solve three perplexing murders and fulfill their motto: To the living we owe respect; to the dead, we owe the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Bloodlust
programme.desc: For homicide investigators, it's a race against time as they track their deadliest foe: a serial killer for whom killing is the only way to feel alive.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Lies and deceit can often throw investigators off the trail of justice. But when hard evidence contradicts a killer's story, police must use the clues to piece together the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Murderous Attraction
programme.desc: In Columbus, Ohio, a woman is found shot in the head. The death is ruled a suicide, but something is not right and detectives refuse to let the matter rest.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Lethal Encounter
programme.desc: In most homicides, police rely on motive to pursue a murderer. But when the killer is a stranger the crime may go unsolved for years. It takes a full arsenal of forensic techniques to trace a lethal encounter.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Flames Of Justice
programme.desc: Arson fires are set for their own sake, or to cover a different crime, such as murder. Think fire consumes all vital clues? Think again. Arson investigators can glean important clues from scorched rubble and ignite the unquenchable flames of justice.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Camera Clues
programme.desc: Forensic Photography: Forensic photographers are among the first people at a crime scene, capturing vital clues on film. What do the cameras capture that can't be seen first-hand, and who are the men and women who analyze the camera's clues?

programme.title: The New Detectives: Drawing Conclusions
programme.desc: A teenager is abducted on a shopping trip. Two hikers disappear from the Appalachian Trail.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Predators And Parasites
programme.desc: For the forensic entomologist, the insects that nest in dead bodies are like tiny witnesses to a crime.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Stolen Identity
programme.desc: When a theft is committed, something valuable is stolen. But when a criminal needs a new identity, theft becomes a matter of life and death.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Face Of Tragedy
programme.desc: Forensic Sculpting: Forensic sculptors retrieve people from oblivion. Using clay and an intricate knowledge of anatomy, forensic arts place a face on an unidentified skull, recreating the victim's likeness, which often leads to his name.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Military Justice
programme.desc: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service uses forensic science to solve three perplexing murders and fulfill their motto: To the living we owe respect; to the dead, we owe the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Written In Bone
programme.desc: At the scene of a murder, sometimes the victim provides the only clues to their killer. Forensic anthropologists use skeletal remains to decipher the clues written in the bones.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Medical Examiners's Casebook
programme.desc: Some killers choose to hide their victims. And investigators must then rely on forensic examiners to uncover proof of murder. These are just two extraordinary crimes that have made their way into the medical examiner's casebook.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Deadly intentions
programme.desc: When abduction turns to murder, forensic science is the only key to finding justice for the victims of a kidnapper's deadly intentions.

channel.desc: THE NEW DETECTIVES profiles the work of world-renowned forensics experts and criminal investigators and the techniques they use to solve murders and other crimes.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: In this episode of Sensing Murder we learn about the murder of Angela Blackmoore, a 21 year old woman with a 2 year old child. The child was not harmed and the killer has not been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of “ Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to unmask the killer – or killers – of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydney’s downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Long Way Home
programme.desc: 25-year-old Te Puke woman Judy Yorke was a devoted single mum who adored her kids. When she missed her daughter’s fourth birthday party, her family knew something was terribly wrong and reported her missing.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Lie of the Land
programme.desc: Sue Nicholson and Deb Webber investigate one of the most complex and intriguing cases ever featured - did Waikato man Jason Dark commit suicide or was he murdered, as his family believes?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Now You See Me
programme.desc: 26-year-old deaf woman Alexa Cullen vanished from her home in Manaia, on the Coromandel Peninsular in 1995. She had a history of hitch-hiking and police suspected she’d run away. But three years later, ominous rumors began circulating in the community.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Vanishing Point
programme.desc: In 2003, 32-year-old mother of three Sara Neithe vanished from the Hauraki Plains. Neither Sara nor her car have been seen since. Police suspect that Sara has been murdered but without a crime scene, they have been unable to advance the case.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Last Orders
programme.desc: In 1993, devoted father Kevin O'Loughlin came face to face with the dark side of sunny Nelson when he was brutally stabbed to death after a night out on the town.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Blood Money
programme.desc: Psychics Kelvin Cruickshank (NZ) and Deb Webber (Aus) investigate the unsolved murder of Lower Hutt pensioner 91 year old George Engelbrecht. In 1979, a burglar broke into George's home and beat the old man to death in his bed.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: In this episode of Sensing Murder we learn about the murder of Angela Blackmoore, a 21 year old woman with a 2 year old child. The child was not harmed and the killer has not been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: When The Trail Goes Cold
programme.desc: This episodes involves the disappearance of 62-year-old Kaye Stewart, a woman who went missing while on a short walk on June 13th, 2005.

channel.desc: Sensing Murder, a documentary drama series for real unsolved murder. In this series, psychic detectives are challenged to put their powers to the test, delving into the lives of deceased victims and uncover secrets that surround their tragic deaths.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.sub-title: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.desc: The horrific story of killers Allan Baker and Kevin Crump who began their murderous spree in rural NSW by killing a complete stranger for $20, a packet of cigarettes and a couple of litres of petrol.

programme.sub-title: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Kimberley Killer
programme.desc: Seven years after the disappearance of baby Azaria Chamberlain at Ayers rock, long before the murder of Peter Falconio on a remote stretch of highway in the Australian outback and two years before Ivan Milat begins his reign of backpacker murders.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Assassination of John Newman
programme.desc: John Paul Newman was a member of the New South Wales state parliament and a member of the seat of Cabramatta.
