programme.desc: On a September night in 1986, two police officers climbed through a barbed-wire fence beside the F4 freeway at Minchinbury in Sydney’s west.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Body in the Sports Bag
programme.sub-title: The Body in the Sports Bag
programme.desc: A young Sydney man was found guilty of strangling his ex-girlfriend and stuffing the teenager's body in a cricket bag.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Mystery of the Homestead Murders
programme.desc: The quick mind of a country telephone exchange supervisor led to a horrific discovery at a NSW country homestead in 1978.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Murder of Innocence: Sian Kingi
programme.desc: On 27 November 1987, 12-year-old Noosa school girl Sian Kingi was grabbed off her push bike by Valmae Fay Beck and Barrie John Watts as she rode home from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Date With a Serial Killer: Rodney Cameron
programme.sub-title: Date With a Serial Killer: Rodney Cameron
programme.desc: Rodney Francis Cameron was dubbed ‘The Lonely Hearts Killer’ after he used a radio match-making program in 1990 to lure an unsuspecting woman to her death. Incredibly, he had only just been released from prison for two other killings in 1974.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Cop Killer: The Winchester Assassination
programme.desc: The highest ranking police officer in Australia to be murdered, Assistant Federal Police Commissioner Colin Winchester was shot twice in the head at point blank range as he was getting out of his car outside his Deakin home on 10 January 1989.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Predator: Leonard John Fraser
programme.desc: Serial killer Leonard Fraser was suspected of killing at least five women over a 17 year period but took the complete truth about his life of crime to his grave.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.sub-title: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.desc: In 1981, the headless and fingerless body of 19-year-old Kim Narelle Barry was found dumped in the bush at a mountain lookout near Wollongong, south of Sydney.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.sub-title: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.desc: A chilling investigation of John Ernest Cribb, who on August 11, 1978 broke into the home of the Connell's. On a winter’s afternoon, Valda Connell and her four-year-old son Damien arrived home after having collected ten-year-old Sally from school.

channel.desc: Crime Investigation Australia, the ultimate destination for true crime, uncovers its country’s most horrific crimes that shocked the nation. Watch chilling re-enactments & interviews and witness how police & forensic investigators solve the case.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole reminisce about their month in Altus, make amends, and say goodbye to the people they’ve come to know before returning to Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Leeza Gibbons hosts a look back at Paris’ and Nicole’s stay in Altus, Arkansas, as the girls reunite with the Leding family in front of a studio audience.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole depart from Miami Beach toward their first destination, the Batten Family Ranch.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole get jobs at Weeki Wachee Springs in Florida and play a surprising game of hide-and-seek with their boss's daughter.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole work as maids at the Caliente Nudist Colony and learn the meaning of the word "termination."

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: While staying with a host family, Nicole butts heads with their oldest son and decides to give him a taste of his own medicine.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: In the swamplands of Louisiana, Paris and Nicole meet their next host family and make a big impression after taking their daughter on a shopping spree; the women get jobs trapping crawfish.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: A stop in Texas brings Paris and Nicole to their new host family; the women convince the Lutz-Carillos boys to sneak out with them to go tanning.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole adjust to a rule against profanity in the household of their new hosts, devout members of a gospel choir; the pair get jobs with a minor league baseball team.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: The cross-country journey takes Paris and Nicole to Texas, where they try to help the host family's teenage son with his homework and take jobs at a local hair salon.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stop at a ranch in Texas, where they give the father tips on being romantic with his wife; the pair get jobs at the local sheriff's station but their wild antics do not impress the boss.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole work on a cattle drive in Texas but take matters into their own hands when they discover the herd is going to the slaughter.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.sub-title: The Stuffs We Weren't Allowed to Show You
programme.desc: Never-before-aired footage augments commentary by families and employers who hosted Paris and Nicole.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: After once again giving up their lives of luxury, Paris and Nicole take a bus to stay with their first host family and prepare for their first internship as car mechanics.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: The girls move on to Staten Island, where they live with an Italian-American family and do an internship at an advertising agency, where they clash with their straitlaced supervisor.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole arrive in Pennsylvania, where they stay with a family whose cat injures Nicole's dog, while their internship involves working at an airport.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole reach New Jersey, where they attempt to help their host family quit smoking and become spooked by their internship at a funeral home.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Back in Pennsylvania, Paris and Nicole must cope with a plastic surgery internship which is less than glamorous, and bond with their fun loving host family.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole's next stop is Baltimore, Maryland, where they work at a local news station and try to fulfill the rock dreams of their host family's eldest son.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stop in Delaware, where they help their new host family with a space problem, while their internship is at a lively daycare center.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole continue their travels through Maryland, living with a host family who Paris offers to cook for, and working at a bakery.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: As their latest internship with a psychic is only a short distance away, Paris and Nicole remain at the Foot family home, where they attempt to match make.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Back in New Jersey, Paris and Nicole work at an elderly living center, where they give the seniors a day to remember, before teaching their host family about the cruelty of hunting.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stay with a mother and son in Miami whose unusual pets prove useful for their ad agency internship, which involves creating a campaign for a new breakfast sandwich.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Havoc ensues when Paris and Nicole begin an internship with the Atlantic City Fire Department, while they task themselves with finding the daughter of their host family a new friend.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: The girls intern at a manufacturing firm where their work proves dull, however they manage to have fun with their host family.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stay with a family in Tennessee, where they play matchmakers once more, while their internship is with a wedding planner.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Before they leave for New York, Paris and Nicole stay with the family of a former beauty queen, who convinces Paris to take part in a pageant, while their internship is at a dentist's office.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole take the place of a stay-at-home mom who has a young daughter, and also happens to be nine months pregnant!

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole trade in their designer dresses for traditional Pakistani attire when they take over the responsibilities of a Pakistani housewife.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole fill in for a housewife who feels her marriage is lacking a spark.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole spend the day tending to the needs and whims of four rambunctious kids.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole plan competing weddings for a lesbian couple.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole must take care of a toddler, as well as throw a party for his second birthday.

channel.desc: The challenge, whether surviving 30 days with a family on a farm, accepting various internships or travelling across country by bus, it’s no phones, no credit cards, no money. Paris Hilton & Nicole Richie give everything up for “The Simple Life.”

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The underbelly of this great house is a sharp contrast to its upper grandeur. Some members of the team are forced to run while other are lost in the labyrinth of tunnels and passageways pursued by something unnatural.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oakwell House
programme.desc: The team investigate Oakwell House near Leeds, which was built by ancestors of Fred Batt. In 1684, William Batt returned unexpectedly from a trip to London but vanished leaving a bloody footprint. A demon dog has been seen in the grounds.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Knottingley Town Hall
programme.desc: This location is said to be overflowing with paranormal activity, which doesn’t disappoint.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Capesthorne Hall
programme.desc: The beauty of this magnificent Cheshire country house hides the horror that lies in its corridors. As well a poltergeist activity the team manage to catch some of their best evidence to date and even our sceptic hears noises.

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT1
programme.desc: 30 East Drive is said to house the most violent poltergeist in the world. The team go head first into what becomes their toughest challenge yet. As soon as they enter the property something is waiting and wants to be known.

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT2
programme.desc: The team continue their most threatening investigation yet and for some they will be scared for life mentally and physically. The most violent poltergeist in the world is ready for a fight...but who wins?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Thackray Museum
programme.desc: The medical museum houses a great many objects from its distant hospital and workhouse past with a complete Victorian street scene on the lower level.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Armley Mills
programme.desc: Once the centre of industry Armley Mills is now a museum that is said to house the phantoms of many a lost soul. From children who were caught in the machinery to a bad tempered floorwalker who doesn’t like people in his mill.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Carr House
programme.desc: Part of a once splendorous manor and a history that goes back as far as Robin Hood, Carr House is the sight of many a paranormal occurrence.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Hill House_PT1
programme.desc: What was once a private home before becoming a sanctuary for the elderly, the abandoned Hill House is now an eerie shadow of its former glory, that houses empty rooms, strange noises and a plethora of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Hill House_PT2
programme.desc: Part one saw the team seemingly getting stalked by something, and in this part it shows its hand.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Village Church Farm
programme.desc: A museum like no other, this small collection of antiquated buildings is said to be the home of several spirits. The team get more than they bargained for as objects move; strange noises are caught on camera and the best EVP response to date.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Chillingham Castle
programme.desc: Karl & Stuart take on one of the Most Haunted rooms in this ancient castle. Whatever is there, seems desperate to make itself known.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Leeds Town Hall
programme.desc: Karl ventures alone into the underneath Leeds Town Hall into the dark prison cells that is said to be haunted by a plethora of unhappy spirits, one doesn’t seem happy that Karl is there.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Hodroyd Hall
programme.desc: Karl & Stu investigate the attic of Hodroyd Hall, and soon become witness to the many strange occurances. What or who is trying to make contact?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Champness Hall
programme.desc: Yvette, Karl & Stuart investigate the pride of Rochdale, Champness Hall. With loud footsteps and strange noises, the team seem to be followed by a persistent spirit.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P1
programme.desc: There are many ghost said to haunt Gloucester Prison, from the passive to the most aggressive and as Stuart enters the segregation block he soon fears for his life.

channel.desc: Pluto TV goes beyond the normal range of human experience in a 24/7 channel dedicated to all things Paranormal.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.sub-title: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Comeback Kid
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dead of Night
programme.desc: Dog's good friend and fellow bondsman Chris is running out of time. He has only days to find his fugitive or risk losing his business. In his hunt Dog confronts duplicitous tipsters, vicious attack dogs, and hostile neighbors.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Best of . . .
programme.desc: The bounty-hunter adventures of Duane "Dog" Chapman and his Posse are chronicled in this one hour "Best Of" special, featuring superlative memorable moments from the previous seven seasons.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 1
programme.desc: Dog launches a high stake hunt through the desolate and dangerous mountain landscape of western Colorado in pursuit of a gun-loving survivalist with a million dollar bond on his head. Will Dog's plan of using brains over brawn work?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 2
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 2
programme.desc: Once in Montrose, Dog discovers that the million dollar fugitive is not the young bondsman's only problem. Dog and Beth make it their mission to both clean up the mess and teach him the fundamentals of bondsmanship.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: Round the Clock
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: Round the Clock
programme.desc: Dog is committed to saving his new friend's bail bonding business, and now must race against time to bring a rogues gallery to justice in the High Sierra mountain town of Montrose, CO.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: And Then There Were None
programme.sub-title: The Montrose Files: And Then There Were None
programme.desc: With four outlaws still on the lam, Dog sets out to bring 'em in. As day turns into night and with the darkness and the danger mounting, an undaunted Dog and team plan late night hits on the riskiest of locations--their targets' homes.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Oh Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: With a long record of violence and abuse and weighing in at over 200lbs, Dog's target for the day does not sound like a gentle giant. When the trail grows cold Dog turns up the heat on the fugitive's brother and sister.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: And Baby Makes Three
programme.desc: Leland has to attend a Lamaze class before he can join the hunt--another Chapman is on the way! But when Dog starts to go after this accused jewelry thief without his fastest son, he learns that this fugitive puts the "R" in runner.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Tender Trap
programme.desc: When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in. The trap includes a suggestive phone call, a motel rendezvous, and a crew of bounty hunters waiting in the next room ready to break up the party!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Greed is Good
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tears for Fears
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.

channel.desc: Go on the prowl with real-life bounty hunter Duane "Dog" Chapman, his wife Beth, and their family as they chase down fugitives in the Hawaiian islands. The hunt is on, and Dog always gets his man on this exclusive 24/7 channel.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.sub-title: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Decent Proposal
programme.desc: On a trip to New York, Jase's son Reed proposes to his girlfriend, which inspires his father to fan the flames of romance back home with Missy. Meanwhile, Sadie asks Willie to be a guest lecturer at her business class.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Father Knows Pest
programme.desc: The tables are turned when the HOA comes to Jase for help to rid the neighborhood of a menacing beaver. Little Will has just gotten his learner's permit, and Willie and Si argue over which of them is the better driving instructor.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Wild Wild West Monroe
programme.desc: When Jase and Jep get into an argument over which of them is the rightful heir to their grandfather's old rifle, they decide to settle the argument with a marksmanship contest. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie help Rebecca prepare for her trip to Taiwan.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: There Will Be Flood
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids. Meanwhile, Jep, Si, Martin and Godwin try to protect the Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.

channel.desc: Duck Dynasty has its very own 24/7 channel! Expect plenty of outlandish behaviour, feuds, comedy & of course…ducks, all in this rags-to-riches reality series.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Coming Home
programme.desc: In Alberta, Beat is tasked with building one man’s dream home on the picturesque farmland where he grew up.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Traffic Jammin'
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah confront a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Repo Arigato, Mr. Roboto
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah confront a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Inane Clown Posse
programme.desc: Froy and Matt have to wrangle with some angry clowns when they try to repossess a bouncy castle. Meanwhile, Lou and Sonia lose patience with a debtor over a recycling truck.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Doggin' and Draggin'
programme.desc: When Carlos plays a repossession prank that almost lands Matt and Froy in jail, Lou tasks Froy with burying the hatchet.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Raising the Roof
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy deal with an unbalanced debtor who threatens to take down the entire company, while Matt and Ronnie take on children's book vendors who are up to no good.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Revenge
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take the opportunity to enact revenge on Ronnie and Carlos; a repo at a car wash gets out of hand; Lou's big mistake on a repo results in a debtor bringing the fight to their front door in a shootout.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Hunter
programme.desc: Reeling from the shootout, Lou tracks down one of the culprits and enacts an elaborate plot of revenge with the help of Froy and Carlos.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Barbeque!
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy repo a car from an anger management meeting, Froy suffers the consequences of taking on a violent rage-aholic.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Up in Flames
programme.desc: A jazz musician sets off Sonia and punches are thrown as Ronnie tries to manage the mayhem, and Matt and Sonia wrestle to bring deluded actors back to reality.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Games
programme.desc: When Rusty leads Sonia and Ronnie on a wild goose chase, Sonia loses her cool and puts her foot down with Lou.

programme.title: Operation Repo: T-Bone Trouble
programme.desc: The team's work with anger management starts to pay off - with disastrous consequences. Matt and Sonia get into a standoff with a wealthy divorcee, his daughter, and her raging boyfriend.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Flame-Thrown for a Loop
programme.desc: Lou struggles to pick up the pieces after the accident leaves him needing Sonia more than ever. Lou and Carlos deal with a big man in a tiny car, but when Carlos lets his guard down he's delivered some serious blows.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Probation Abomination
programme.desc: Sonia returns, but not before putting the team on probation and laying some ground rules.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Russian Roulette
programme.desc: Matt and Sonia take on an award-winning fencing coach, but all bets are off when his students go on the offensive with real swords.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Little Froy's Big Mistake
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take on a grungy fisherman, but when he isn't afraid to damage his own boat, Froy is the one who is sinking fast.

programme.title: Operation Repo: M.I.A. & D.E.A
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy go missing, Sonia is on a mission to figure out what they've got up their sleeves.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Suspicious Packages
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy repo a hummer from a bachelorette who is down to party, but when the cops arrive it's the repo team who is in for a shock.

programme.title: Operation Repo: First Class Clown
programme.desc: Matt and Froy are sent on a wild goose chase around LA for a mini-van, and when they find their debtor selling contraband out of the trunk Matt is further convinced that Lyndah has been scheming against him.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Junkyard Hog
programme.desc: After the loss of his lead hunting dog Jerry is ready to call off his hunting days for awhile while he trains a new dog. But Krystal and Robert are desperate to keep their fledgling business alive. Against Jerry's advice, Robert invests in new dogs.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Meet the Campbells
programme.desc: Lifelong Texan Jerry Campbell has been in the hog hunting game for over 50 years. His kids, Robert and Krystal, are hoping to turn Dad's lifestyle into a full-time family business helping landowners clear their property of destructive wild boars.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Man Down
programme.desc: The Campbells and their team of dogs tee off at a Texas golf course, where an aggressive hog is threatening golfers and tearing up $20,000 greens. But the hunt leaves Krystal and Robert concerned about Jerry's health and ability to keep hunting.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Life on the Line
programme.desc: The Campbells get a call from an elderly widow being terrorized by a massive 250 pound boar. At the job, the battle between Jerry's old ways and the kids' new methods turns the hunt into a family feud that descends into chaos.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Cage Match
programme.desc: The Campbells are faced with their biggest job yet: a 900-acre deer hunting ranch overrun with boars. Hoping to increase their hog hunting arsenal, Robert sinks more money into the family business by buying a hog trap.

programme.title: Ax Men: Logged and Loaded
programme.desc: The crews of Ax Men are back and the race for green gold is on! In Washington, Rygaard pushes deep into their roughest terrain yet in an effort to recapture the title.

programme.title: Ax Men: Falling Fast
programme.desc: It's only the second week into the logging season, but it seems like the teams could already use a break. In Alaska, the Papac team fights to find a replacement to fill the shoes of injured Coatsy.

programme.title: Ax Men: Failure to Communicate
programme.desc: It's week three, and the loggers are feeling the pressure to produce. In Alaska, Coatsy is still out of commission, so Papac institutes an extremely dangerous process called Shotgun Logging.

programme.title: Ax Men: The Swampman Cometh
programme.desc: Shelby the Swampman uses an airboat to search for a treasure trove of century old logs in a legendary lost canal. In Washington, Rygaard tries to haul out the biggest log on their site, a mammoth six-ton cypress.

channel.desc: From keeping law and order in Alaska to travelling some of the deadliest routes in the world, follow some extraordinary people as they take on the toughest jobs in the world, so you don’t have to. Pluto TV Tough Jobs - home of the extreme workday!

programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.desc: Selina is sleepless in Sarasota, lying awake in the night, calling her boyfriend Derrick to make sure he’s alone. He admits he sees other women, but doesn’t consider it cheating because he’s not having sex. How much longer can Selina play detective?

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Punisher
programme.desc: Shea says Jessica constantly punishes him due her history of cheating exes. She must know where Shea is every second forcing his friends to cut ties. Jessica has caught Shea lying to her in the past. Can Judge Lynn Toler get them on track?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Down in the DM
programme.desc: Clifford feels that Asia is always searching for things that aren’t there. Asia says she is done with Clifford and the way he uses social media to flirt and cheat with women. Can Judge Lynn Toler help put a stop to the arguing?

programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justice’s anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says he’s a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.desc: Michaela and Richard’s 30-year age difference has finally taken a toll on their relationship. Richard says he just wants to settle down and enjoy the rest of his life and says that Michaela’s constant nagging is making him rethink marrying her.

programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.desc: Rechene Hall and Itarous Parker have been together for over 4 years and are engaged, but Rechene doesn’t trust Itarous because of his lying. Itarous claims Rechene is too immature for a relationship. Is this couple headed down the break-up aisle?

programme.desc: Stephen says Kisha is crazy and can snap in a split second, especially with his mom. He claims she accuses him of cheating, but Kisha is the one bit obsessed with one of her exes still.

programme.desc: Nikkinba says Muriel is controlling and constantly breaking his phones. He wouldn't return Muriel's calls for days until he quit his job and said that he's leaving her to live in North Carolina. Can they settle down or will he buy a one-way ticket?

programme.desc: As soon as this couple got engaged their romance hit the rocks. Brandi says that Brittanie can’t tell the truth if her life depended on it. Brittanie says Brandi’s insecurities and lack of trust has had a severe effect on their relationship.

programme.desc: Madeline says Edward is more of a detective than a husband. Edward says anytime Madeline is upset, she takes it out by destroying property in the house. She has destroyed an entire apartment and he can’t take it anymore.

programme.desc: When the going got tough, Dermartess left his children and Rofiesha. Dermartess says Rofiesha forced him to leave 7 years ago. He still loves her and wants to see his children but believes she was too toxic. Can Judge Lynn Toler save this couple?

programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.desc: Lataisha says Chris smokes weed all day and can’t keep a job. Things seemed to be going fine until one day she walked downstairs in their home and realized that Chris moved out. Chris says he left because she is too aggressive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Forever My Lady
programme.desc: Despite their age gap, Tamara and Jasimine have been together for 10 years. Tamara claims Jasimine sends risque texts to other people. Jasimine claims Tamara explodes in fits of rage. Can this couple get over their age gap?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: What Women Want
programme.desc: La'Tanya is honest to Jonathan with her sexual attraction tp other women. The final straw was when her kids came home singing "Jonathan is a bad daddy" after returning from a relative's house. Will Lynn send them separate ways?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Coming to America
programme.desc: Keith claims he is married to two other women overseas and plans to bring them over! Paw'lla says Keith is a fake pastor who doesn't know what he's talking about! Keith says he has a master plan for all of these wives!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Firecracker
programme.desc: Gary claims Ebony's verbally abusive, acts like a dictator and is frustrated with her disrespectful comments. She loves Gary very much and claims to be a 'ride or die' girlfriend, but is over Gary's unmotivated, stuck in the mud ways.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Like a Virgin
programme.desc: Emily is 29 and a virgin. The pressure from her boyfriend Romeo to have sex is overwhelming. Their 20 year age difference may be part of the problem because she chats it up more with strangers than him. Can Judge Toler help them find common ground?

channel.desc: Divorced! Wronged! Hunted! On Judge Nosey, find the most intense real-life courtroom drama on TV with the likes of Divorce Court and Eye for An Eye, all here 24/7.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Viral Video Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne becomes a viral-video sensation after she's caught dancing on camera. Meanwhile, Marilyn serves up soul-food lessons to young Lindsey.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Michelle Obama Sweater Episode
programme.desc: Lindsey taps into her mother's credit card to order a sweater. Elsewhere, Kevin feigns being ill to score a coveted baseball jersey.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The No Nah Nah Episode
programme.desc: An exhausted Nick resists Suzanne's romantic advances, leading her to worry about the health of their relationship.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Get Together Episode
programme.desc: Nick recommends throwing a social event with family and friends in a bid to strengthen family ties, but his sloppy planning results in chaos.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Mr. Himdependent Episode
programme.desc: When Suzanne's ex-husband wants to lower his monthly child support payments, Nick jumps at the chance to get rid of Frank's financial support, while Suzanne has mixed feelings about Frank.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The We Ain't Going Out Like That Episode
programme.sub-title: The We Ain't Going Out Like That Episode
programme.desc: When Nick tries to be spontaneous, but Suzanne resists and instead plans a date night that fails, they attempt to be spontaneous together--until they realize it's better if she makes plan.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Oh No She Di-in't Episode
programme.sub-title: The Oh No She Di-in't Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne grows jealous of Nick's pretty young field producer. Elsewhere, Gigi falls for a man, who has children, so she enlists Kevin and Lindsey to help her better relate to kids.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Nick's Manny-Pedi Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne infiltrates Nick's night with the boys, so he retaliates by crashing her all-lady spa getaway.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Gold Party Episode
programme.desc: When Marilyn throws a gold party at Nick and Suzanne's, and Nick learns Suzanne's wedding ring isn't real, he sets out to have a real ring made before Suzanne learns the truth.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Boy Has Style Episode
programme.desc: When Suzanne suspects that Lindsey's athletic new crush from school is gay, Nick sets out to prove that he isn't.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Man and the Bragging Snafu Episode
programme.sub-title: The Man and the Bragging Snafu Episode
programme.desc: When Nick's colleague at the station encourages him to send Lindsey and Kevin to a private school, Nick and Suzanne look into it, only to be misled about the process.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Suzanne Theft Auto Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne becomes overly consumed with Kevin's science project. Elsewhere, Lindsey revs up for driving lessons, only to emerge as a suspect when her mother's car is scratched.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Despicable E Episode
programme.desc: Lindsey's romantic attentions turn to a young celebrity DJ, who only neglects her in return. Elsewhere, Suzanne teaches Kevin the art of doing laundry. Michael Strahan and Lil JJ guest star.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The She Got Game Night Episode
programme.sub-title: The She Got Game Night Episode
programme.desc: When the Kingston-Persons decide to have a game night, all bets are off, as unlikely friends are drawn to one another when paired together for games.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Valentine's Day Episode
programme.desc: Nick flops in his efforts to help Kevin with Valentine's Day at school.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Parent Teacher Trap Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne serves on a committee at Kevin's school, but complications arise when her fellow female members disrespect her---but adore Nick.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Whose Card Is It Anyway Episode
programme.sub-title: The Whose Card Is It Anyway Episode
programme.desc: When Nick misleads Suzanne about spending a gift card, the couple appear before a TV judge to sort out the truth.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Suzanne Gets One-Upped Episode
programme.desc: Nick plans a belated surprise honeymoon for Suzanne, but keeping it a secret causes complications. Elsewhere, Lindsey helps Kevin with his homework.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The First .45 Episode
programme.desc: As Lindsey films a reality show about her family, Kevin comes across a gun in Suzanne's handbag---leading to drama and potential danger. Ice Cube and Chubb Rock guest star.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Take Your Kids to Work Day Episode
programme.sub-title: The Take Your Kids to Work Day Episode
programme.desc: When Lindsey accompanies Suzanne to work and meets an old friend of her mother's, a misunderstanding causes Lindsey to believe she may have an older brother.

programme.desc: When Lindsey accompanies Suzanne to work and meets an old friend of her mother's, a misunderstanding causes Lindsey to believe she may have an older brother.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Fall of Troy Episode
programme.desc: When Troy provokes a bully at school, Kevin starts hanging out with the bully as a way to avoid getting beat up, until he learns to stand up for himself and Troy, his real friend.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Pole Dance Episode
programme.desc: When Suzanne catches Nick spying a racy rap video featuring a pole dancer, she sets out to show him her own pole-dancing prowess.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Disney Episode
programme.desc: The family departs for a trip to Walt Disney World, but a cell-phone snafu and a scheduling conflict jeopardize the vacation.

channel.desc: Kick back and enjoy the best of Black Hollywood through all your favorite urban series! Featuring reality shows and box office hit dramas, this channel is guaranteed to have everything you’ve been waiting for in one place.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned
programme.desc: Jason and his family can no longer do renovations of an abandoned Kansas church, especially after they found their father in the basement crying and frightened because of the menacing activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Good Vs. Evil
programme.desc: PRS visits a western Pennsylvania couple wracked by a torrent of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hell's Gate
programme.desc: Ever since Wes and his family moved into their new home in York, PA they've been struggling with a dark force that's made everyday a living hell. Wes feels his mental and physical health is in jeopardy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact
programme.desc: Washington State, a hotbed of unexplained paranormal activity. Between possible UFOs in the sky and winged creatures in the woods, Ryan and his team are forced to face their fears and deal with the question: Are we truly alone in the universe?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hide and Seek
programme.desc: Hillary and her nine-year-old son Hunter are being harassed by a shadow presence in their Victorian home in Newburgh, Indiana. Trap doors in the basement reveal artifacts from a bygone era, and the clients have recorded persistent strange noises.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Who Is the Lurking Man?
programme.desc: PRS travels to Newcastle, CA to investigate a house with paranormal forces so strong, the family has cleared out. Ryan believes the Native American land may hold the key to the mystery and leads the team in a fight to reclaim a scared family's house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil
programme.desc: Paula and her husband Mike are under siege by a purported shadow demon in their North Carolina home. Paula has witnessed a toddler bed levitating and heard deep growls. Michelle, Ryan and the team uncover the shocking truth behind the haunting.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Knickerbocker
programme.desc: PRS checks into the Knickerbocker Hotel in Linesville, Pennsylvania where the owners are reporting strange noises and the appearance of phantom children in some of the rooms.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Get Out of This House
programme.desc: When an aggressive spirit stalks a young family, PRS is called in to investigate. When it is determined that the source of the haunting may have been unknowingly invited in, Ryan races to identify and hopefully defeat the entity before it's too late.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hide and Seek
programme.desc: Hillary and her nine-year-old son Hunter are being harassed by a shadow presence in their Victorian home in Newburgh, Indiana. Trap doors in the basement reveal artifacts from a bygone era, and the clients have recorded persistent strange noises.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Return of the Dead: Glove II
programme.sub-title: Return of the Dead: Glove II
programme.desc: PRS returns to the site of one of their most famous cases, Daisytown, PA, where they had discovered a glove print of an old miner that they determined was the spirit of a Great-Grandfather.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Glove
programme.desc: When a terrifying haunting threatens to break a Daisytown, PA couple apart, PRS is their last resort. As the investigation deepens, PRS and the family learn that it's just the tip of iceberg, turns out this haunting might be all in the family.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows
programme.desc: Sarah believes her Parkville, MD home has been invaded by a powerful force ever since her roommate Dennis moved in. PRS investigates claims that Dennis has been attacked by the entity, a possible poltergeist.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fire
programme.desc: Christina has been experiencing paranormal activity ever since her father and step-mother were murdered near Columbus, OH last year. PRS and psychic/medium?Chip Coffey delve into a open murder case and wind up exposing a family divide.

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact
programme.desc: Washington State, a hotbed of unexplained paranormal activity. Between possible UFOs in the sky and winged creatures in the woods, Ryan and his team are forced to face their fears and deal with the question: Are we truly alone in the universe?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Night Terrors
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned
programme.desc: Jason and his family can no longer do renovations of an abandoned Kansas church, especially after they found their father in the basement crying and frightened because of the menacing activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hell's Gate
programme.desc: Ever since Wes and his family moved into their new home in York, PA they've been struggling with a dark force that's made everyday a living hell. Wes feels his mental and physical health is in jeopardy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: When Paula's young autistic son Michael, with limited verbal skills uttered the words "Go away scary dead boy" -- it sent a chill up her spine.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lost Souls
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/medium Michelle Belanger investigate a Pennsylvania home; where a mother named Kathy and her son Michael have both felt the presence of a young boy and hear voices calling, "Mom?" but no one is there.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room 37
programme.desc: Darrell and Cherry, the owners of an historic Tennessee bed and breakfast built in the late 1800s, are reporting apparitions of a man and hearing whistling throughout the hotel corridors.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Man of the House
programme.desc: PRS is called to help a grandmother and her frightened grandson when renovations on her 19th century house stir up the pipe-smoking specter of a former tenant named Alfred.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shadow Caster
programme.desc: PRS investigates an Alabama home where clients, Georgiana and her two daughters, are so terrified, they moved out after only 18 months. They have seen shadow figures, been touched and have a recorded EVP stating, "Look at me, get out of here."

programme.title: Paranormal State: I Am Six
programme.desc: Laura has felt oppressed by a violent spirit ever since she heard a chilling EVP in the fall of 2007. The 26-year-old claims she's been beaten, choked, even forcibly submerged.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lady Vampire
programme.desc: PRS investigates a case involving single mom, Dawn, and her 5-year-old daughter, both of whom are tormented by the appearance of a hag they call "lady vampire."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Man
programme.desc: A grieving mother suspects her deceased son may have fallen victim to a mysterious entity called The Dark Man.

channel.desc: Watch as Ryan and his team investigate disturbances and try to work out what these alleged paranormal phenomena really could be!

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Fleece Inn
programme.desc: This old pup in the heart of West Yorkshire is said to be one of the Most Haunted places in England.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison Pt2
programme.desc: With Karl in the main prison block, Stuart checks out the isolation unit, with dramatic results.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Knottingley Town Hall
programme.desc: This location is said to be overflowing with paranormal activity, which doesn’t disappoint.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: York Castle Museum
programme.desc: The history of York Castle Museum is almost endless as are the paranormal stories attached to it. Karl enters the street and cells with dramatic effect.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bron-Y-Garth Hospital Pt1
programme.desc: Stuart ventures into Bron-Y-Garth, an old workhouse and abandoned hospital. The spirits that reside here are said to be plentiful, something Stuart finds out all to soon.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Llanfyliln House Part 1
programme.desc: Workhouses were not the best of places to be, so why would anyone stay after they had died? Yvette takes her team on a memorable journey to find out. For a few team members it was a night they will never forget as they are pushed to the very limits.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Carr House
programme.desc: Part of a once splendorous manor and a history that goes back as far as Robin Hood, Carr House is the sight of many a paranormal occurrence.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ripon Workhouse
programme.desc: In a place where the homeless were kept and work was hard, death was often the only escape but it seems that wasn’t the way for some as their souls are said to roam this place.

programme.title: EXCLUSIVE TO PLUTO TV Most Haunted S25: SECRET LOCATION PT2
programme.desc: Most Haunted's deadliest investigation, Part 2. Spirits emerging, team's resolve tested as darkness envelops. Growing fear, team's safety at stake. Can they continue?

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Ashwell Prison As Live Pt 1
programme.desc: The Most Haunted tackle the deserted sprawling Ashwell Prison in this As-Live uncut episode. Feeling isolated and separated the team find themselves confronted by something in the dark.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison
programme.desc: Abandoned prisons are always a daunting prospect and the Most Haunted team love them. This time Karl takes on HMP Shrewsbury alone and experiences some of the unhappy phantoms that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P2
programme.desc: Karl ventures down into the cellars of this large country house and soon comes under attack from an unseen force.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Dudley Castle
programme.desc: The ruins that make up Dudley Castle house a plethora of paranormal activity for Yvette and her team to investigate. Strange noises and a violent poltergeist await them as they turn the lights out and do battle with the unseen forces.

programme.title: EXCLUSIVE TO PLUTO TV Most Haunted S25: SECRET LOCATION PT1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads team in a violent, secret investigation. Place's name and location concealed due to extreme haunting. Little history, aggressive entities a mystery. Can they reveal the darkness and face the unknown?

channel.desc: Join Yvette Fielding and the team investigate paranormal happenings at some of the world's most haunted locations, all on their very own 24/7 Most Haunted channel!

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Bind the Wounds
programme.desc: A father attempts to have a memorial made to commemorate his son who was killed in Vietnam.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Heaven on Earth
programme.desc: Mark asks Jonathan to help erase everything bad that's happened to him recently. Mark's idea is to create his own vision of heaven on Earth.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Summit
programme.desc: A dying woman was forced to leave a son behind in the Soviet Union during World War II.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Torch
programme.desc: Tragedy occurs when a Neo-Nazi disputes the Holocaust with the son of a death camp survivor.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Sail Away
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark assist a novelist who's given up. Also, they motivate the man's grandson, who has yet to tap into his literary potential.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Children's Children
programme.desc: A reporter uncovers a secret about the past of a woman who runs a home for unwed mothers.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Friends
programme.desc: While working as a substitute teacher at a high school, Jonathan assigns an overweight girl to tutor a troubled baseball star.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Special Love - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark persuade a youngster with Down's Syndrome to join the Special Olympics.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Special Love - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark's friend Scotty wants to adopt the boy with Down's Syndrome. A custody battle occurs with the biological parents.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: For the Love of Larry
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark rescue victims trapped in a car, thanks to a helpful dog.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Another Kind of War, Another Kind of Peace
programme.sub-title: Another Kind of War, Another Kind of Peace
programme.desc: A man whose son died in Vietnam learns that he has an Amerasian grandson.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: That's Our Dad
programme.desc: A children's-show host has a warm-hearted TV persona but is actually a cynic at heart.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Love at Second Sight
programme.desc: Another angel is upset that Jonathan has been assigned to find a mate for his widow.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Love and Marriage - Part 1
programme.desc: Bickering couples go on a trip to learn what it was that brought them together.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Love and Marriage - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark work to keep the three couples together.

channel.desc: Binge watch Highway To Heaven, the classic 80s fantasy drama, starring Michael Landon, an angel sent back to Earth to help people in need, right here on it’s very own channel!

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: It's the grand reopening of Mara and a British wildlife charity is using the event to release a vulture back into the wild. Fatani, the new, young and ambitious manager of Mara has hired Danny as the vet to oversee the release.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Leopard's Den is looking after a sick and orphaned baby elephant called Togo. However, despite Evan and Du Plessis' constant vigil, Togo is dying from a broken heart. Evan is distraught and Du Plessis promises they will look after her together.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Sarah's absence couldn't have come at a worse time for Leopard's Den. Nature Conservation is carrying out their annual inspection and everything has to be tip top. Danny's determined they pass with flying colours and everyone is roped in to help.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: Everyone's excited at the prospect of Leopard's Den's new arrival. Bash, Danny's old tutor and Rosie's Godfather, is coming from England to help Danny grow his veterinary practice.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: The Trevanions are delighted when Fatani asks Danny to take an aggressive hippo off his hands. As they prepare for its arrival Sarah gets a bit of a shock when her mother Caroline beats the hippo to the post.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: Business is looking up at Leopard's Den but Sarah is feeling agitated. Caroline thinks it because Simon, her ex husband and Evan and Olivia's Dad, is arriving from England to get married. But Sarah has other things on her mind.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Danny is undertaking a drugs trial at Leopard's Den. But de-worming wildebeest isn't Caroline's idea of fun. She hates animals and finds the whole business mind-numbingly boring.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: Du Plessis is in a foul mood. It's his 60th birthday and he has no intentions of celebrating it. But the Trevanions have other ideas and Caroline is organising a surprise party.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: All is quiet at Leopard's Den as Sarah, Evan and Olivia gather at the hospital. Danny has been given the all clear to go home. But Du Plessis is still unconscious and seriously ill. Caroline keeps a tender vigil at his bedside.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: New lodges nearly break the family, but they learn that it's the animals which make Leopard's Den a success.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny needs an assistant but fails to see that she's right under his nose; Sarah finds out that she needs her mum.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Leopard's Den expands and DuPlessis becomes a grandfather after a close-call with an angry elephant.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny and Sarah let their past catch up with them, and Caroline and DuPlessis go shopping for lion-prey.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: A white lion brings mixed fortunes to the family and Rosie is asked the big question. Amy Kriel is the last person you expect in Africa.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: Caroline's sister Judith tries to help and the drought forces Danny to sell some of his animals. Will Rosie and Max get married?

channel.desc: Wild at Heart, the feel good British family drama series, which sees Bristol Vet (Stephen Tompkinson) and his family emigrating to start a game park in South Africa. Watch it now 24/7!

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: A Prayer for the Dying
programme.desc: A mother of two is found dead in the most expensive part of Colorado Springs, leaving Lt. Joe Kenda stumped—until he looks into her personal life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Snitch
programme.desc: When officers respond to a shooting , they discover the body of a young man they know all to well -- police informant Jimmie Stevenson. it’s up to Lt. Joe Kenda to determine who pulled the trigger.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: When the Music Stops
programme.desc: Vietnam War veteran Charles Walker is found unconscious, after a stabbing attack so savage even 45 units of blood couldn’t save his life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Hail of Bullets
programme.desc: The murder of a young father stuns his close-knit community, but the investigation reveals a neighborly dispute turned deadly.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Invisible Hand of Death
programme.desc: Two teens stumble upon a woman engulfed in flames, leaving detectives to wonder just who in her inner circle could kill so cruelly.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Everybody Lies
programme.desc: After church, deacon Robert Walton is beaten to death in a public park. The case heats up when Lt. Kenda and his team revisit an old friend with a secret. Did the religious leader have a dark side?

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Worst I’ve Ever Seen
programme.desc: Two grandparents are shot to death in their family home. Kenda’s investigation kicks into high gear when his prime suspect flees for the Mexican border.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Primal Instinct
programme.desc: When a drunken dispute at a biker bar turns deadly, Kenda must launch a manhunt for a pair of suspects who fled with a small boy in tow.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Monster Awakes
programme.desc: When Julie Smith reports being sexually assaulted, Lt. Joe Kenda and his Sex Crimes Unit discover a terrifying similarity to other attacks on the east side of town.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Time Bomb
programme.desc: In 1978, Lt. Joe Kenda is new to the CSPD, and gets more than he bargains for when a local bank is the target of a massive explosion.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My First Case
programme.desc: In his first case with the homicide unit, rookie burglary detective Joe Kenda volunteers to work a bloody multi-victim shooting deemed “unsolvable” by the veterans.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: John 3:16
programme.desc: A man rushes his friend to the hospital with serious gunshot wounds, reporting they were robbed by strangers. When the facts don’t add up, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team go on the hunt.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Line Goes Dead
programme.desc: When the severed head of a wife and mother is found, Lt. Joe Kenda uses forensics and interrogation to find both her body and her killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: After School Special
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes when a beloved teacher is poisoned in her classroom. As doctors fight to save Barbara Lewis’ life, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team delve into her personal affairs.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Raise the Dead
programme.desc: When a tip comes in suggesting foul play on a 71yr old man, Lt. Joe Kenda is left with only one way to reveal the truth: exhume the body from its grave.

channel.desc: Joe Kenda has solved 387 homicide investigations, with a 92% solve rate. Each episode of Homicide Hunter uses Kenda’s first person narrative along with dramatic re-creations to retell the stores of his most disturbing and challenging murder cases.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Maya, Sara, and Lilly
programme.desc: Maya, an adopted Border Collie/Spring Spaniel Mix loves to jump but is hurting her owner’s neck. Next we meet Sara, an overly-aggressive Shepherd mix and Lilly, a pushy Poodle.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Roxie & Foxy, Charlie, and Bubba & Lucky
programme.sub-title: Roxie & Foxy, Charlie, and Bubba & Lucky
programme.desc: Two Dachshunds are overprotective of their owners. A couple wants to keep their biting Lhasa Apso. A couple working from home calls in Cesar for some canine conflict resolution.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Power of the Pack
programme.desc: The pack is a vital tool. In this intimate and revealing episode, witness some of the most memorable moments and experience the power of the pack.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Jersey Shore Dogs
programme.desc: The Jersey Shore is in for a dose of discipline when Cesar heads for the boardwalk to help three families deal with their out of control dog ‘situations.’

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Tobi & Riley
programme.desc: Cesar works with sheepdog/collie mix, Tobi who is aggressive with his owners and their guests. Then Cesar takes on the supposedly easy task of curing a St. Bernard who is afraid of stairs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Opie & Flirt
programme.desc: Black lab mix Opie is a charmer around people, but frighteningly aggressive around other dogs. Energetic to the point of being neurotic, Chinese Crested Flirt cannot sit still for one moment.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Cesar helps dogs overcome their fears including a whippet mix who is blind and deaf, a labradoodle that fears the ocean, and a cocker spaniel that fears all humans.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Nightmare in Central Park, Bad Boy Baxter
programme.sub-title: Nightmare in Central Park, Bad Boy Baxter
programme.desc: Curly, an adopted lab-greyhound mix, is aggressive with other dogs. Rhodesian Ridgeback/Boxer mix Baxter is rescued after wandering the streets but has severe dog aggression.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Nuna & Kane
programme.desc: NuNu the Chihuahua, fiercely attacks anyone who comes near his owner Tina. NuNu’s total opposite, Kane the Great Dane, is vehemently afraid of shiny surfaces

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Homewrecking Hounds
programme.desc: Cesar helps a newlywed couple whose dogs don't let them get close and another pair who met online and are nervous about introducing their dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Fondue, Chip, Hope & Joyjoy, and Elmer
programme.sub-title: Fondue, Chip, Hope & Joyjoy, and Elmer
programme.desc: A Hollywood couple had to turn down work because their French bulldog failed the Doggy Daycare entrance exam. Three Jack Russells began to fight each other when their owner got a serious boyfriend.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bad Dogs of Comedy
programme.desc: A pet groomer gets rave reviews but needs Cesar's help with handling some difficult clients. Chihuahua Peanut is only 10 pounds but makes a good bit of noise, causing chaos with her cohabiters.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Desperate Housedogs
programme.desc: Three Huskies are out of control on walks; a Labrador puppy chews on everything; a Spaniel/Mastiff mix snaps at other dogs; and three German shepherds bully other dogs. Cesar! Help!

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Made in Japan, Lawnmower Licker
programme.desc: Marley, a neglected Shiba Inu from Japan, develops aggression towards dogs and people. Piper, a Wire Fox Terrier obsessively tries to get to and lick the lawnmower engine.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Astronaut Dogs & Mongo
programme.desc: Mongo, a pit mix has severe and potentially life-threatening separation anxiety. NASA Astronauts with problem dogs. Cesar blasts off to help knock these canine problems out of orbit.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Lotus Blossoms
programme.desc: A jealous dachshund learns to get along with both of his owners. Can Cesar exorcize a demon possessed German Shepherd that prevents his people from entering certain rooms of the house.

channel.desc: Cesar Millan is one of the most renowned and sought-after experts working in the field of dog training. This is not just a series about dog training, it’s people training for dogs. Each episode tackles real-life problems faced by dog owners everywhere.

programme.title: Baywatch: Baywatch at Sea World
programme.desc: Caroline finds herself being sued for negligence in civil court by the angry and bitter mother of a drowning victim. CJ babysits a neighbor’s newborn and realizes she wants to be a mother. But is Cody ready to be a father?

programme.title: Baywatch: Trial by Fire
programme.desc: CJ and Cody transport an injured sea lion to the animal recovery facility at Sea World. While there, Samantha gets the idea to promote lifeguarding by planning a Baywatch-theme stunt show at Sea World.

programme.title: Baywatch: Golden Girls
programme.desc: A crazed young woman is causing trouble on the Venice Boardwalk and Neely suspects it is more than meets the eye. Meanwhile, Newman meets his dream woman – who doesn’t speak English.

programme.title: Baywatch: Nevermore
programme.desc: A mysterious, disfigured man whom the public dubs "the phantom lifeguard," is secretly saving people and sending love notes to CJ. When CJ goes missing the team sets out to find her and the “phantom.”

programme.title: Baywatch: Rookie Summer
programme.desc: Young, ambitious and sexy lifeguard candidates compete for a chance to attend Rookie School. Mitch is offered a promotion to Captain and has a tough decision to make. Lani McKensie faces the sinister return of a former lover.

programme.title: Baywatch: Next Generation
programme.desc: Hobie, Lani, April and Skylar are among the trainees competing for a few open slots as Baywatch Lifeguards. Hobie isn't sure he wants to follow in his father's footsteps, but when a vengeful jet skier comes after April, Hobie comes to her rescue.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Choice
programme.desc: Veteran lifeguard Jack 'JD' Darius has a dark secret in his past. He comes to Baywatch to throw his rescue can in the ring for the open Lieutenant slot, but young and ambitious Taylor Walsh also wants the job, and she's ready to fight for it.

programme.title: Baywatch: Memorial Day
programme.desc: Mitch, Sky, and April find a dead man on the ocean floor. Their search for answers to his demise leads to the retirement home where he lived, and his two friends who seem to be hiding the true story. The chemistry between Cody and Lani heats up.

programme.title: Baywatch: Charlie
programme.desc: April is devastated by her younger brother Charlie’s terminal illness. Mitch and Hobie want to make sure Charlie's wishes are granted, and that the time he spends with the lifeguards at Baywatch is the best of his life.

programme.title: Baywatch: Lifeguard Confidential
programme.desc: Caroline's acting career isn't going well so she returns to Baywatch to figure out what she really wants to do with her life. The lifeguards are plagued by a sleaze-ball helicopter reporter who somehow knows intimate details about their love lives.

programme.title: Baywatch: Out of the Blue
programme.desc: After the devastation of the last big L.A. earthquake, Baywatch lifeguards are taking recent Seismic activity seriously. Caroline and JD 's tempestuous relationship heats up, forcing Caroline to make a critical decision that could change her life.

programme.title: Baywatch: Eel Nino
programme.desc: The hot Santa Ana winds blow an air of mystery to Baywatch when two sea lions perish in an unexplainable event. Mitch must uncover the cause to stop it from happening again. April is courted by Manny and Hobie, forcing her to choose between them.

programme.title: Baywatch: Homecoming
programme.desc: Donna tries to help Neely overcome her addiction to painkillers. Craig Pomeroy shows up at Baywatch to defend the legal rights of an elderly Native American shaman determined to initiate his tribe's traditional death ritual on the Baywatch beach.

programme.title: Baywatch: Missing
programme.desc: Cody ignores regulations and leaves his tower five minutes early to meet Lani for a hot date. Right after he leaves, a young woman goes swimming and is engulfed by a wave, never to reappear. Cody is tortured by the results of his negligence.

programme.title: Baywatch: Hijacked
programme.desc: Caroline's truck is hijacked by a young thief who forces her to drive him on a wild getaway chase. Neely reveals a shocking secret about her outrageous actions during her hiatus from Baywatch.

programme.title: Baywatch: No Way Out
programme.desc: Prejudice threatens Manny and April's relationship, driving April into Craig's comforting arms. An encounter with sharks leads Craig and April to take shelter in a water treatment plant's intake pipe where they encounter even more danger!

channel.desc: On a Los Angeles beach, a team of lifeguards led by Lieutenant Mitch Buchannon saves lives, deals with personal tragedies, fights crime, and participates in extraordinary adventures every day.

programme.title: Dark Oracle

programme.desc: Bob and Margaret join a book club in the hopes of expanding their tiny social horizon.
