programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ramon & Paola
programme.desc: Ramon met Paola on Facebook and established an exclusive online relationship. But after many failed attempts to video chat, is she really who he thinks she is?

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: With Charlotte back in the house, all eyes are on Gary and Marnie and whether they'll decide to continue sleeping together. (S8, ep4)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Things kick off in the house as Aaron hears Vicky and the girls slagging him off on the eve of his third date with Vicky. (S8,ep5)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: New boy Kyle gets properly settled into the house by spending the night with Holly, and the Geordies take Tash on Tours international as they jet off to Reykjavik, Iceland for some partying. (S8, ep6)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: After checking out the local guys, girls and geysers in Iceland, the Geordies head back to the Toon, where it all kicks off as Aaron and Scott find out the truth about Gary and Marnie. (S8, ep7)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Will Aaron and Marnie finally get together, and will Scott and Gary make up? Meanwhile, Charlotte and Holly announce Geordie Shore's first-ever wedding. (S8, ep8)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Buzzin'! Our favourite party animals are back! Everyone is shocked when Vicky gets a promotion and becomes their boss. Holly tries to stay classy by not jumping into bed with Kyle. (S9, ep1)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Holly has a house party but there's a massive kick-off between the lads when Marnie tries to make Aaron jealous by necking on with Kyle. (S9, ep2)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: The Geordies head to Paris for a Tash-on Tours job. Vicky gets unprofessionally mortal at work, and, on returning to the Toon, Charlotte leaves for crisis talks with her boyfriend. (S9, ep3)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Charlotte and Gary find themselves gravitating together after she returns from a showdown with her boyfriend. Vicky struggles to convince Marnie to take work seriously. (S9, ep4)

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Aubrey
programme.desc: Aubrey and Brandon must find a home and start over in a new town, all while she tries to get her GED. They get married, but will their fresh start cause them to resent one another? (S2, ep16)

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Christinna
programme.desc: Christinna and Isiah have had to change their college plans as they prepare for their baby. His family is furious when he gives up his scholarship. Can they make it on their own?

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Kayla
programme.desc: Kayla is a southern belle. Now that she's pregnant, she has to start making her own tough decisions about marriage and her ability to make it without the help of her parents.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Megan
programme.desc: While her dad's in Afghanistan, Megan gets pregnant. But with little money and a video game playing boyfriend not necessarily in for the long haul, she'll have to grow up fast.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Ashley
programme.desc: Ashley is a pregnant high school senior from Texas with no baby daddy weighing in, and a family encouraging her to choose adoption. But when the time comes, what will she decide?

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: New Season, Old Wounds
programme.desc: Briana, frustrated by Luis' absence, tracks him down at a nightclub. After a major fight with her mum, things get even worse for Jade at Kloie's birthday party. (S10, ep1)

channel.desc: Catch all of your favourite MTV reality shows together on one exclusive channel, MTV Pluto TV. Featuring Catfish, 16 & Pregnant, Teen Mom, Geordie Shore and more!

programme.title: World's Greatest: Flights
programme.desc: Our experience of the world’s greatest marvels is literally and figuratively elevated when we explore them from the air. Whether you travel by air balloon, helicopter, light aircraft, a grand perspective is always guaranteed.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Drives
programme.desc: A journey by road expands our horizons, allowing us to explore the depth and breadth of whole countries and continents, stopping whenever and wherever we chose.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Deserts
programme.desc: For all their reputation as inhospitable places, deserts are full of incredible plants and animals that have adapted to the climate. They are bursting with geological wonders that inspire and are home to some of the most life in the world.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanic Islands
programme.desc: They've been worshiped and feared over the millennia. But in the wake of drama and destruction, the elements give rise to cultures and nations so beautiful that we've come to know them as the world's greatest volcanic islands.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Glaciers
programme.desc: Clinging to the world’s highest mountains and forming ice caps on both poles, glaciers leave an impression on the landscape and on all who bear witness to their splendor.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Timeless Cities & Towns
programme.desc: These cities and towns are special places where the past coexists with the present, creating cultures totally unique to their people and their part of the world and adhering to ancient traditions and while introducing modern innovations.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Capital Cities
programme.desc: With visionaries, politicians, and activists, these metropolises are defined as the official seats of government. Dublin, Washington, and Taipei share broad avenues, museums, and monuments, but are as varied as the countries they represent.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Treks
programme.desc: Every journey made by foot promises a grand adventure. From the highest mountains to the wildest jungle realms, treks venture down the road less travelled, allowing us to connect to nature, history, and culture, one step at a time.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Remote Cities
programme.desc: Brave the frontiers of the world’s most remote cities. More than distant trading posts and isolated regional hubs, cities like Alice Springs, Jaipur and even Las Vegas serve as gateways to the wild places of the Earth.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Lost Cities
programme.desc: Once powerful and populous centers of influence, these lost cities are providing clues to how our ancestors existed in the world and remind us that ancient civilizations were not so far removed from our own.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Wetland Animals
programme.desc: Wetland Animals dives into the swamps, rivers, and flood plains of the Everglades, Botswana’s Okavango Delta, Kakadu National Park in Australia, and the Amazon to see deadly crocodiles, piranhas, hippopotamus, flamingo, manatee, and platypus.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coral Islands
programme.desc: The reef systems that gave rise to coral islands support the vast majority of marine species on our planet, but they are under threat. Explore the delicate balance between exploiting and preserving these extraordinary natural wonders.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Bridges
programme.desc: A bridge is a structure that’s designed to transcend, but a great bridge can define the place where it stands. Symbols of human ingenuity, beauty, and grandeur, bridges connect us not only to each other but also to the past.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Ancient Cities
programme.desc: In Ancient Cities, we journey to these ancestors of influence such as Luang Prabang, Vienna, and Istanbul where religious and cultural centers have shaped the ways in which we view the world around us and continue to do so in modern times.

channel.desc: The world is full of inspiring places. World’s Greatest goes on a breathtaking journey around the planet, revealing the best cities, natural wonders, animal encounters, journeys and adventures, monuments, and islands.

programme.title: Arthur: Background Blues/And Now Let's Talk To Some Kids
programme.sub-title: Background Blues/And Now Let's Talk To Some Kids
programme.desc: Wouldn't it be cool to find out that your ancestors were famous frontier explorers? But what if they were just...plain folks? The Magic Toolbox show is coming to Ratburn's class to put the kids on TV!

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen Adds It Up/Wish You Were Here
programme.sub-title: Sue Ellen Adds It Up/Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: Math, schmath. That's what Sue Ellen thinks… until she runs into a problem her artistic vision can't solve. Sue Ellen can't wait to meet her pen pal in person.

programme.title: Arthur: Bully for Binky/Misfortune Teller
programme.desc: Is Binky Barnes really the most disgusting, nasty, horrible person on the planet, or is he just misunderstood? Next, what's got four sides and the answer to everything? Prunella's cootie catcher!

programme.title: Arthur: Two Minutes/Messy Dress Mess
programme.desc: Power shifts in the Tibble household when the twins find out Tommy is two minutes older than Timmy. Ladonna's thrilled when Muffy loans her a beautiful recital dress, but a run-in with a painted bench creates a problem.

programme.title: Arthur: Big Horns George/Bleep
programme.desc: George is inspired to write and perform his own blues song when he's introduced to the music of Koko Taylor. And, D.W. overhears a mysterious word she doesn’t know the meaning of. Can D.W. risk the consequences of blurting out <"BLEEP!">?

programme.title: Arthur: Kids Are From Earth, Parents Are From Pluto/Nerves Of Steal
programme.sub-title: Kids Are From Earth, Parents Are From Pluto/Nerves Of Steal
programme.desc: It’s Lakewood Elementary Parents Open House! How will the kids survive a whole evening of their parents' embarrassing antics? Buster is the only kid in Elwood City who doesn't have a Cybertoy, so he decides to 'borrow' one from the store.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Thinks Big/Arthur Cleans Up
programme.desc: Once again, Arthur gets to do everything. Mostly he gets to carry the ring in Aunt Lucy's wedding. Elwood City's park is in sad shape, and after grumbling about it, the kids find themselves volunteered to clean it up.

programme.title: Arthur: Mom and Dad Have A Great Big Fight/D.W.'s Perfect Wish
programme.sub-title: Mom and Dad Have A Great Big Fight/D.W.'s Perfect Wish
programme.desc: When Mom and Dad fight over spilled milk, Arthur and D.W. fear the worst. Is it Arthur's fault or D.W.'s? Then, turning five is a major, big deal event! But D.W. worries that she fribbled away her preschool years on meaningless pursuits.

programme.title: Arthur: The Pageant Pickle/Some Assembly Required
programme.desc: School is almost out and Arthur can hardly wait for those lazy summer days by Muffy's pool. Nothing could ruin such a happy time of year, except maybe D.W.'s Spring Pageant! And then D.W. can't wait to test out her new play set!

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Writes A Story/Arthur's Lost Dog
programme.sub-title: Arthur Writes A Story/Arthur's Lost Dog
programme.desc: Struggling with a school assignment, Arthur decides that his regular life is just too boring to write about. And, Arthur is the only one who believes in the superior intelligence of his dog. But even Arthur gets confused when Pal runs away.

programme.title: Arthur: Brain's Brain/Brain Sees Stars
programme.desc: Brain's Easter egg hunts are notoriously hard. But this year's might prove impossible if Brain can't remember where he hid the final egg. Then, crazy coincidences have prevented Brain from seeing a meteor shower in person.

programme.title: Arthur: Baby Kate and the Imaginary Mystery/Strangers on a Train
programme.sub-title: Baby Kate and the Imaginary Mystery/Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: Nadine, D.W.'s imaginary friend is missing. Sue Ellen can't wait to travel on an old-fashioned train, but once onboard, she discovers that the train is not as spectacular as she had hoped–until she finds a mysterious diary.

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Barnes, Wingman/To Beat Or Not To Beat
programme.sub-title: Binky Barnes, Wingman/To Beat Or Not To Beat
programme.desc: Does Binky have a favorite pastime? Not until citywide Bug Week, when suddenly all he can think about is butterflies. Then, there's a horrible racket in Elwood City, and it's Francine practicing her singing and drumming for the Talent Show!

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Book Battle/On the Buster Scale
programme.sub-title: Buster's Book Battle/On the Buster Scale
programme.desc: Lakewood Elementary has just instituted IRP; a program where kids can earn points (and prizes!) for reading. Then, Buster and Brain never agree on movies. Buster rates every film a 10+, while Brain doesn't seem to like anything.

programme.title: Arthur: Fern and the Case of the Stolen Story/Sue Ellen Vegges Out
programme.sub-title: Fern and the Case of the Stolen Story/Sue Ellen Vegges Out
programme.desc: Fern has writer's block! Fortunately, Ladonna's full of stories, and Fern decides to "borrow" the tales and simply change the names. Then, when Sue Ellen decides to stop eating meat, Muffy and Francine compete to be the best vegetarian.

programme.title: Arthur: Around the World in 11 Minutes/Muffy and the Big Bad Blog
programme.sub-title: Around the World in 11 Minutes/Muffy and the Big Bad Blog
programme.desc: Pal, Baby Kate, Amigo, and Mei Lin enthusiastically accept Nemo's dare to travel around the world and make it back in 11 minutes. Then, Muffy discovers that web blogging is a great way to keep her readers up to date with her every move.

programme.title: Arthur: Speak Up Francine/Waiting for Snow
programme.desc: The local creek is polluted and pesticide run-off is to blame. Francine is determined to get the word out at the annual Earth Day rally. Ladonna can't wait to experience her first blizzard, if only the weather would cooperate.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Secret Admirer/The Last King of Lambland
programme.sub-title: Buster's Secret Admirer/The Last King of Lambland
programme.desc: Buster receives a box of chocolates in the mail from a secret admirer. It's driving him crazy! Who could possibly like him that much? And James receives a gift from his uncle in Scotland--a toy lamb that will give its owner special powers!

programme.title: Arthur: The Case of the Girl with the Long Face/The Substitute Arthur
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Girl with the Long Face/The Substitute Arthur
programme.desc: Fern's been feeling low and no one can figure out why. Luckily, Buster Baxter is on the case! With Arthur out of town, Buster is on the hunt for a new best friend, but he only wants to play games HIS way. Will Buster learn to compromise?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Chicken Pox/Sick As A Dog
programme.sub-title: Arthur's Chicken Pox/Sick As A Dog
programme.desc: The circus is in town and the whole family's excited—until Arthur gets CHICKEN POX! Will he recover in time? Then, Arthur's worst fears come true when poor, sick Pal has to sleep overnight at the vet's office. Could it be something he did?

programme.title: Arthur: Carl's Concerto/Too Much of a Good Thing
programme.sub-title: Carl's Concerto/Too Much of a Good Thing
programme.desc: Carl has agreed to play the accordion for George's puppet show. But his routines are getting in the way of rehearsals. Buster enlists Binky's help to keep him from gorging on delicious Tuvaluna cookies. Will Buster's self-control crumble?

programme.title: Arthur: Follow the Bouncing Ball/Buster Baxter and the Letter from the Sea
programme.sub-title: Follow the Bouncing Ball/Buster Baxter and the Letter from the Sea
programme.desc: Alberto Molina's beloved soccer ball--signed by his favorite Ecuadorian soccer star --is lost! While on vacation, Buster discovers a message in a bottle on the shore. Could it be a message from the people of the lost city of Atlantis?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Tv-Free Week/Night Fright
programme.desc: The kids and parents of Ellwood City have all pledged not to watch TV for one whole week. Can they last? Then, big, brave Binky Barnes would be toast if people ever discovered he can't sleep without a night light.

programme.title: Arthur: Muffy's Classy Classics Club/Best Enemies
programme.desc: Muffy buys all of the books and dolls in the Pretty Pioneers series and invites her friends to join a pretty book club. Mom has new clients coming over and they have a daughter who is D.W.'s age. They're going to be the best of friends!

programme.title: Arthur: Ants in Arthur's Pants/Don't Ask Muffy
programme.sub-title: Ants in Arthur's Pants/Don't Ask Muffy
programme.desc: To excel in science, the class has to prove that they have P.A.N.T.S.--the ability to be patient, attentive, nosy, thoughtful, and systematic. And Muffy starts an advice column to launch her career as a rich and famous talk-show host.

programme.title: Arthur: The World of Tomorrow/Is There a Doctor in the House?
programme.sub-title: The World of Tomorrow/Is There a Doctor in the House?
programme.desc: Since Binky's repeating third grade, he's totally dreading Mr. Ratburn's annual class sleepover at the Science Museum. Arthur and D.W. face the ultimate challenge when Mom gets a bad cold and then gives it to Dad!

programme.title: Arthur: Shelter from the Storm (Part 1 & 2)
programme.desc: When a powerful hurricane hits Elwood City, everyone's affected. Ladonna's dad is called up by the Army Corps of Engineers. Muffy relocates to a shelter. And Arthur struggles to reunite lost pets and owners.

channel.desc: Based on the beloved books by Marc Brown, these are the adventures of Arthur, an 8-year-old aardvark, and his family and friends as they grow up and learn how to be good neighbours to one another.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: The Tragic Sinking of Leopoldville
programme.desc: On the 24th of December 1944, 2 237 American soldiers of the 66th Infantry Division are aboard the Steamer Léopoldville.

programme.title: World War II: Battles Won and Lost
programme.desc: The battles of the first world war were battles of attrition and trenches; the battles of the second world war were vastly different. In this episode we study tank battles, blitzkrieg, commando raids, amphibious landings, and mobile warfare in the desert.

programme.title: World War II: Battles Won and Lost
programme.desc: The second world war was conflict on an unprecedented scale. Its battles set new marks for the sheer size of forces deployed and for the power of their weapons. In this episode we study the first battle at sea, and the largest army to have ever marched.

programme.title: World War II: Battles Won and Lost
programme.desc: A war that reached every continent and touched every sort of terrain demanded every sort of strategy. In this episode we examine battles fought at sea, and in the jungle, in city streets, invasions from the air, and retreats from the land.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Dunkirk (September 1, 1939)
programme.desc: To keep France free, 400,000 English soldiers have manned the battlefields. Germany's strength is too great and pushes the British to the coast town of Dunkirk.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Fall of Poland
programme.desc: German tanks roll into Poland in September 1939.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Battle of Norway (Early 1940)
programme.desc: Early in the war, the Germans decide they need to guarantee access to the Norwegian port of Narvik to ensure their supplies of Swedish iron ore. The British, however, send destroyers to up-end the German plan.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Bombing of England (Fall 1940)
programme.desc: After invading France, Hitler is planning to cross the Channel. His only obstacle is the Royal Air Force. Throughout the summer of 1940, both sides lose an incredible number of daring flyers.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Tobruk
programme.desc: German field marshal Erwin Rommel scores a major victory at the Libyan seaport of Tobruk.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Operation Mercury
programme.desc: After British forces withdrew in defeat from Greece to the island of Crete in early 1941, they were soon fighting German invasion armies again. This time, 5,000 of Hitler's elite paratroopers landed to complete their conquest in the Mediterranean.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Battle of Malta (June 1941)
programme.desc: In 1941, Mussolini desperately wants to wrest the tiny island of Malta from the British for control of the Mediterranean. When his inadequate air force fails to bomb the Maltese into submission, Hitler's Luftwaffe joins the campaign.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Fall of Singapore (October 1941)
programme.desc: Before the sneak attack on Pearl Harbor, the Japanese initiate the Pacific War by firing on the British in Malaya. Their route to the rubber-rich nation takes them into Singapore, the World's most armed fortress.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Pearl Harbor (December 7, 1941)
programme.desc: During a two-hour surprise attack on the American Pacific fleet anchored at Pearl Harbor, Japanese navy pilots score a near-complete victory.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Fall of the Philippines
programme.desc: Examining the Japanese invasion of the Philippines in December 1941.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Battle of Midway (June 2, 1942)
programme.desc: Only one isolated atoll prevents an enemy invasion of Hawaii. Midway Island is where the Japanese fleet converges on a tiny American base with a massive strafing and bombing attack.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Solomon Islands (July 1942)
programme.desc: For the first time since Americans entered the war, Marines face Japanese infantrymen at Guadal Canal. In the jungles, two powerful armies clash in a six month battle that claims nearly 30,000 lives.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Dieppe
programme.desc: The Allies launch an ill-fated attack on the German-occupied port of Dieppe, France.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Stalingrad
programme.desc: German forces encounter Russian resistance.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: El Alamein
programme.desc: Erwin Rommel battles Allied forces in North Africa in 1942.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: North Africa (November 1942)
programme.desc: In the North African desert in 1942, American fighting forces encounter the dreaded Rommel for the first time to stop the German war machine.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Burma: The Forgotten Front (Spring 1943)
programme.desc: The Japanese meet resistance from British forces as they advance through Burma to take India in 1944.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Sicily
programme.desc: Fresh from victory in North Africa, the Allies successfully invade the island of Sicily, staging an eventual Italian withdrawal from the war.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Bombing of Ploesti
programme.desc: American bombers target a Romanian oil refinery in a daring 1943 mission.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Monte Cassino (September 3, 1943)
programme.desc: As the allies make their way into Italy, they encounter tremendous resistance at German defensive positions along the Gustav line. One of these locations is an ancient monastery called Monte Cassino.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Gilbert Islands (November 1943)
programme.desc: Bloody fighting erupts on a group of tiny Pacific islands in November 1943.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Anzio
programme.desc: Allied armies encounter German resistance in the Italian fishing town of Anzio.

channel.desc: Look behind the important battles, daring bombing raids, and devastating amounts of bloodshed that helped shape British history. Watch key events as you’ve never seen before in colourised archive footage providing new windows into the past.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jamey and Ari
programme.desc: Jamey fell for Ari online, and he will do anything to meet her, but she will only do it on TV! Nev and Max help Ari share her story, and she hopes Jamey will accept her as she is.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Courtney & Isaak
programme.desc: Courtney broke up with Isaak, who she met online. He's doing everything to get her back. Beauty queen Cassidy Wolf joins Nev to get Isaak to leave Courtney alone for good.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Miracle & Javonni
programme.desc: Smart, single mum Miracle fell for Javonni, a dreamy-eyed Instagrammer. With Max on hiatus, Nev teams up with TV personality Charlamagne to take Miracle on a hunt for the man of her dreams.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Bianca & Brogan
programme.desc: When Brogan disappears from the Internet, then returns online after a year without question, Bianca wants to know what happened in the missing year. (S3, ep10)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Artis & Jess
programme.desc: Five months ago Artis met Jess online. Artis and Jess each were in relationships, but believed they'd found true love. But is Jess everything that she says she is? (S2, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Steven & Samm
programme.desc: Steven is due to graduate high school, instead of planning for college he wants to move to California for his online love, Samm. Steven's mom is sceptical of Samm's identity.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Hundra never planned on falling in love with a girl and is risking coming out on national TV to learn if her love is for real. Nev investigates to reveal a shocking Catfish.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tracie & Sammie
programme.desc: Tracie Thoms had a connection with a fan named 'Sammie' after hearing about the passing of Sammie's friend. Sammie suddenly disappeared and now Tracie is left wondering who Sammie really is? (S3, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike and Caroline
programme.desc: Mike fell in love with Caroline online. He grew suspicious when she continually evaded meeting him, yet left notes at his car. Is Caroline an imposter or is she just afraid? (S2, ep16)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Lucille & Kidd Cole
programme.desc: Lucille led a simple life until she was asked to work for music producer Kidd Cole. Companies were never paid and one day Kidd couldn't be found. Will she get the answers she needs?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Chitara & Priscilla
programme.desc: Chitara took a big leap and came out to her family when she met Priscilla online, but Priscilla ended their relationship unexpectedly. Now Chitara is determined to find out what happened. (S4, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Solana & Elijah
programme.desc: Solana is in a relationship with Danny but can't stop thinking about her online love Elijah. His photos were used in so many profiles that she has to know is this the real Elijah?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jesse & Brian
programme.desc: Jesse met Brian online. They made plans to meet, but Brian stood her up. Now, years later, Brian has asked her to live with him. But, she can't stop wondering - what is Brian hiding?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ayissha & Sydney
programme.desc: Sydney and Ayissha were in an online romance for years before Sydney revealed she is not who she says. But Ayissha still loves her and seeks Nev and Max's help. (S4, ep16)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Brittany & Bryon
programme.desc: Brittany finds love online with Bryon, a marine who may get deployed again to Iraq, she seeks Nev and Max's help before she runs out of time to discover if the perfect military man is real. (S4, ep19)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Anthony & Marq
programme.desc: Anthony is a war veteran who wears his heart on his sleeve. Over a year ago, he bonded online with a caring man named Marq. Today, they're head over heels in love - but what is Marq hiding?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Felipe & Jasmine
programme.desc: Single father Felipe is ready to settle down with Jasmine. However, the two have been talking online for eight months and have never met. Max returns and joins Nev to investigate. (S4, ep6)

channel.desc: Catfish: The TV Show" tackles the mystery and complexities of dating in a digital world. Nev Schulman and Max Joseph take viewers on a journey that goes inside the stories of young people as their online-only romantic relationships collide with real-life.

programme.title: The City: Friends In High Places
programme.desc: Kelly pushes Whitney to market her line after her first fashion show. Olivia refuses to support Whitney's line at ELLE Magazine, but Erin goes over her head to Joe Zee. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Celebrity Ex on the Beach: SOS
programme.desc: A new celeb arrives which threatens Sofie and Kori. Kaz continues struggling to live with her ex Theo, Nathan and Tommy make up and the Shack Of Secrets is revealed much to KC's horror. (S2, ep3)

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Celebrity Ex on the Beach: Secret Kisses
programme.desc: KC's ex Michael enters from the Shack Of Secrets, leaving everyone floored by his heartfelt apology. Kori and Ella get closer while Theo and KC have a secret kiss. (S2, ep4)

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Celebrity Ex on the Beach: Loose Lips
programme.desc: Michael's secret mission is revealed in the Shack Of Secrets but could his loose lips bite him in the butt. An ex spells trouble for Kori and Ella and KC gets the green light from Kaz. (S2, ep5)

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Celebrity Ex on the Beach: True Colours
programme.desc: Michael sends someone home before questioning his own time in the villa. KC is still finding it difficult to be with Theo while Kaz is in the villa and Nathan says goodbye to ex Tommy. (S2, ep6)

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Celebrity Ex on the Beach: Kori Gets The Hump
programme.desc: Lockie and Megan share their first kiss, Kori is confused by Sofie's mixed signals and Nathan worries Declan's head could turn. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Celebrity Ex on the Beach: Double Whammy
programme.desc: Kori and Lockie get hit with a double whammy and the SOS spells trouble for the celebrities. Nathan's insecurities get the better of him and Mike's in for a surprise! (S2, ep8)

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Celebrity Ex on the Beach: Theo's 'Down Under' Dilemma
programme.desc: Theo is left devastated after Kaz's departure and his relationship with KC comes to a head. Lockie and Sofie fall out and a new ex ruffles some feathers! (S2, ep9)

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Celebrity Ex on the Beach: The Cherry On The Cake
programme.desc: Anya fancies Kori, but is Kori over Sofie? A new celeb tickles someone's fancy, the OG's of the villa have a tough decision to make and a Gay Pride party reveals a surprise pot of gold. (S2, ep10)

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Celebrity Ex on the Beach: Going Going Gone!
programme.desc: An ex arrives which threatens to turn Megan's head. Kris makes his feelings known to Ella; Kori and Sofie have a massive showdown and Nathan has a decision to make as one OG 's time is up! (S2, ep11)

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 111
programme.desc: Stephanie is tired of only fantasizing about Mike's "sexy face" and she's ready to make him her boyfriend. Sean and Kate were friends at first sight, now Sean wants to up the stakes.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 112
programme.desc: David tells his best friend Maia that he's been in love with her for 9 years. B-Hawk tries to prove to his friend Toni that there's more to him than meets the eye.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 113
programme.desc: Kris tries to woo his best friend Lauren with a special love song. Rachel musters the courage to tell Billy how she really feels.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 114
programme.desc: Bryan and Megan have been best friends for 10 years and he can no longer keep his feeling contained. Kenise thinks that she and James can be more than workout buddies.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 115
programme.desc: Arty Krystal confesses her love to unsuspecting friend Nishell. Mike tells gal pal Rachel that he's in love with her.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 116
programme.desc: Alex tells his best friend's sister that he has strong feelings for her. Asha tells her friend Chris that she wants more than friendship.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 117
programme.desc: Aja confesses her feelings to best friend Charles. Paulie tries to convince his friend Bethany that there is more between them that just friendship!

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 118
programme.desc: Danielle loves to laugh and joke with Chris, but now she wants to get serious with him. Jenni met Christie about a year ago and now she's ready to bare her heart.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 119
programme.desc: Nicole wants to make her best friend of a year and a half her boyfriend. Andrew and Sarah have been friends for 5 years now he's ready to reveal his true feelings.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 120
programme.desc: Franklin needs to let Erica, his friend of 5 years, know how he really feels about her. Wayne, a rapper, reveals his true feelings to Megan.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 121
programme.desc: Ladies man, Sid, must put aside his pimping ways to tell his best friend Courtney how he feels. Scott let's best friend Laruen know he wants to take it to the next level.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 122
programme.desc: Melita must tell Marcus how she feels before he leaves for the military. Gaming nerd Brian, tells Samantha that he's in love with her.

programme.title: The Hills: Out With The Old
programme.desc: After a rocky summer with her boyfriend Jason, Lauren decides to break it off and returns to work to face her boss. Heidi finds herself in trouble with a guy both she and Audrina are dating. (S2, ep1)

channel.desc: If you like relationship drama, fake tan, and extraordinarily white teeth then MTV Reality is the channel for you! From wild nights out on the Geordie Shore, to the glamour of the LA Hills, MTV Reality is the ultimate guilty pleasure!

programme.title: Renegade: Sins of the Father
programme.desc: Dutch Dixon's son Donnie gets out of prison and decides that he will sell his father up the river for the right price.

programme.title: The Debt Collector
programme.desc: French is a martial artist that takes on a job as a mob debt collector in order to make ends meet. He does whatever it takes to chase down individuals until he meets a bartender that makes him question whether he should do the right thing.

programme.title: Recoil
programme.desc: A cop turns vigilante after his family is murdered, exacting vengeance on the killers - and then on all criminals who have slipped through the system.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A respected doctor must race against time to find a cure for a lethal virus, unleashed by a paramilitary militia leader. Starring: Steven Seagal, L.Q. Jones, Gailard Sartain, Camilla Belle, Brad Leland

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it. Feat: Mel Gibson.

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.

programme.title: The Green Hornet: Disaster Rides the Rails
programme.desc: Our hero, Britt Reid, battling the crime ring in a mayoralty election, secures evidence that ballot boxes have been "stuffed." The ring candidate is elected, and The Sentinel demands a court order for a recount.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Incognito
programme.desc: Retrieving a mythical lancet, Sydney and Nigel run into Nigel's look-alike just before his death. Nigel gets a cut from the lancet. Later, Cate persuades Nigel to impersonate the man.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: All Choked Up
programme.desc: Carson Inez, a collector, uses an ancient necklace to get Sydney to help her in raising Athena who will then help her conquer the world.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Warlock of Nu Theta Phi
programme.desc: When Sydney's student Meg's roommate finds a witch's amulet, it hospitalizes Meg. Meg's boyfriend's fraternity brother races to get the amulet. What is he up to?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: While Sydney is lecturing about the Native Americans who faced a mysterious cataclysm 600 years earlier, a native brings her a relic from that era. What is its secret?

channel.desc: It’s time to go into overdrive by jumping off buildings, flying a burning plane, driving in a car chase and saving the world. Pluto TV Action brings you blockbusters, stars, and a strong dose of high-octane excitement.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Perfectly Executed - Part 1
programme.desc: A report on the 1994 murders of the Rafay family -- Sultana Rafay, her husband Tariq and their autistic daughter, Basma -- focusing on the pursuit and arrest of the two suspects: Atif Rafay, the only surviving family member, and his friend Sebastian Burns

programme.title: 48 Hours: Perfectly Executed - Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2 focuses on the role of the Canadian Mounted Police in the investigation and sting operation put in place to obtain confessions from Rafay and Burns. Having taken refuge in Canada, Rafay and Burns were extradited to Seattle to face murder charges.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 1
programme.sub-title: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 1
programme.desc: Fred Jablin, a devoted father was gunned down in his driveway. His ex-wife, Piper was the prime suspect. Circumstantial evidence, including an airline ticket and two wigs indicated that Piper had masqueraded as her older sister and killed her husband.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 2
programme.sub-title: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 2
programme.desc: Fred Jablin, a devoted father was gunned down in his driveway. His ex-wife, Piper was the prime suspect. Circumstantial evidence, including an airline ticket and two wigs indicated that Piper had masqueraded as her older sister and killed her husband.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Strange Truth
programme.desc: In March 2003, Ramona Krotine left an office party and was never seen alive again. 24 hours later, she was found in the trunk of her car, beaten and shot to death. At first, police suspected a botched robbery but later believed her husband was to blame.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: In 1976, Deborah Gardner, a Peace Corps worker, was murdered while on assignment in the South Pacific island nation of Tonga. Dennis Priven, a 24-year-old fellow Peace Corps worker, who appeared to be obsessed with Gardner, was charged by Tongan police.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Ghosts of El Segundo
programme.desc: In July 1957 Richard Phillips and Milton Curtis, two California police officers on a routine stop, were gunned down by a man who had just committed robbery and rape nearby. Investigators searched for over 45 years for the man who murdered two of their own

programme.title: 48 Hours: Where's Our Baby?
programme.desc: In November 1997, Marlene and Steve Aisenberg reported their five-month-old daughter Sabrina missing from her crib. Police soon focused on the parents as authorities became convinced that they knew more about the baby’s disappearance than they admitted.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Death of a Dream
programme.desc: In 2002, dancer Catherine Woods went to New York in search of fame but became a stripper to pay the rent. She started seeing Paul Cortez while living with her ex-boyfriend David Haughn. In November 2005, she was murdered. The two men became suspects.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in the Fast Lane
programme.desc: A report on the March 1988 murder of legendary racecar driver Mickey Thompson and his wife Trudy. Thompson’s sister is convinced that Michael Goodwin, her brother’s former partner, was the killer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fight For The Truth
programme.desc: 17-year-old Marty Tankleff was convicted of murdering his adoptive parents in their home. Marty initially confessed, but quickly recanted. He has fought for years for his innocence, as new witnesses have surfaced who could potentially exonerate him.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Buried Secrets of Las Vegas
programme.desc: A report on the death of gaming tycoon Ted Binion, who was found dead in his Las Vegas home. Paranoid about his wealth, he stashed millions of dollars’ worth of silver in a hidden vault in Pahrump, Nevada.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Sugar Land Conspiracy
programme.desc: In December 2003, the Whitaker family-- Kent, his wife Tricia, and their sons, Bart and Kevin-- returned home from dinner. Upon entering the house, Kevin and Tricia were fatally shot. The investigation revealed that the murders had been planned by Bart.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Deadly Prophecy
programme.desc: Faylene Eaves, divorced Arizona mother of two, married Doug Grant, a divorced single dad, in 1993. They were both Mormons. Faylene had revelations from God that could have contributed to her death, however her husband was found guilty of murdering her.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: Kidnap on Highway 1
programme.sub-title: Live to Tell: Kidnap on Highway 1
programme.desc: In November 2007, the Hall family was driving back to California from Mexico, when they were pulled over by what they thought were police. They were kidnappers who drove them onto a dirt road in the mountains where trouble ensued.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Their Father, The Godfather
programme.desc: In an exclusive interview, and for the first time, three of the children of the late crime boss John Gotti discuss the life they experienced growing up as members of his family, how they were sheltered from an awareness of Gotti’s lifestyle.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Taken: The Amber Dubois Story
programme.desc: A report on the February 2009 disappearance of Amber Dubois, just blocks from Escondido High School in California. 48 HOURS examines the permanent impact her disappearance has had on her family, even after the discovery and conviction of the murderer.

channel.desc: Pluto TV 48 Hours brings viewers behind the scenes of the most intriguing murders. Follow the investigators, meet the accused, and review the evidence in the original true crime docuseries, with stories of obsession, revenge, and crimes of passion.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: The Park Kids decide to have a Dog Show to show off their pets. A rainy day has everyone stuck in the Caboose. Barney suggests fun activities.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When Baby Bop thinks the half-moon is somehow broken, Barney and Friends take an imaginary visit to the moon where Barney eases her concerns.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop, BJ and the children prepare for the Shapes Carnival in the park./When it starts to rain at the park, Baby Bop joins Barney and BJ inside the caboose.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ learns a lesson about bragging when, playing superhero CAPTAIN PICKLES, he tells everyone that he can leap over the moon!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Butterflies - Nature Of Things
programme.desc: Baby Bop is sad because she lost her pet caterpillar, Monty. Barney and the others try to help her find it. Baby Bop is surprised to discover Monty inside a chrysalis. Everyone is excited to find Monty—now a beautiful butterfly!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney can't stop snacking on pistachios! Barney helps BJ explore the deeper meaning of team sports and friendships.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Keep On Truckin'
programme.desc: Barney's friends Baby Bop and BJ learn about trucks as they wheel out their favorites and explore the functions and purposes of various trucks. BJ likes helping with his tow truck and Barney helps them see what it's like to be a real truck driver.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Play Piano With Me!
programme.desc: The children learn all about the piano when they play games, listen to real pianos and even play a little themselves.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Splish! Splash!
programme.desc: A "too hot" afternoon becomes a "totally cool" day when Barney introduces his friends to the wonders of water.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Grace’s food drive isn’t going very well until Melanie offers to help. Melanie comes up with the perfect idea to get people to donate – put on a movie premiere in the caboose!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bunches of Boxes!
programme.desc: A day of imaginative play and fun for Barney and his young friends is kicked off by the arrival of a variety of boxes from the "Enjoy-Your-Toys Company." Surprisingly, every box is empty!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Movement - Separation
programme.desc: When some children in the park invite Barney to join them for a race, BJ and Baby Bop decide he'll need their help. They show him several ways to get ready for the big race by warming up and stretching.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: I'm A Builder
programme.desc: When Baby Bop wonders about the noises she hears, Barney explains that the sounds are from big trucks and machines at a nearby construction site. This inspires BJ to build something himself—a wind-up toy robot.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Riffs Musical Zoo - Boats
programme.desc: Everyone is excited about an upcoming trip to the zoo. When the trip is postponed, Riff decides to create a musical zoo. He gathers instruments that sound like real animals. Everyone has a wonderful time at Riff's musical zoo.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Gift Of The Dinos - Winter
programme.desc: It's Christmas and BJ dreams of getting a new baseball glove to go with his baseball, while Riff hopes for new drumsticks to use his drum. Barney reminds them that Christmas is more than just getting gifts and helps them learn the meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop can't find anybody to play with her. When the others see her feeling sad, they decide to play whatever she wants to play. The dinos and kids are planning a camp-out at the park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Stop! Go!
programme.desc: After playing with "Stop" and "Go" signs with Angela, Baby Bop leaves to direct some traffic of her own! Meanwhile, in the caboose, Barney and the kids enjoy a costume parade, a game of "Musical Stop & Go," and some very vigorous body movement.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Riff can’t find his drumsticks anywhere. Barney helps Baby Bop explore many different jobs.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: After BJ loses everyone's tickets to the circus, he learns a valuable lesson about responsibility. Baby Bop discovers a lonely little flower struggling to grow in a shady spot.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ wants to learn Terry's fancy basketball moves. After some advice from Barney, BJ has fun while doing his best! On a campout, Baby Bop sees a falling star and wants to return it to the sky.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When he tries to join some older kids in jump-roping, Daniel fails miserably. He becomes convinced that he’s just too little to do anything right.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A-Counting We Will Go!
programme.desc: Barney and the kids help Baby Bop count to ten by playing games, and visiting a Make-Believe Market.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Three Lines, Three Corners
programme.desc: Barney and his friends play hopscotch—with a twist. Whitney is learning about triangles at school, so Angela created Triangle Hopscotch to help reinforce "triangles."

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ brings his brand-new toy plane to the park. Baby Bop is having a great time playing with her homemade boat.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Best In Show - Ducks And Fish
programme.sub-title: Best In Show - Ducks And Fish
programme.desc: When the kids decide to have a Dog Show to show off their pets, BJ feels a little left out. He doesn't have a dog, and he sure wishes he did! A friend from the park shares her dog with BJ so he can join in the fun.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ is pretending to be a great detective, and needs a mystery to solve! Barney sees Riff protecting a nest full of duck eggs.

channel.desc: Join Barney & Friends for adventures, songs, dancing and lots of fun every day on Pluto TV. In Barney's world, sharing and caring are key!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hot Wheels
programme.desc: '70s sand rail dune racer with rally hemi heads; 1965 replica Mustang pool table; off-road racing gear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction
programme.desc: Knowing that Hollywood auctions are hit-and-miss, Allen and Ton buy inexpensive lockers that contain a polygraph machine, a samurai sword and a pair of Civil War shotguns.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Friends in Hawaii Places
programme.desc: Allen &Ton enlist an assistant, Carolyn, and Allen's Hawaiian buddy, Junior, to help them battle local buyers. The guys find a WWII-era motor scooter and a stash of antique Polynesian tattoo tools that get used on Ton!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fake Punt Payoff
programme.desc: Ton and Allen contend with a large crowd of inexperienced auction-buyers at a huge storage container auction in Pasadena. They find a small fleet of Segway personal transporters and an enormous custom-made shotgun.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Bowling Pin Payday
programme.desc: Allen & Ton visit Ton's old stompin' ground and go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They uncover a 19th century rifle with a matching cutlass bayonet and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the early 1960's!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Ton and Allen duke it out with a local thrift store gang at a Brooklyn storage auction. The guys discover a classic arcade redemption game and a mid-century water cannon designed to fight towering infernos!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Diesel Digs
programme.desc: The guys head to the industrial hub of LA to score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 Frontloader, one of the first powered by a diesel engine and a trench-defending WWI German Sturmtrupp helmet bashing mace.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Friends in Hawaii Places
programme.desc: Allen &Ton enlist an assistant, Carolyn, and Allen's Hawaiian buddy, Junior, to help them battle local buyers. The guys find a WWII-era motor scooter and a stash of antique Polynesian tattoo tools that get used on Ton!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Labor of Love
programme.desc: Harley Davidson V-twin EVO engine and revolutionary 1958 dual-suspension swingarm frame; '80s Ms. Pac-Man arcade machine; rare Air Jordan vintage shoe collection in mint condition.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Strat'ed for Cash
programme.desc: On a limited budget in the historic L.A. neighborhood of West Adams, Allen and Ton still win three lockers and find a Maui Blue Fender Stratocaster and a 1930s Schwinn bike.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hidden Hot Wheels
programme.desc: Ton and Allen challenge a big time auction buyer on his home turf. The guys uncover a 1969 Chevelle Malibu muscle car and a single-shot pistol designed to aid Allied resistance fighters during WWII.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Battle Bought
programme.desc: Mint 1800s French "Harmonica Pistol" and a collection of '90s remote controlled combat robots.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Hot Commodity
programme.desc: Allen is late to the auction, leaving Ton to battle a feisty female auction buyer on his own! The guys find a fully functional flamethrower and a rare hand-carved bow and arrow set from South America!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Top Gun Ton
programme.desc: Scale RC Viper FanJet aircraft with a potent jet engine; 1920s Gundlach Korona large format field camera used for photography expeditions. Ton pilots a plane, but crashes and burns.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Beantown Bidders
programme.desc: 1800s blackpowder whaling harpoon; 1940s Schwinn Town & Country tandem bicycle; a vintage American flag collection that could be worth thousands.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Shuffle
programme.desc: Ton and Allen teach a cocky new auction hunter a lesson. They spot a 1940's-era shuffleboard table and uncover an early hot rod made from the fuel tank of a WWII fighter plane!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangster Whiskey
programme.desc: Allen and Ton trek to an auction in Moreno Valley, CA, where two locker wins yield a vintage jukebox, a valuable baseball card and a Prohibition-era moonshine still.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Ton and Allen duke it out with a local thrift store gang at a Brooklyn storage auction. The guys discover a classic arcade redemption game and a mid-century water cannon designed to fight towering infernos!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Driller Instinct
programme.desc: Ton & Allen encounter aggressive outdoorsmen in the Alaskan wilderness. The guys discover an 8-wheeled ATV that travels on both land & water and an air percussion hammer that can drill through solid rock!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Everything's Bigger in Texas
programme.desc: Winchester 1886 rifle invented to kill buffalo; collection of 1950s electric Slot Cars.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Quadzilla Attacks!
programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Lads Trip

programme.desc: Her nephew, the make-up artist who specializes in gore, left her car a "bloody" mess after he hit a tree on the way to work and she wants Judge Rhonda to make him clean up the damage.

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 99
programme.desc: It is no laughing matter for Judge Rhonda when a comedian won't pay her cousin back for a $5,000 loan after a smash and grab car thief took her cash and gun.

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 49
programme.desc: When a Funk Trap singer moves to the ATL to level up his music career, Judge Rhonda is faced with a song and dance about sold furniture, an unpaid phone bill, and an old tune called Rent.

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 68
programme.desc: When the cousin they grew up with and his girlfriend back out of the house these four were going to rent together just before the move in date, Judge Rhonda must decide who ran afoul of detrimental reliance.

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 140
programme.desc: Brothers face Judge Rhonda through the lens of a broken camera that the younger one claims the older brother destroyed on an alcohol-fueled day at the lake.

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 66
programme.desc: A simple video with a "tall beer toast" went viral, generated a $2,200 payment, and brought a formerly close brother and sister to Judge Rhonda.

programme.title: Relative Justice
programme.desc: What goes up must come down is an investment strategy Judge Rhonda has to explain to a neice who's favorite Uncle has lost a lot of her money on Wall Street.

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 148
programme.desc: A younger sister hauls her older brother to Judge Rhonda's court to get him to pay back the many bar tabs she has paid when she's had to pick him up drunk from various bars around his college.

programme.title: Relative Justice
programme.desc: When a dad takes a fancy, fast car from his son's car lot to take a lady friend on a 100 mph joy ride two of them dead end in front of Judge Rhonda.

programme.title: Relative Justice
programme.desc: A couple in crisis comes to Judge Rhonda's court looking for answers about co-parenting their children after drugs, alcohol and infidelity have poisoned their relationship.

programme.title: Relative Justice: Relative Justice
programme.desc: Judge Rhonda faces a family in crisis; mom and step dad claim their daughter is mentally unstable, uses drugs and steals from their company.

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 33
programme.desc: Drag Queens married to each other face Judge Rhonda over a beautiful performance garment that just doesn't fit anymore.

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 64
programme.desc: When an older sister became the legal "mother" for her two young sisters, she and her husband paid all of their bills; now that one is a grown exotic dancer money makes them face Judge Rhonda.

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 75
programme.desc: A designer handbag trampled at a party drags two close cousins into court where Judge Rhonda must figure out if the purse is real or a fake.

programme.title: Relative Justice

programme.desc: Judge Rhonda sorts out the dispute between a mother who said go to College or pay the bills and her son who tried to choose a third option.

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 44

programme.title: Relative Justice

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 18

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 8

programme.title: Relative Justice: Episode 55
programme.desc: Judge Rhonda confronts a family in crisis with a mother trying to protect her daughter from the man she lives with; violence and heartbreak are consuming this family.

channel.desc: Under the watchful eye of Judge Rhonda Wills, the show pulls back the curtain on family disputes, moving the drama from the dining room to the courtroom.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Scuba Doobie-doo
programme.desc: A scuba diver is found dead, fully equipped with an oxygen tank, on a tree in a burned forest.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Pilot
programme.desc: A murder appears to be a suicide with very little evidence.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Cool Change
programme.desc: A man is killed after winning a fortune and then dumping his girlfriend. So, Grissom, Nick, and newcomer to the CSI team, Sara Sidle, investigate this one.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Crate 'N Burial
programme.desc: Grissom, Nick, and Sara search for a kidnapped woman and find more than they expected. Catherine and Warrick investigate the hit-and-run death of a little girl.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Pledging Mr. Johnson
programme.desc: Grissom and Catherine investigate when a leg is found severed from a body in a lake. Meanwhile, Sara and Nick investigate a fraternity pledging gone terribly wrong.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Friends & Lovers
programme.desc: Grissom and Warrick take the case of a young man who is found naked in the desert without an obvious cause of death.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Who Are You?
programme.desc: Catherine violates department protocol when she takes the case of a rape accusation against her ex-husband. Warrick and Sara search for the missing bullet that will either exonerate or indict a cop for murder.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Blood Drops
programme.desc: When a teenager and her sister are the sole survivors of the gruesome murder of four members of one family in a quiet suburban neighborhood, Grissom and his entire team investigate the crime.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Anonymous
programme.desc: Royce Harmon was murdered 3 months ago in a scene staged to look like a suicide. Now another murder has taken place. Whoever the killer is he has a thorough knowledge of forensics, he purposefully has left evidence, and has baffled Grissom and his team.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Unfriendly Skies
programme.desc: Grissom and his team investigate the death of a first class passenger on a flight to Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Alter Boys
programme.desc: A woman is found dead at a spa while a young man is found burying dead bodies.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Caged
programme.desc: A woman is found dead in a locked room while another died when her car is hit by a train.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: And Then There Were None
programme.desc: A casino is brutally robbed by four trigger-happy men wearing wigs. Painstaking identification efforts lead to ex-con serial killer Tammy Felton and accomplices, but one by one they are found murdered themselves.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Ellie
programme.desc: The investigation of the death of a petty con man and drug mule leads the CSI team to Brass' daughter Ellie.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Organ Grinder
programme.desc: When businessman Robert Fairmont is found almost dead in a hotel elevator, the CSI team assume the case. They find evidence of heavy metal poisoning. When they look for the corpse, it has been cremated and the organs donated.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: You’ve Got Male
programme.desc: When a young woman riding a horse finds a body of a woman inside a pipe in a construction site, Grissom and his team investigate the murder. Soon they find another woman's body and coroner Dr. Albert 'Al' Robbins notes that the women were sisters.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: The Finger
programme.desc: Wealthy Roy Logan acts suspiciously when withdrawing $1m cash with blood on his hands, but must be released for lack of a crime. When Catherine rushes after him with his spectacles, she gets a phone call saying Logan's lover Amanda Freeman was kidnapped.

channel.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation, the series that reinvented the procedural drama, is now streaming 24/7 on Pluto TV. Follow the original cast as they uncover the clues, interrogate the suspects, and shine a UV light on the sins of Sin City.

programme.title: Murder Book
programme.desc: A veteran investigator is brought out of retirement to close the case of a policeman who was murdered.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A dedicated mother disappears from suburban Los Angeles, leaving behind three kids and a husband she planned to divorce. Law enforcement determines she's been the victim of a homicide but it takes them nearly two decades to unravel the mystery.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A heartbroken millionaire marries a much younger woman, ending with a shotgun blast to the stomach and a lethal dose of poison.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: When a Southern California high school teacher suddenly dies, it appears his death was due to natural causes, but once law enforcement starts looking into his widow, they uncover her treacherous past and her preference for using poison to kill.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: After months of investigation, cops make two discoveries that confirm an expectant mum who disappeared on Christmas Eve had been targeted for murder.

programme.title: Donal MacIntyre: Murder Files
programme.desc: Donal MacIntyre interviews former Detective Chief Inspector Sue Hill to discover how she crossed Europe to bring justice to the family of murdered Jeshma Raithatha.

programme.title: Homicide's Elite
programme.desc: Officers rush to an apartment to a robbery that's in progress, and arrive to find a man who has jumped to his death. Vince and Quinn must determine who is responsible.

programme.title: The Truth About My Murder
programme.desc: Dr Richard Shepherd investigates the cold case murder of Linda Curry, whose greed-driven husband poisoned her with nicotine in 1994 by injecting her with fatal levels while she slept.

programme.title: The Truth About My Murder
programme.desc: Forensic pathologist Dr Richard Shepherd investigates the horrific murder of Deborah Chong, whose remains were found in Devon in 2021 after a fellow churchgoer killed her in her own London home.

programme.title: The Truth About My Murder
programme.desc: Dr Richard Shepherd investigates the murder of Laureline Garcia-Bertaux, who seemingly vanished from her London home in 2019 before police discovered her body buried in her garden.

programme.title: Voice of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Jennifer Pan witnessed the murder of her mother and the attempted murder of her father. But when he wakes from a coma, her father has a very different story to tell.

programme.title: Voice of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: How do the FBI find a killer with no victim or geographic profile and who covers his trail with counter forensics. And if they can find him, how would they prove responsibility?

programme.title: Voice of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, author Helen Bailey found happiness in a new partner. But when she disappears two years later, friends and family start to ask questions.

programme.title: Donal MacIntyre: Murder Files
programme.desc: Donal MacIntyre interviews former Detective Chief Inspector Clive Driscoll to discover how his determination led to the capture of the men who had murdered Stephen Lawrence.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: Baffled by the animal instincts of a cross-country killer whose crimes seem to go dormant in winter, authorities follow his tracks to a den of deceit in the frozen tundra of Alaska.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: An Alaskan gold miner and political activist vanishes without a trace.

programme.title: Murder: Fight for the Truth

channel.desc: TRUE CRIME UK dissects authentic criminal cases through expert-led documentaries and series. Through first-hand interviews, key evidence, cutting-edge forensic technologies and investigative tools.

programme.desc: This one-hour special chronicles Les's first time surviving for the cameras in August of 2001. With just two cameras, a few items and his wits, Les survives in the Canadian wild.

programme.title: Survivorman: Patagonia
programme.desc: Survivorman has always been to teach the right way, the safe way, to instruct outdoor enthusiasts on when not to take chances and not go over the top, to avoid landing themselves in peril.

programme.title: Survivorman: Mystery of Bigfoot Mountain

programme.title: Survivorman: Hunting in Temagami
programme.desc: After all his years of wilderness survival, the forests of Ontario's Temagami still rank as some of the most difficult, harrowing and challenging survival experiences Les has ever faced.

programme.title: Survivorman: Argentina

programme.title: Survivorman: MacGyverisms
programme.desc: This show features Les' best tips and tricks, the methods that Les has created over his 25-year career of surviving that he calls McGyverisms.

programme.title: Survivorman: Portland Oregon

programme.title: Survivorman: Legend of Klemtu Hill

programme.title: Survivorman: Utah Canyonlands

programme.title: Survivorman: Nevada
programme.desc: Les simulates a trail runner becoming lost in the woods for 24 hours.

programme.title: Survivorman: Costa Rica

programme.title: Survivorman: The Lost Pilot Winter

programme.title: Survivorman: Temagami Forest

channel.desc: Outdoorsman and survival expert Les Stroud permits himself to be stranded for a week in a remote location with no equipment or supplies apart from his one-man camera rig, documenting his experience and providing insight into how to manage the wilderness.

channel.desc: A factual documentary channel following police units as they serve and protect within their communities.

programme.desc: Andy's world explodes when a fresh-faced university student is killed in a random shooting, and a bullet hits Andy, lodging in her vest.

programme.title: Renegade: Sins of the Father
programme.desc: Dutch Dixon's son Donnie gets out of prison and decides that he will sell his father up the river for the right price.

programme.title: The Debt Collector
programme.desc: French is a martial artist that takes on a job as a mob debt collector in order to make ends meet. He does whatever it takes to chase down individuals until he meets a bartender that makes him question whether he should do the right thing.

programme.title: Recoil
programme.desc: A cop turns vigilante after his family is murdered, exacting vengeance on the killers - and then on all criminals who have slipped through the system.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A respected doctor must race against time to find a cure for a lethal virus, unleashed by a paramilitary militia leader. Starring: Steven Seagal, L.Q. Jones, Gailard Sartain, Camilla Belle, Brad Leland

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it. Feat: Mel Gibson.

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.

programme.title: The Green Hornet: Disaster Rides the Rails
programme.desc: Our hero, Britt Reid, battling the crime ring in a mayoralty election, secures evidence that ballot boxes have been "stuffed." The ring candidate is elected, and The Sentinel demands a court order for a recount.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Incognito
programme.desc: Retrieving a mythical lancet, Sydney and Nigel run into Nigel's look-alike just before his death. Nigel gets a cut from the lancet. Later, Cate persuades Nigel to impersonate the man.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: All Choked Up
programme.desc: Carson Inez, a collector, uses an ancient necklace to get Sydney to help her in raising Athena who will then help her conquer the world.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Warlock of Nu Theta Phi
programme.desc: When Sydney's student Meg's roommate finds a witch's amulet, it hospitalizes Meg. Meg's boyfriend's fraternity brother races to get the amulet. What is he up to?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: While Sydney is lecturing about the Native Americans who faced a mysterious cataclysm 600 years earlier, a native brings her a relic from that era. What is its secret?

channel.desc: It’s time to go into overdrive by jumping off buildings, flying a burning plane, driving in a car chase and saving the world. Pluto TV Action brings you blockbusters, stars, and a strong dose of high-octane excitement.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Forge of Creation
programme.desc: Lili, Vorjak, and the baby flee to find a shuttle to escape Earth. Liam and Sandoval are both tracking them - for different reasons. Augur is on the run from volunteers, but sends a friend (Juliet) to help Liam while he's gone.

programme.title: Extraterrestrial
programme.desc: A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors. Starring: Brittany Allen, Freddie Stroma, Jesse Moss

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two crew members of a spaceship wake up from hypersleep to discover that all their colleagues are missing. Despite this, it appears that they are not alone. Starring: Dennis Quaid, Ben Foster, Cam Gigandet

programme.title: Prospect
programme.desc: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote alien moon to harvest the moon's elusive gems.

programme.title: Perfect
programme.desc: Executive produced by Steven Soderbergh, PERFECT is a BLACK MIRROR-esque slice of twisted science fiction.

programme.title: Queen of Outer Space
programme.desc: American astronauts are drawn by a mysterious force to the planet Venus, which they find to be inhabited only by beautiful women and their despotic queen.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: First of its Kind
programme.desc: Following Boone's confrontation with Hegel that left him severely injured, he was eliminated by Zo'or. Beckett who was impregnated by Hegel gives birth to a boy who immediately grows up to a man.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Avatus
programme.desc: Da'an looses his contact with the the Taelon Commonality. This causes him to change and Zo'or instructs that Da'an must be killed; because he's now considered a threat.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: A Stitch in Time
programme.desc: An exhibition for the first arrival of the Taelons showcases different artifacts. An artifact causes Liam to travel to an alternate time. Zo'or questions how Da'an was able to rejoin the Commonality.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dimensions
programme.desc: Liam and Augur are in a Taelon shuttle craft, when something happens they get thrown into a parallel universe. They discover that humanity is at war with the Taelons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Moonscape
programme.desc: Augur is forced to take part in a Taelon experiment. Da'an and Liam try to convince Zo'or that altering minds and implanting humans to make them aggressive to fight the Jaridians is not the correct path. Maiya makes contact with Sandoval.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Sleepers
programme.desc: A Jaridian probe lands on Earth and begins sucking energy from the Comonality. The Taelons use humans in a near-death state to keep their connection while Lili and Sandoval try to find out what is draining the energy.

channel.desc: Explore the farthest reaches of space, battle evil robots, and travel through time on Pluto TV Sci-Fi, the mothership for the best science fiction and fantasy movies in the galaxy, beaming up to you 24 hours a day.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu heads to Portsmouth to cook a meal for comedian Rosie Jones. Rosie is on tour and is desperate for some quality fish and chips. In an attempt to meet her expectations, Zuu goes out for a spot of fishing.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu goes regal as he visits Royal Leamington Spa to prepare a feast for actor and comedian Guz Khan. In order to impress Guz, Zuu sets out to prepare both meat-based and plant-based dishes.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu is back home in London as he prepares to cook for comedian Phil Wang whilst he tours with his show. Eager to impress, Zuu's mum is enlisted to help make the perfect jollof rice.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu and the boys are going international flying all the way to the Isle of Man to cook for comedian, Josh Widdicombe, who on his Bit Much tour. However, first they will need to source a new food truck on the island.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu heads to Soho to see if he can meet the culinary expectations of comedian London Hughes. To make his task even more interesting, London makes a £1,000 wager that he won't be able to impress her.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu takes his food van to Manchester in order to prepare a slap-up meal for comedian Ed Gamble. The fact that Ed is a self-confessed cheese lover gives Zuu plenty of options when it comes to deciding what to cook.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
