programme.title: Eddie Eats America
programme.desc: Eddie squares up to the fearsome Mac & Cheese Challenge at Brooklyn's Mac Shack, which weighs in at more than two kilograms and nearly 7,000 calories of pasta, cheese and sauce.

programme.title: Eddie Eats America

programme.title: Eddie Eats America

programme.title: Eddie Eats America

programme.title: Eddie Eats America
programme.desc: Eddie visits the Garden State for a supersized breakfast in a New Jersey diner, a tryout with ice hockey pros the NJ Devils and a struggle with an eight-hot-dog challenge.

programme.title: Eddie Eats America

programme.title: Eddie Eats America

programme.title: Eddie Eats America

programme.title: Mob Wives starts at 9pm
programme.desc: Welcome to Staten Island, the land of fierce women who never admit to being allegedly "connected" - until now. Left alone to pick up the pieces, these women face the harsh realities of "life" after informants have turned their families' lives upside down.

programme.title: Mob Wives: New Year, New War
programme.desc: Renee is amped to finally get on the table for her full body makeover, but it suddenly turns into her plastic surgery nightmare. Drita and Carla are ready to dive into summer fun as newly single ladies.

programme.title: Mob Wives: Hell on Heels
programme.desc: We're back on the scene at Renee's 'Celebration of Life' extravaganza and Drita's make-up talk with Karen takes a vicious turn. Ramona gets hit in the crossfire. The girl fight escalates into an all out mob brawl.

programme.title: Mob Wives: Make-Ups And Break-Ups
programme.desc: In the aftermath of Renee's 'Celebration of Life' party, Renee takes up her issues with the ladies violent behavior and sets out to confront Carla. After a night of partying with Karen, new mob wife 'cousin'

programme.title: Mob Wives: Old Friends, New Arch Enemies
programme.desc: As tensions flare between Ramona and Carla, Drita takes further steps to finalize her divorce.

programme.title: Mob Wives: Fights and Facials

programme.title: Mob Wives: Mob Daughters
programme.desc: After an intense couples counseling session, Renee faces the harsh realities that the fairytale life with Junior she's always dreamed of may be nothing but a nightmare. Karen begins to promote her tell all book 'Mob Daughter'.

programme.title: Mob Wives: Tricks Or Treats?

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: A killer, who stalked and gained his victim's trust, enticed her to her death. Almost two decades later scientific advances brought the perpetrator to justice.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: A man returning from a family visit stops to help what appears to be a stranded group on the Belt Parkway in Brooklyn, NY. Half an hour later, he is found dead.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: In January 1992, when an estate agent went missing, both police and her family feared the worst. For 25-year-old Stephanie Slater, it was the start of an 8 day ordeal defined by torture and terror.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: December 1986: Helle Craft was reported missing. Police questioned her husband, he claimed she was visiting her mum. From interviews with loved ones it became apparent something sinister had happened.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: On 17th September 2006, emergency services were called to a blaze in Pinyon Pines. A house was engulfed in flames and three burned bodies were discovered inside. It soon became clear this was no accident.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: In August 2015, Jeanette and Jeffrey Navin were reported missing to police in Easton. An investigation began and it quickly became clear it wasn't a missing persons case, something sinister had happened.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The Fridge Killer follows the investigation into a truly spine-chilling murder in Nevada, that led police to uncover a serial killer.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Following the investigation into the murder of Dr. Teresa Sievers, which pioneered a forensic technique that solved the case.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The 36 year investigation into Virginia Freeman's murder and the forensics that identified her killer.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The Murder of Susannah Chase follows the investigation into her harrowing murder and how forensics helped track down her killer.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Laura Garza told friends she was going on a night out at the Marquee Club. When she didn't show for work the next day a search ensued to find her as well as the men she left with.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Mary Ann Perez left a bar just outside of New Orleans. Early the next morning, her family received a call from an anonymous woman, mentioning Mary had run into car trouble. She never returned home.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The story of the tragic murder of Brett Wentworth, how police tracked his killer down and how advanced forensic technology was key to solving the case.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: When Wendy Speakes was found dead wearing a strangers' shoes, police launched an investigation into who could have murdered a well-loved member of a quiet community.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.sub-title: The Murders of Sharon, Zarah and Nadia Whelan
programme.desc: Sharon Whelan and her two daughters were murdered in their home on Christmas eve by a cold and calculating killer. Multi-discipline forensics uncovered his horrific actions and brought him to justice.

channel.desc: The series relives some landmark criminal cases of recent times where these new and innovative investigative techniques have changed the course of the investigations and dramatically assisted detectives in bringing the guilty to justice.

programme.title: South Park: Tonsil Trouble
programme.desc: Tonsil Trouble: A botched blood transfusion results in Cartman getting AIDS. How far will he go to find a cure? Kyle had better watch out... (S12, E01)

programme.title: South Park: Britney's New Look
programme.desc: Britney's New Look: The media circus arrives in South Park as Britney Spears hides in the town. After a photo of her urinating on a ladybug sells for $100,000 the boys have a brain wave. (S12, E02)

programme.title: South Park: Major B**bage
programme.desc: Major B**bage: The hysterical parents of South Park have another reason to panic after 'cheesing' becomes popular among kids. Kenny becomes addicted to the out-of-this-world hallucinations. (S12, E03)

programme.title: South Park: Canada on Strike
programme.desc: Canada on Strike: Canada is brought to the brink of collapse after a drawn out strike in pursuit of 'some of that internet money'. Can the boys save the day with a "YouToob" sensation? (S12, E04)

programme.title: South Park: Eek, A Pen*s!
programme.desc: Eek, A Pen*s! Ms. Garrison wants to become a man again, so whilst she is away Cartman becomes the sub teacher. It's not long before Cartman is teaching innercity kids the fun of cheating! (S12, E05)

programme.title: South Park: Over Logging
programme.desc: Over Logging: Panic reigns as South Park finds that the internet's gone! The Marshes decide to go hunting for the internet in California and end up in an "internet refugee camp". (S12, E06)

programme.title: South Park: Super Fun Time
programme.desc: Super Fun Time: The kids go on a field trip to a 'living museum'. A hostage situation ensues when robbers use the place to evade police. It's up to Cartman and Butters to save the day! (S12, E07)

programme.title: South Park: The China Probrem
programme.desc: The China Probrem: Alarmed by the grandeur of the Olympic ceremonies, Cartman enlists Butters to help him confront the Chinese. (S12, E08)

programme.title: South Park: Chef Aid
programme.desc: Chef Aid: Chef realises that Alanis Morissette's (fictional) hit song "Stinky Britches" is a song that he wrote years ago but the record company aren't interested in giving him any credit. (S2, E14)

programme.title: South Park: Spooky Fish
programme.desc: Spooky Fish: When Stan is given a fish by his Aunt, he has a feeling there's something not quite right about it. Sure enough it's not long before there's evil goings on. (In spooky vision!) (S2, E15)

programme.title: South Park: Merry Christmas Charlie Manson
programme.desc: Merry Christmas, Charlie Manson!: Cartman's Uncle Howard escapes from prison with another inmate, Charlie Manson. The boys want to go see Mr Hankey at the mall but no one will take them. (S2, E16)

programme.title: South Park: Gnomes
programme.desc: Gnomes (a.k.a. Underpants Gnomes): The boys must write an essay for school. Tweek suggests they write about gnomes that visit him every night and steal his pants. What will they discover? (S2, E17)

programme.title: South Park: Rainforest Shmainforest
programme.desc: Rainforest Schmainforest: The boys go to the Costa Rican rainforest as a part of the "Getting Gay With Kids" choir tour, but Cartman is on a mission to cause havoc. Jennifer Aniston guests. (S3, E01)

programme.title: South Park: Spontaneous Combustion
programme.desc: Spontaneous Combustion: The citizens of South Park are randomly exploding and it's up to Stan to find the cause. Kyle discovers his dad is having problems with erectile dysfunction. (S3, E02)

programme.title: South Park: Succubus
programme.desc: The Succubus (a.k.a. Chef's Mama): The boys discover that Chef has a new girl who has changed him from a free-spirited, soul-singing hipster to that of a mediocre, religious paper pusher. (S3, E03)

programme.title: South Park: Tweek Vs. Craig
programme.desc: Tweek vs. Craig: The boys coerce two of their classmates, Tweek and Craig, into a schoolyard fight. Craig learns martial arts with the aid of Cartman. Tweek is taught to box by Uncle Jimbo. (S3, E05)

programme.title: South Park: Jakovasaurs
programme.desc: Jakovasaurs: While camping, the boys discover the last two Jakovasaurs (a parody of Jar Jar Binks) on the planet. Will the townsfolk welcome them with open arms or find them very annoying? (S3, E04)

programme.title: South Park: Korn's Groovy Pirate Ghost Mystery
programme.desc: Korn's Groovy Pirate Ghost Mystery: The boys are being plagued by the 5th graders and South Park is overrun by Pirate Ghosts. Nu-Metal band Korn must save the day! (Scooby-Doo parody). (S3, E10)

programme.title: South Park: Hooked on Monkey Fonics
programme.desc: Hooked on Monkey Fonics: The boys compete against a couple of home schooled kids in South Park's annual spelling bee. (S3, E12)

programme.title: South Park: The Red Badge of Gayness
programme.desc: The Red Badge of Gayness: Cartman bets the boys he can win a Civil War re-enactment leading the Confederates. When things don't go to plan it's time for a booze fuelled rampage! (S3, E14)

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: As the semifinals draw near, Bigger Brother makes its mark in the arena, as it takes on Colossus and Typhoon 2 in round one. Round two sees DisConstructor tackle Xenomorph, Hammerhead 2 and Iron-Awe 2.1.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Firestorm makes a long-awaited comeback in a battle against Daisy-Cutter, Black and Blue, and Bamm Bamm. Heat P determines the robots who will make it to the semi-finals of the seventh series.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Eight competitors compete for a spot in the next semi-final round as half are eliminated. Round 1 sees Tornado employ the use of a spinner drum to flip its opponent.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The four victors from the round 1 semifinal compete for a place in the grand final. Round 1 sees Firestorm 5 go head-to-head with Mute, in a flipping assault.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: In the eliminating rounds, Tornado takes on Storm 2, and X-Terminator challenges Typhoon 2, in a fierce attack that takes out the disc weapon of Typhoon 2.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six robots fight until one is taken down. The remaining fighters regroup and continue until only one remains. Round one begins in a merciless fashion as Ripper flips Robochicken.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Extreme
programme.desc: The heavyweights take a back seat as the middleweights, lightweights, featherweights, and antweights take to the floor, but being smaller does not mean they do not bite.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: Behind-the-scenes footage of Heat L of `Robot Wars: The Second Wars', including video diaries of the Angel of Death, Tender Caress, Havoc and Haardvark teams preparing their robots for the main competition.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: Featuring behind-the-scenes footage of the semi-final round of `Robot Wars: The Second Wars', including highlights and interviews surrounding the Pinball Trial and Arena battle events.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: Behind-the-scenes footage of the second semi-final of `Robot Wars: The Second Wars', beginning with recaps of the second group of six competitors to reach that stage of the main competition.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: Four robotic warriors have battled their way to the Grand Final. The other competitors have been sent to a scrapheap. A look at what it's like behind the scenes of the most intense stage of the competition.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The reigning champions Apollo mount their defence of the title. They face stiff competition from Ms Nightshade, Coyote, Rusty, Crackers'N'Smash, Meggamouse, Trolley Rage and Carbide.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: It is the grand final and the teams must dodge the arena hazards and, in a menacing new twist, they can also hit the Arena Tyre to unleash the dreaded House Robots, allowing them to inflict maximum damage anywhere in the arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Heat number 11 of the series sees controversy as T-Wrecks makes a bold move that breaks the rule about having an active weapon. Round one pits Mantis, Infernal Contraption, Bulldog Breed and Jabber against one another.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Eight robots enter the arena, including old crowd favourite, Behemoth. Heat L also features a grudge match to settle the score between Behemoth and Crushtacean.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Champion robot Panic Attack returns in the thirteenth heat of the series. A series 5 round is replicated as the Four Horsemen and Team Panic Attack are once again pitted against each another.

channel.desc: Mech+ is the home of Robot Wars, remastered in HD for the first time! Mech+ features every series of Robot Wars UK, both classics and the revival seasons, and also includes never before seen episodes considered ‘lost media’.

programme.title: A Haunting: Immortal Love
programme.desc: Shortly after Whitney's family moving into their first home, a restless spirit shatters the serenity of their suburban life. Whitney calls in a paranormal team who uncover the truth behind the spirit's tragic death and his intense obsession with Whitney.

programme.title: A Haunting: Evil Rises
programme.desc: After a major surgery forces Jacinda Rearick to recuperate at home, she discovers orbs in family photos. At first, Jacinda believes that they are her deceased parents watching over her. But something much more sinister is invading her home.

programme.title: A Haunting: Conjuring Evil
programme.desc: Harold and Cindy have found the perfect retreat in suburban Alaska for their family. But after their daughter begins to experiment in witchcraft, she unknowingly attracts the attention of a dark entity. Harold calls in experts to help reclaim the home.

programme.title: A Haunting: Hidden Terror
programme.desc: After Mike and Lisa move in their new house, Lisa’s personality begins to change dramatically.

programme.title: A Haunting: Nightmare Upstairs
programme.desc: The VanLandingham family moves to a larger house in the small town of Wynne, Arkansas. What they first consider "house-settling" noise and behavior quickly turns into a full-scale supernatural physical attack on both daughters Brianna and Heather.

programme.title: A Haunting: House of Nightmares
programme.desc: When Tracey Berrios experiences paranormal activity inside her new home, she suspects spirits tied to the house's history. But after something evil attacks Tracey, she fears for the safety of her family and turns to paranormal investigators for help.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Wheatsheaf Horror
programme.desc: New owners of the Wheatsheaf Pub find bits of clothing and bones behind the walls.

programme.title: A Haunting: Child’s Play
programme.desc: The loving spirit of Chris' late grandmother is watching over his close-knit family. But she is trying to warn them: a fierce and relentless demon has crept into their home. Chris reaches out to a paranormal team and a demonologist to battle the demon.

programme.title: A Haunting: Black Magic
programme.desc: During the renovation of her 150-year-old Pennsylvania home, Debbie Guy accepts the old house has a ghost and they will have to live with it. But when family members are tormented by an evil entity, Debbie seeks the help of paranormal investigators.

programme.title: A Haunting: Face Of Evil
programme.desc: Joy, a working mother of three, assumes a girl's weekend at a haunted plantation will be a pleasant change of pace. But after she returns, her youngest child's sleep is shattered by the ominous presence of a dark phantom.

programme.title: A Haunting: Ghost Hunter
programme.desc: Stacy is a paranormal investigator. When a demon attacks her son she asks a colleague for help.

programme.title: A Haunting: Ghost Confessions
programme.desc: An unknown entity appears to find pleasure in terrifying 17-year-old Macy Sherman, her younger sister Kelsey and their mom Carrie. The family reaches out for help, praying that they can get rid of the spirit intent on staying in their home forever.

programme.title: A Haunting: Ghost Fury
programme.desc: Shortly after Alicia and Scott Cain move into a farmhouse in the quiet Ohio countryside, they learn their home was the site of a brutal murder decades earlier. Plagued by the ghosts of this horrific event, they call in the Fourman Brothers to investigate.

programme.title: A Haunting: Hidden Terror
programme.desc: After Mike and Lisa move in their new house, Lisa’s personality begins to change dramatically.

programme.title: A Haunting: Ghostly Voices
programme.desc: Angelina Balistreri believes her home is haunted by a harmless ghost, while her husband, Emiliano, is skeptical of the paranormal. They call in a priest and medium who makes contact with a troubled ghost and helps him cross over and find peace.

programme.title: A Haunting: Mind Control
programme.desc: When William falls ill, Amanda Morrison's family volunteer to clean his home. But after the family stumbles across satanic objects in the home, strange things start happening. A demonologist cleanses the home and discovers the reason behind the haunting.

channel.desc: The terrifying 'true' stories of the paranormal told by the people who experienced them. Watch, as the mystery and origin of each haunting unravels. By the end, you will be left with the sense that life and death are far stranger than you ever imagined.

programme.title: Medium: Lucky
programme.desc: Allison is disturbed when she has a dream about the death of her step-brother but is more concerned with his mental health when he shows up on her doorstep.

programme.title: Medium: Jump Start
programme.desc: Allison finds herself drawn to a cliff only to discover the body of a dead girl and learns that the only suspect is another lawyer.

programme.title: Medium: A Couple of Choices
programme.desc: Allison helps a detective solve a cluster of investigations that everyone believes are murder-suicides, but he believes are homicides.

programme.title: Medium: Coded
programme.desc: Allison and Joe must come to terms with the reality that their daughter Ariel shares Allison's supernatural gift.

programme.title: Medium: I Married a Mind Reader

programme.title: Medium: A Priest, A Doctor, And A Medium Walk Into An Execution Chamber

programme.title: Medium: Being Mrs. O'Leary's Cow

programme.title: Medium: Penny for your Thoughts

programme.title: Medium: In The Rough

programme.title: Medium: The Song Remains the Same
programme.desc: Musical lyrics lead Allison on a wild goose chase to find a missing coed.

programme.title: Medium: Time Out of Mind
programme.desc: Allison discovers unsettling news when Medical Records from the 1950s document a mentally ill woman claiming to have been Allison Dubois.

programme.title: Medium: Light Sleeper
programme.desc: Allison is prescribed anti-anxiety medicine after a traumatizing sleepwalking incident.

programme.title: Medium: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Allison searches for the missing daughter of a city councilman while looking for a long-lost friend.

programme.title: Medium: Dead Aim
programme.desc: Allison goes head-to-head against another psychic in a murder trial.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 13
programme.desc: Steve and the team find themselves in deep water when they attempt to recover a car that has crashed into a river. Jim is tasked with recovering a van that has become wedged on top of a garden wall.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 14
programme.desc: Steve battles rush hour traffic to manoeuvre his recovery vehicle around the narrow roads to get to a 7.5-tonne lorry out of a ditch, while Rory must deliver a dodgy van to a scrapyard for destruction.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 15
programme.desc: Lantern's only female driver Merrie is tasked with the removal of an abandoned lorry, but it is soon clear this will not be a routine job. As she takes a closer look, she discovers that not only has the lorry been used as a mobile home, but that it is hou

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 16
programme.desc: Rory risks life and limb to recovered a skip lorry from the M1. Jim has a happy reunion with his own truck. Chris has to find a way of separating two HGVs that have somehow become wedged together.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 17
programme.desc: Jim faces mayhem on the motorway when a massive pile-up blocks the busy M1.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 18
programme.desc: Marta and Pat have to pull a bin lorry out of a muddy ditch. But first they must battle their way through a thick wall of thorns.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 19
programme.desc: Jim and Steve face one of their riskiest recoveries when a tanker carrying highly corrosive pure sulphuric acid smashes into the central reservation of a busy A road and overturns.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 20
programme.desc: It is all hands to the pumps at a bus depot in Tamworth, where Crouch's finest are joined by Lanterns' Merrie. Just days after Christmas the owners lost their school coaches to a devastating fire and need the wreckage removed.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 1
programme.desc: A smouldering, 44-tonne food lorry blocks an M1 slip road.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 2
programme.desc: A milk tanker needs rescuing from a boggy field.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 3
programme.desc: Steve goes into battle with a heavyweight transformer.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 4
programme.desc: Nick is tasked with finding a 4 x 4.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 5
programme.desc: Tez rescues a 44 tonne artic from the side of the busy A1.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 6
programme.desc: Stig is reunited with a regular.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 7
programme.desc: Steve and his team must recover a 26 tonne lorry.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 9
programme.desc: Steve makes a grim discovery while trying to lift a truck.

channel.desc: A documentary series following rescue drivers working for two of the UK's leading heavy rescue specialists. We follow the work of the drivers as they endeavor to solve the problems caused by large and heavy vehicles.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 6
programme.desc: Aang and Zuko are taken on parallel adventures that give them insight into their forefathers' pasts, but how does the tale of Roku and Sozin matter to them now?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 7
programme.desc: When Toph discovers a quick way to make cash, Katara disapproves, and the rift between them has disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 8
programme.desc: In a spooky village, Katara makes a special connection; the group investigate strange disappearances that occur during full moons.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 9
programme.desc: On the eve of the eclipse, Aang's worry overtakes him and his dreams become nightmares. Before long, he can't tell the difference between what's real and what's not.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 10
programme.desc: With the day of the eclipse upon them, the kids, along with a ragtag force of old friends, enact their long-planned invasion of the Fire Nation.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 11
programme.desc: As the invasion force fights their way to the Fire Nation capital, the kids help Aang find the Firelord in time for the eclipse, but after a few surprises.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 12
programme.desc: When the group seek refuge at the Western Air temple, they find someone they weren't expecting has been following them and hopes to join their group.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 13
programme.desc: As Zuko teaches Aang firebending, it turns out Aang isn't the only one who needs a lesson. The two set-out to learn the true meaning of Firebending from the original teachers.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 14
programme.desc: Sokka and Zuko head to the Fire Nation's most heavily guarded prison - the Boiling Rock - in hopes to find and break-out the captured invasion force.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 15
programme.desc: Sokka and Zuko have to rethink their escape plan after things go wrong. They end up getting help from a few unexpected sources.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 16
programme.desc: Katara sets out to confront the Fire Nation soldier who killed her mother. However, no one knows what she will do when she finds him.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 17
programme.desc: When the kids see a new play about themselves and all of their past adventures, they aren't happy with the production.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 18
programme.desc: The kids learn new information about Firelord Ozai's master plan and decide to strike sooner than planned, but they are unsure if Aang is ready.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 19
programme.desc: While Firelord Ozai begins his master plan, the gang tries to stop him. Meanwhile, Aang seeks advice from his past lives.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 20
programme.desc: Suki, Toph, and Sokka try to stop the Fire Lord's fleet before they hit land, while Azula prepares for her coronation day.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 21
programme.desc: Sokka and Toph manage to disable the airships while Zuko and Katara confront Azula. Aang finally faces off against the Fire Lord.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 1
programme.desc: Katara and Sokka, a brother and sister from the Southern Water Tribe, discover a twelve-year-old boy frozen in an iceberg. Katara wonders if this boy is the Avatar whom the world has been awaiting.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 2
programme.desc: Prince Zuko, a young Firebender whose mission in life is to capture the Avatar, tracks Aang down to the Southern Water Tribe village where Katara and Sokka live.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 3
programme.desc: Aang is eager to take Sokka and Katara to the Air Temple where he was raised. But upon arrival, it becomes apparent that the temple is not at all how Aang remembers it.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 4
programme.desc: When locals of a small island discover Aang is the Avatar, they treat him like a celebrity.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 5
programme.desc: Aang takes Katara and Sokka to an Earthbender city. The kids cause damage and are brought before a crazy old king, who seems to enjoy messing with the kids' heads.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 6
programme.desc: The kids come to an Earth Nation town which is occupied by the Fire Nation. But will Katara's attempts to inspire the oppressed people help them or hurt them?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 7
programme.desc: Aang, Katara, and Sokka arrive at a town being terrorized by a mysterious force from the spirit world. Aang doesn't know how to help these people, and realizes he has much to learn about being Avatar.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 8
programme.desc: During the winter solstice, Aang must reach a Fire Nation temple while dodging Prince Zuko, Commander Zhao, and the Fire Sages who guard it.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 9
programme.desc: When Katara's desire to master Waterbending gets the best of her, the kids find themselves on the run from pirates.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 10
programme.desc: Our heroes' friendship is tested when they meet Jet, a charismatic teenager leading a band of rebels who are fighting against the Fire Nation.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 11
programme.desc: When Aang and friends come to the rim of a giant canyon, they are asked to help guide two groups of refugees across. Aang quickly learns that this will be no easy task.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 12
programme.desc: A powerful storm brings up painful memories of the past - and puts everyone in jeopardy in the present.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 13
programme.desc: When Sokka and Katara get too sick to travel, Aang goes out on his own to find a cure for them. But he is captured by Zhao and held prisoner inside an impenetrable fortress.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 14
programme.desc: Aang, Katara, and Sokka discover a village of people who are all reliant on a fortuneteller in their everyday lives but they are so reliant that they are blind to the imminent danger they are all in.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 15
programme.desc: Aang feels insecure when Katara and Sokka come across something that reminds them of home. Because Aang thinks his friends might leave him, he hides an important message which only leads to trouble.

channel.desc: The world is divided into four elemental nations. The Avatar upholds the balance, but when the Fire Nation invaded, he vanishes. A hundred years later, Katara and Sokka discover the new Avatar, an airbender named Aang.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): H.A.V.O.C. in the Streets!
programme.desc: Titanus sends of couple of his H.A.V.O.C.mutants to bust into the aerospace plant and steal some much needed equipment. Only problem is that the Turtles were waiting for them.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Enter: Krakus
programme.desc: Krakus, a cop from the future, arrives and thinking that the Turtles are in league with Titanus, shakes them down for information.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Turtle Trek
programme.desc: Krang activates his new dimensional portal, thanks to Shredder's installation of the Energy Transmitter at the Power Relay Station, giving him access to Dimension X.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Unknown Ninja
programme.desc: While watching video tapes of old battles, Raphael sees a mystery person spying on them. While the Turtles investigate, an alien warlord named Dregg sends his TechnoGansters to steal all the gold on Earth.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Dregg of the Earth
programme.desc: April contacts the Turtles to let them know that Dregg has landed on Earth and is preparing a press conference. The Turtles rush to meet April at the Park, where they hear Dregg announce his intentions and offers the world his molecular converter.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Wrath of Medusa
programme.desc: Believing that the Turtles are the only thing that stands between him and total domination of the planet, Dregg makes contact with Medusa, a sinisterly beautiful alien.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Showdown
programme.desc: April contacts the Turtles to inform them that all the TV stations in the City are jammed. Sleazebug tries to recruit the Turtles for a martial arts tournament.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Split-Second
programme.desc: Carter, April and the Turtles investigate a break-in at the Antique Timepiece Museum. Convinced that Dregg is responsible, the Turtles discover a clue on a wall display.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Carter the Enforcer
programme.desc: Splinter convinces the Turtles that it is their duty to fight evil, even when the whole world is against them. Carter and the Turtles team up with April to get the goods on Dregg.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Return of Dregg
programme.desc: While the Turtles work on using fragments of the Vortex Crystal to stabilize their mutations, Lord Dregg plans to use the fragments to create another Vortex Crystal to power his Vortex Transporter.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Beginning of the End
programme.desc: While Raphael, Michelangelo, Donatello and Carter work on restoring Leonardo to his regular self, Mung steals all the plutonium from a power plant in order for Dregg to build a Plutonium Ray to turn Leonardo into a radioactive killer.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Power of Three
programme.desc: Mungg informs Dregg that he came across two individuals who claimed they were old acquaintances of the turtles: Shredder and Krang!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): A Turtle in Time
programme.desc: The Turtles', Shredder's and Krang's battles skills, powers, and memories are absorbed into Dregg.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Turtles to the Second Power
programme.desc: Dregg and his crew plan an invasion of Earth to make it his new home base, but first he has to get his transporter chip back from Shredder.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Day the Earth Disappeared
programme.desc: With the city breaking apart, the Turtles head to the street to investigate and see the Dreggnaut appear in the sky. With Mung's help, Dregg reprograms the transporter to open a warp in space.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Divide and Conquer
programme.desc: Lord Dregg launches a final attack on the Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Turtle Tracks
programme.desc: April O'Neil, ace reporter for Channel 6, investigates recent break-ins, allegedly by Ninjas, which have resulted in the thefts of numerous technologies.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Enter: The Shredder
programme.desc: The Shredder kidnaps Splinter in an attempt to lure the Turtles to his own cause. In order to rescue Splinter the Turtles must enter the Shredder's mobile fortress and brave its dangerous weaponry.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): A Thing about Rats
programme.desc: Baxter Stockman, a mad scientist, is showing an exterminator his new invention: a rat catching robot called Mousers.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Hot Rodding Teenagers from Dimension X
programme.sub-title: Hot Rodding Teenagers from Dimension X
programme.desc: Shredder experiments with the Inter-Dimensional Portal, hoping to contact Krang's' Rock Soldiers and prepare an invasion of Earth.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Shredder & Splintered
programme.desc: Shredder lures Splinter into the Technodrome, this time with the promise that a weapon in his possession can restore the sensei to human form.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Return of the Shredder
programme.desc: Shredder trains students at the Dojo for a crooked Turtles gang. The mock turtles' crime spree starts turning the public against Michelangelo, Raphael, Donatello and Leonardo.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Incredible Shrinking Turtles
programme.desc: In the first of a four-parter, the amazing amphibians search for the segments of the powerful crystal Eye of Sarnoth. Shredder cuts the Turtles down to size, literally.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): It Came from Beneath the Sewers
programme.sub-title: It Came from Beneath the Sewers
programme.desc: In the second of a four-parter about the pursuit of the Eye of Sarnoth, the Turtles are attacked by a huge alien plant that is making New York into a jungle.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Mean Machines
programme.desc: The hunt for the Eye of Sarnoth continues in the third of a four-parter with the Turtles in Groucho-like disguises. Shredder hooks up a fragment of the Eye to the computer Omnus.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Curse of the Evil Eye
programme.desc: Shredder is in control of the Eye of Sarnoth, enabling him to transmute matter. Shredder brings to life a dragon which soars through the air with shocked shellbacks Leonardo and Michelangelo aboard.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Case of the Killer Pizzas
programme.desc: The Turtles' favourite food, pizza, is also the source of their problem. Nasty, fanged creatures have been planted in pizza boxes! When the critters crack open their chrysalises, they become enormous.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Enter: The Fly
programme.desc: Shredder sends April a rare duko plant that renders her unconscious. The Turtles seek a rare leaf that can serve as an antidote.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Invasion of the Punk Frogs
programme.desc: Mutagen, sent by Krang from Dimension X, changes four Florida frogs into half-human creatures four and a half feet tall. Shredder, training them in his evil ways, names them Attila the Frog, Genghis Frog, Rasputin the Mad Frog and Napoleon Bonafrog.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Splinter No More
programme.desc: Michelangelo senses that their mentor is "mondo depressed" and Donatello finds a way of changing back Splinter the rat to Yoshi the man.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): New York's Shiniest
programme.desc: Shredder taps into New York's computers to steal plans for robots and creates an army of robots to destroy the Turtles and loot the city.

channel.desc: Cowabunga! Straight from the sewers, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are here and ready to take on alien and mutant enemies alike. Grab some pizza and get ready for maximum Turtle Power! This is TOTALLY TURTLES on Pluto TV!

programme.title: Riptide: Still Goin' Steady
programme.desc: Murray has been appearing on a game show, 'Brain Basher'.

programme.title: Riptide: Robin And Marian
programme.desc: When a guy who pretends to be Robin Hood robs almost everyone in king harbor, he accidently takes engraving plates for a counterfeiting scheme.

programme.title: Riptide: Requiem For Icarus
programme.desc: Nick reacquaints with an old buddy who he hasn't seen or heard from in five years.

programme.title: Riptide: Home For Christmas
programme.desc: Nick spends his Christmas arranging the funeral of a dead soldier. But when the wrong body is shipped, he and the team quickly uncover the dark circumstances behind his death.

programme.title: Riptide: Lady Killer
programme.desc: Someone in King Harbor is killing young blonde women, and the Riptide Agency's latest client has an idea who it may be.

programme.title: Riptide: A Matter Of Policy
programme.desc: Things are looking up for Nick when he's named as a beneficiary for a large estate. But soon the team realizes that the money may come at a cost.

programme.title: Riptide: The Wedding Bell Blues
programme.desc: When a millionaire hires the team to find his future wife, they find more than they bargained for, and land in the midst of a mob war.

programme.title: Riptide: The Frankie Kahana Show
programme.desc: While at a lounge listening to a singer from Hawaii, a couple things break up the show, trying to kill the host. Soon, the team is embroiled in a case.

programme.title: Riptide: Smiles We Left Behind
programme.desc: When they go to pick up their dry cleaning, the guys can tell something is upsetting Lucy.

programme.title: Riptide: The Pirate And The Princess
programme.desc: The Riptide crew reunites with Angelo en Giovanna Guirilini as they try to find the lost treasure of captain William Tyson.

programme.title: Riptide: Playing Hardball
programme.desc: A professional baseball team has a drug problem, so Nick and Cody go undercover as players while Murray pretends to be a commentator.

programme.title: Riptide: The Play's The Thing
programme.desc: A string of murders is connected to the search for an undiscovered Shakespeare manuscript and the Riptide agency unhappily teams up with wannabe FBI agent Gloria to find it.

programme.title: Riptide: Dead Men Don't Floss
programme.desc: When an article in a magazine praises Nick for "his" agency, the guys each take a case to see which one is the best detective.

programme.title: Riptide: Chapel Of Glass
programme.desc: As the lieutenant's wedding nears, a case the guys are working on strikes close to home, and may call into question everything she knows.

channel.desc: The cases of a private investigations agency run by two Vietnam War veterans and their computer geek friend from high school, armed with toughness, their own helicopter, and the third's technical ability.

programme.desc: Two gang rivals get inside each other's heads, and a police officer hones his act.

programme.title: Key & Peele: Manly Tears

programme.title: Nathan For You: Sporting Goods Store/Antique Shop
programme.desc: Nathan recruits child athletes for endorsement deals and finds a way to put drunk people's clumsiness to good use.

programme.title: Nathan For You: Hotel/Travel Agent
programme.desc: Nathan makes it easier for parents to have sex in a hotel room and finds a way for a travel agent to better serve her aging customers.

programme.title: Nathan For You: Nail Salon/Fun
programme.desc: Nathan discovers a snafu in his plan to offer valet services at a nail salon and embarks on a mission to prove that people enjoy his company.

programme.title: Nathan For You: The Hero
programme.desc: Nathan organizes a death-defying stunt in an attempt to turn a regular guy into a national hero.

programme.title: Nathan For You: Nathan For You: A Celebration
programme.desc: Anthony Napoli and Nathan revisit some of the people the show has helped, including a ghost realtor, a teen vandal and a centerfold-turned-private eye.

programme.title: Nathan For You: The Richards Tip
programme.desc: Nathan stages an elaborate stunt to make it seem like comedian Michael Richards left a $10,000 tip at a deli.

programme.title: Nathan For You: Chili Shop/Massage Parlor
programme.desc: Nathan devises a method of selling chili in secret and founds a charity to help a massage parlor upsell its clients.

programme.title: Nathan For You: Andy vs. Uber
programme.desc: Nathan reteams with an old client to enlist several disgruntled taxi drivers for a plot to sabotage Uber's business from the inside.

programme.title: Nathan For You: The Anecdote
programme.desc: Nathan goes to great lengths to create the perfect talk show anecdote.

programme.title: Nathan For You: Shipping Logistics Company
programme.desc: Nathan teaches an international exporter how to ship smoke alarms tax-free.

programme.title: Nathan For You: Computer Repair/Psychic
programme.desc: Nathan helps a computer repair shop earn the public's trust, and a psychic's marketing turns personal.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: Silent Auction
programme.desc: In hopes of claiming a winning lotto ticket, Janet searches for a legal loophole. Jung has a tough talk with Shannon. Umma covets a fancy coat.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: New TV
programme.desc: Kimchee tries to keep his new girlfriend from meeting Jung. Janet speaks her mind in class. Appa scores a new TV.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: Janet's Boyfriend
programme.desc: Janet struggles to keep her parents from learning about her relationship with Raj. Meanwhile, Jung and Kimchee plan a party.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: Good Neighbours
programme.desc: Kim's Convenience gets a noisy new neighbor. Jung becomes smitten with a new co-worker. Gerald's new girlfriend rubs Janet the wrong way.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: Appa's First Text
programme.desc: Appa inherits his daughter's old smartphone. Umma finds a stray dog in the store. Janet and Kimchee bond over dim sum.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: Handy Graduation
programme.desc: At a party to celebrate getting his GED, Jung can't ignore his feelings for Shannon. Meanwhile, Janet grows tired of standing in her brother's shadow.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: New Appa-liance
programme.desc: Appa's got a plan to get a new appliance for less, Jung looks to mend old fences and Janet searches for a way to differentiate herself online.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: Cutie Pie
programme.desc: Appa worries Umma will be jealous of a flirty online review. Jung returns to his old stomping grounds. Gerald's girlfriend ruffles Janet's feathers.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: Open Kimunication
programme.desc: Appa and Umma take their bickering to a new level. Janet crosses paths with a photography idol. Shannon's boyfriend asks Jung for a favor.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: Thy Neighbour's Wifi
programme.desc: Appa has a solution for spotty Wi-Fi: use the neighbor's. Jung has eyes for Shannon's friend. Umma and Pastor Nina ask Janet to do a church reading.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: Army Spoon
programme.desc: Gerald photographs Appa and his spoon for an exhibit. Janet's apology for a restaurant faux pas doesn't go well. Umma receives an alarming call.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: The Kim Cup
programme.desc: An old ping-pong table rekindles a rivalry between Appa and Jung. Umma sets out to bond with Janet but finds Chelsea to be more receptive.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: Appanoon Delight
programme.desc: Appa's quest to retrieve his drill from Janet leads to an amorous encounter with Umma. Jung gives Kimchee unsolicited advice and plenty of it.

channel.desc: Love Drama is the place for thrillers, mysteries, romance, and angsty entertainment. Escape the everyday with explosive whodunits, stories from the heart, and electrifying shows that will leave you breathless.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Tonight it’s an emotional rollercoaster as Supersize cheese addict Stu Preston takes on Superskinny portion controller Alice Duran. At 27 stone 13lbs Stu is digging himself an early grave with a knife and fork and desperately needs help.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: Deadly Impact
programme.desc: A six-year-old Chinese girl is rushed in with intermittent seizures, but with a language barrier, will the doctor find out what's wrong with her?

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: HOOKED
programme.desc: A fishing lure embedded in a man's face turns out to be the least of his problems; a pair of unconscious teen-aged mud-boggers are brought to the ER where dramatic family secrets are revealed during resuscitation.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: DOCTOR'S DILEMMA
programme.desc: A young pregnant woman in labor begs the ER doctor to keep her pregnancy and delivery a secret from her father; twins share similar, confusing symptoms, until one develops life-threatening ailments.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: Too Close To Home
programme.desc: Snake-bite expert Dr Sean Bush faces his own nightmare when his wife calls to tell him a venomous rattlesnake has just bitten their two-year-old son.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: Under Siege
programme.desc: Gripping tales of medical emergencies. Doctors must look after their own when a psychotic gunman enters the hospital and starts shooting staff. Dr May is shot in the head, but can his colleague save.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: Creepy Crawlies
programme.desc: A young woman is rushed to the ER after being bitten in the face by a dog; an ER doctor has to overcome his fears when he's confronted with an unusual series of patients; an intoxicated woman injured in a fall unexpectedly goes into cardiac arrest.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: Escaping Diagnosis
programme.desc: A disoriented young woman in a bunny costume checks into the ER; a physician treats a severed thumb, but can't treat a cut on her own boyfriend's hand; a young man has lost feeling in his legs ... or has he?

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: My Head's Exploding
programme.desc: A patient with a severe headache is seizing, then bruises erupt on her legs, and her doctor has no idea why. A beautiful naked woman is behaving so oddly that her doctor assumes she's on drugs - but she's not

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER: Minutes to Live
programme.desc: An unconscious woman is bleeding internally. Doctors must quickly assess the problem, and convince a reluctant surgeon to take the case. A man with a 4-day erection needs extraordinary help. A woman arrives in the ER with a knife in her chest.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Addicted to My Breasts/Tape Eater
programme.desc: Sheyla has spent $250,000 on 22 breast enlargement surgeries to achieve her 38KKK bust size, despite suffering a severe infection from her recent implants. Andrea is addicted to eating adhesive tape.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Dirt/Extreme Toenails
programme.desc: Kristie has eaten dirt every day for the last 30 years, consuming more than five tons since her addiction began. Meanwhile, Ayanna is addicted to growing her toenails.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Toilet Paper/Blow Dryer
programme.desc: Lori has been sleeping with her blow dryer for 20 years, despite the risk burns or fire. Meanwhile, Kesha's family is concerned that eating half a roll of toilet paper a day is causing health issues.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: My Crazy Obsession Christmas Spcl 2
programme.desc: My Crazy Obsession: Christmas Collection 2 takes you inside the lives and homes of people who are always in the holiday spirit!

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Troll Takeover_Stuffing Animals
programme.desc: The Smith family has a collection of 213 stuffed and mounted animals throughout their home. Michelle’s obsession with trolls threatens her relationship with her family.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Rampant Rats/Extreme Fingernails
programme.desc: Theresa has more than 60 pet hairless rats that are taking over her apartment. Jazz has been growing her fingernails for 22 years. Her longest nail is two feet long, and she calls them her children.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Identical Twin Obsession / Eats Mattresses
programme.desc: Twins Amy and Becky are addicted to being identical, looking alike, acting alike, and even weighing their meals to stay the same size. Jennifer is addicted to eating mattresses.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Buggin' Out_Dumpster Diet
programme.desc: Bugs have been a part of David’s daily diet for over twelve years, watch as he braces himself to eat his most venomous bug yet. Kelly’s daily diet consists of food solely gathered from the dumpster.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Wears Diapers/Eats Dryer Sheets
programme.desc: For Riley, there's nothing like the comfort of wearing a warm, wet diaper. She lives as an adult baby to escape the stresses of life. And Charmissa chews on dryer sheets for up to 10 hours a day.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Greg Dreams of Jeannie_The Amazing Squirrel
programme.sub-title: Greg Dreams of Jeannie_The Amazing Squirrel
programme.desc: Greg’s obsession with 60’s pop-culture has literally taken over his home. Kelly’s life revolves around her pet squirrel, Sugar Bush and his photo appearances.

channel.desc: From eating cat hair to marrying a carnival ride, the extreme health channel has all types of unusual behaviours and strange conditions that will have you glued to your TV .

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Open Concept (Part 2)
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: A Big Investment (Part 1)
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: A Big Investment (Part 2)
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Magical Home (Part 1)
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Magical Home (Part 2)
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Income for a Rainy Day (Part 1)
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Income for a Rainy Day (Part 2)
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Tricky Choice (Part 1)
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Tricky Choice (Part 2)
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: We Bought a Resort (Part 1)
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: We Bought a Resort (Part 2)
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Net Zero
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Wow Factor
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: My Daughter's Plan
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Feels Like Home
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Century Homes
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Waterfront
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Retirement
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Sweet Country Home
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: A Smart Decision
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Pool House
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Love the Location
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Big Move
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: My Favourite Homes
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: House For an Athlete
programme.desc: ??George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Treetops
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Energized
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Fabulous
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Fun House
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Condo
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights.

channel.desc: From first-time homebuyers to experienced investors, TMDA has something for everyone, affording a peek into the sumptuous world of international luxury homeownership.

programme.desc: Tim finds out his girlfriend isn't into their relationship for the long haul. Follow up with Steve French.

programme.title: Cheaters: Episode 4

programme.title: Cheaters: Episode 39

programme.title: Cheaters: Episode 3

programme.title: Cheaters: Episode 4

programme.title: Cheaters: Episode 9

programme.title: COPS: Beer Run
programme.desc: A carjacking results in a chase and a flipped vehicle. Suspects crash a truck after attempting to steal beer. A man attempts to swallow his drugs during a bust.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Pants Down, Hit the Ground
programme.sub-title: Cops Pants Down, Hit the Ground
programme.desc: A man learns a hard lesson about wearing his seatbelt, and police perform a traffic stop and uncover a sad man with a strange story.

programme.title: COPS: Pup and Rescue
programme.desc: A driver denies ownership of what police find in his car. Police conduct a narcotics sting that nets several arrests. A deputy removes a pooch from the scene of an accident.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Four Felonies and a Flat Tire
programme.sub-title: Cops Four Felonies and a Flat Tire
programme.desc: A suspected car thief's claims of innocence are undermined by a video he shot of himself earlier that day, and the pursuit of a suspected drunk driver has a surprising end.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Two Doors Down
programme.desc: A deputy calls for backup when he's outnumbered, a former Marine damages his neighbors' property, and a husband and wife are separated after their vehicle is searched.

programme.title: COPS: Safe Cracking
programme.desc: A man stages a sit-in in his car in an attempt to stop it from being towed. A homeowner denies that he's selling drugs despite the large amount of evidence found in his home.

programme.title: COPS: Spiked but Still Moving
programme.desc: A suspect refuses to stop his vehicle even after the officers spike his tires. A dispute over money results in a pregnant woman being attacked.

programme.title: COPS: Rocks in my Socks
programme.desc: Deputies discover a purse and a sock containing paraphernalia during an arrest. Deputies pursue an intoxicated motorcyclist. A woman is suspected of stealing a cake.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Thanks for Nothing, Mom
programme.desc: Officers respond to a suspected animal cruelty call, a fight between neighbors turns violent, and deputies question a suspicious group behind a truck stop.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: A trespassing man uses his dog as a shield when police arrive at the scene, a stolen tablet leads to a bloody altercation, and kittens run wild in a Florida neighborhood.

programme.title: COPS: Hiding the Evidence
programme.desc: A drug dealer swallows something suspicious as deputies move in to arrest him. Deputies pull over a father with his son in the car. A woman files a kidnapping report against her own boyfriend.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Carjacked Up
programme.desc: Officers spot a suspect running down the street with a knife, the driver of a stolen car takes off on foot after he's pulled over, and police find carjacked vehicles.

programme.title: COPS: Get a Room
programme.desc: A man claims to be protecting the car he broke into. Officers are called to when a couple gets too friendly while out in public. Police are dispatched when a drunk woman pounds on her neighbor's door.

programme.title: COPS: All Aboard!
programme.desc: Officers pursue a truck driving backwards on a freeway. A suspect jumps a train to evade police. A woman claims to be disabled when a pill falls from her pocket.

programme.title: COPS: Gimme a Break
programme.desc: Officers pursue two brothers after an attempted bank robbery. A confused man with a shotgun calls police after hearing voices. Deputies find illegal items in the back of a man's truck.

programme.title: COPS: Cops The Blame Game
programme.desc: An arrested man has a long list of instructions for his "bae," and a driver charged with heroin possession claims he was framed by the passenger in his backseat.

programme.title: COPS: Wardrobe Malfunction
programme.desc: A suspect flees police in a truck over a misdemeanor traffic warrant. A man denies hitting his wife who has a bloody nose. A man denies ownership of his shorts when deputies find drugs in them.

programme.title: COPS: Apologies Detective
programme.desc: Officers hold a man under a car at gunpoint after a traffic stop. Officers are flagged down and directed to an arguing couple. A man apologizes to detectives for the illicit items they find.

programme.title: COPS: My BFF Screwed Up
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a woman holding a loaded gun to her head. Officers kick in a door to halt an assault in progress. A woman driving a stolen vehicle claims it was purchased by a friend.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Bail Me Out, Boss
programme.desc: A distressed woman leads the cops to her abusive fiance, and a couple of officers are suspicious when they pull over an overly friendly man.

programme.title: COPS starts at 9pm
programme.desc: Cops gives viewers access into the daily lives and work of the men and women of law enforcement. Filmed on location, the groundbreaking series follows real officers on patrol as they conduct high-speed pursuits, wild arrests and dangerous police business.
